1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo tsha pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##//rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya rat+na me g+ha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
1b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/
1b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang
1b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
2a1(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul g.yan ga ya mgo'i ri la dge slong bdun khri nyis stong
2a2(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon
2a3(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par
2a4(mdo sde): grol ba| cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes
2a5(mdo sde): su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/
2b1(mdo sde): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/ chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/
2b2(mdo sde): sems rnyed pa dang / bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba/ legs par rab tu byung ba/ legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa/
2b3(mdo sde): brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs
2b4(mdo sde): pa ni| 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i
2b5(mdo sde): tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon
2b6(mdo sde): du phyogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
3a1(mdo sde): bab pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin
3a2(mdo sde): tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/ lam gyi rgyun ma btsad pa/ sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas
3a3(mdo sde): ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab
3a4(mdo sde): par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid spyod yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la
3a5(mdo sde): gnas pa/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
3a6(mdo sde): thams cad la mkhas pa/ ye shes mtha' yas pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ sems
3b1(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mi sgul ba/ sems pad+mo ltar ma gos pa/ sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su dag pa/ sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba rnams
3b2(mdo sde): la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal dang / lag na rdo rje rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang /
3b3(mdo sde): gtsug na rin po che dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i rtse mo dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / gser gyi
3b4(mdo sde): snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / dge ba'i snying po dang / dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / ye shes
3b5(mdo sde): kyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / kun tu zla ba dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang /
3b6(mdo sde): mthu chen thob dang / kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas mig dang / pad+ma'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / yangs pa'i mig dang / kun tu spyod lam dang / kun tu mdzes
3b7(mdo sde): dang / kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros dang / ye shes kyi blo gros dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo
4a1(mdo sde): gros dang / seng+ge'i rnam par rol pa dang / sgra chen po dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / seng+ge'i sgra sgrog dang / sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab mo sgrog dang /
4a2(mdo sde): gos med dang / dri ma kun bral dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / ye shes kyi 'od dang / ye shes kyi dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal
4a3(mdo sde): dang / pad+ma'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byams pa la
4a4(mdo sde): sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu
4a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu shin tu gnod bral la sogs pa gnod bral gyi lha'i
4a6(mdo sde): bu rnams dang / lha'i bu kun tu dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu shin tu 'phrul dga' la sogs la 'phrul dga'i ris
4a7(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / ded dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu
4b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad
4b2(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags pa bzang ris dang / stobs can dang / nor sbyin dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang
4b3(mdo sde): gzi can dang / rgya mtsho dang / mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u
4b4(mdo sde): brgya ston du ma dang / klu'i bu mo mang po rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
4b5(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag dang yang thabs cig go/ yang de'i tshe ga ya na ga ya mgo'i ri'i dpag tshad bzhi kho ra khor yug tu skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam
4b6(mdo sde): yang gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag gis ma
4b7(mdo sde): gang bar gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs sam/ bar snang gi phyogs de med do/ /'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad
5a1(mdo sde): gcig / kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad phyed pa la lha'i ras bcos bu du ma ni/ bting / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas ni/ bla bre bres/ dar
5a2(mdo sde): gyi lda ldi brgya stong du ma ni/ dbyangs/ me tog sil mas ni/ gtor bzhig bshams te/ seng+ge'i khri da'i kho ra khor yug gi sa'i phyogs de'i nges rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing
5a3(mdo sde): lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / chag chag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas pa dang / dri rab tu zhim zhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas gtor bar
5a4(mdo sde): gyur to| |bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir phyogs de na gser gyi pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam/ 'dab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa/ chu ba ni/ bai DUR+ya/
5a5(mdo sde): snying po ni/ in+d+ra nI la/ ze ba ni/ asma gar+b+ha ste/ dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la reg na dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to/ /seng+ge'i khri de'i gra bzhir ha cang yang mi
5a6(mdo sde): ring / ha cang yang mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ sboms su rgyang grags gnyis kyis 'khor ba bzhi skyes so/ /seng+ge'i khri legs par bshams
5a7(mdo sde): pa de la bcom ldan 'das blo ni/ rab tu rnam par dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ rab tu bskor/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni/ bcom/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni/ ma
5b1(mdo sde): gos la mi bsnyengs shing mi 'dzem ste/ seng+ge'i ltar bag tsha ba med pa/ mtsho dang 'dra bar dang ste rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dwang ba/ rgya mtsho ltar zab cing gting dpag
5b2(mdo sde): bka' la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ nyi ma ltar rab tu lhan pa/ zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa/ klu chen po ltar chos kyi char mngon
5b3(mdo sde): par 'babs pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa/ slob ma shin tu dul ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 'khor mnga' ba/ brgya byin dang /
5b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis zhal du bltas shing ma khengs ma dud par bzhugs te/ 'khor tshogs pa de na lam me/ lhan ne/
5b5(mdo sde): lhang de'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ba'i dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya
5b6(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma yod pa byung ste/ de byung bas phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang bar byas te phyir 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la
5b7(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum par yang mi mngon no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma
6a1(mdo sde): dang / zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi gseb phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon pa de bzhin du
6a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon no/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bye ma'i phung po la mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chu
6a3(mdo sde): zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon no/ /de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi
6a4(mdo sde): k hams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
6a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
6a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste/ theg pa gcig las brtsams nas chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan
6a7(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med
6b1(mdo sde): dang | mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra'ang mi grag go / 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
6b2(mdo sde): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go / 'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zas kyi bya ba'ang mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
6b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi
6b4(mdo sde): khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur ba ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams de na zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams
6b5(mdo sde): de lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtswa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / ri la sogs pa'ang mi snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams
6b6(mdo sde): d e 'dra ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par
6b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba zhig gnas te/ de 'od des reg ste bskul nas rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
7a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag
7a2(mdo sde): kyang 'od des reg ste bskul ba dang / rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
7a3(mdo sde): de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam
7a4(mdo sde): p ar sel ba stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
7a5(mdo sde): pa pad+ma'i spyan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma ma
7a6(mdo sde): mchis pa/ rnam par dag pa/ yid du mchi ba/ lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar bgyid pa byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
7a7(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs
7b1(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyod 'das pa na mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de
7b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
7b3(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b4(mdo sde): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/ des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lus dang sems shin tu rnam par dag par
7b5(mdo sde): byed pa 'di phyung ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
7b6(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang
7b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
8a1(mdo sde): pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
8a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar sems can su gang dag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos
8a3(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
8a4(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa lags sam/ bcom
8a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags
8a6(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ma thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ thos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
8a7(mdo sde): 'das| de ci'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag thams cad ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'ang yin la/ phyir
8b1(mdo sde): ldog pa'ang yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gang de lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'ang lags la/ phyir ldog pa'ang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
8b2(mdo sde): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos las sems can de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas sems can de dag phyir mi ldog
8b3(mdo sde): par lung ston to/ /mtshan thos pa de kho nas de ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin te/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe
8b4(mdo sde): bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod de/ sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med la/ myu gu skye ba nas rdzogs pa'i
8b5(mdo sde): bar du rkyen rnams yod na/ rigs kyi bu/ sa bon de la ji skad ces bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/ de ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa zhes
8b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bla na med
8b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de la byang chub sems
9a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
9a2(mdo sde): de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba
9a3(mdo sde): dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de
9a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi
9a5(mdo sde): bu| de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyad de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang
9a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs
9a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la'ang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur
9b1(mdo sde): stir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' de
9b2(mdo sde): dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod dengs shig /'jig rten gyi khams der bag yod par gnas pas gnas par
9b3(mdo sde): gyis shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag ni/ rab tu 'dod chags mang ba/ zhe sdang mang ba/ gti mug mang ba/ dge sbyong du mi
9b4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa mang ba/ brlang ba/ gtum pa/ zhe gcod pa/ mu cor smra ba/ pho theg can/
9b5(mdo sde): g.yeng ba/ brkam pa/ le lo can/ ngan pa'i ngan tshul can/ sdig pa'i chos can/ phrag dog dang ser snas yongs su dkris pa/ nyon mongs pa du mas nye bar nyon mongs par
9b6(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams te/ sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di
9b7(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rigs
10a1(mdo sde): kyi bu dag / de de bzhin te/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu
10a2(mdo sde): dag/ gang de lta bur kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /de
10a3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can yongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci ngo mtshar gyi/ gang dag de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par gyur
10a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang dad pa rnyed pa dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / chos la skyabs
10a5(mdo sde): su 'gro ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste spyod pa 'di ni/ ches ngo mtshar to/ /de
10a6(mdo sde): bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni/ ches ngo mtshar to/ /de bas
10a7(mdo sde): kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni/ ches ngo
10b1(mdo sde): mtshar to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
10b2(mdo sde): l a sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu mthun pa'i rjes su bstan pa
10b3(mdo sde): 'di mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo / /dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir la
10b4(mdo sde): las ni| rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul/ la las ni/ bai DUR+ya'i shing rnams/ la las ni/
10b5(mdo sde): shel gyi shing rnams/ la las ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing rnams/ la las ni/ gser gyi shing rnams/ la las ni/ me tog gi shing rnams/ la las ni/ 'bras bu'i
10b6(mdo sde): shing rnams/ la las ni/ gos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ rgyan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ spos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ phreng ba'i sprin rnams/ la las ni/ phye
10b7(mdo sde): ma'i sprin rnams/ la las ni/ gdugs kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni/ sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul to/ /mngon
11a1(mdo sde): p ar sprul nas gcig tu 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig
11a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma
11a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal lo/ /de bas na/ gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog gis
11a4(mdo sde): bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legs par mngon par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas byang chub sems
11a5(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ltar mnyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya
11a6(mdo sde): ba mngon par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang ba/ dri ma med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lus
11a7(mdo sde): dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen
11b1(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su
11b2(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/ bde zhing khro ba dang gnod sems dang yang bral te phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang / gang
11b3(mdo sde): yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar mun pa mun nag gang du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che
11b4(mdo sde): ba| 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang bar gyur te/ gang der skyes pa'i sems can
11b5(mdo sde): dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi ri rnams dang / khor yug gi ri chen po rnams
11b6(mdo sde): dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po rnams dang / de ma yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab ste snang bar gyur pa dang / blar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig
11b7(mdo sde): rten man chad / 'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can chen po yan chad de'i bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
12a1(mdo sde): par bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gdag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas
12a2(mdo sde): zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ zas thob/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni/ btung ba/ gos 'dod pa rnams ni/ gos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni/ bzhon pa/ nor 'dod
12a3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni/ nor thob/ long ba rnams ni/ mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni/ sgra thos/ sgren mo rnams ni/ gos can du gyur/ smyon pa rnams ni/ dran pa thob/ sdug bsngal
12a4(mdo sde): ba rnams ni/ bde bar gyur/ sbrum pa rnams ni/ bde bar btsas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
12a5(mdo sde): ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba der nye ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag tu stong gsum
12a6(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs bar kun tu snang ngo / /steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i pad+ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /lha'i
12a7(mdo sde): me tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i spos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang / lha'i
12b1(mdo sde): phye ma'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /de dag mngon par rab tu phab pas sems
12b2(mdo sde): can gang la reg pa de dag thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/ yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri la shing tha mal pa dang / sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
12b3(mdo sde): med par gyur par snang ngo / /sa phyogs de dag rin po che'i shing rnams dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang / me tog gi shing rnams dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnams dang /
12b4(mdo sde): tsan+dan gyi shing rnams dang / a ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste/ de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to/ /bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dag kyang sgra 'byin cing sil
12b5(mdo sde): snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo / /lum+bi'i tshal rab mchog tu gang skyes pa/ /mnyam med gzhar yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur/ /
12b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /byang chub mchog sus byang chub shing dbang drung / /bdud kyi sde stobs bcom
12b7(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas pa/ /dri med gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /chos tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang / /chu zla 'dra bar gang gis
13a1(mdo sde): rtogs gyur pa/ /bsod nams zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja' dang 'dra ba dang / /
13a2(mdo sde): gar mkhan tshon 'drar gang gis rab rtogs pa/ /mi g.yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /gang gis bskal pa brgya
13a3(mdo sde): phrag mang por ni/ /thugs rje'i thugs kyi tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa/ /dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /byang chub sems
13a4(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang / /lha yi tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa/ /gti mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ /gang gis
13a5(mdo sde): mchog gi chos kyi gter brnyes shing / /thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang / /mnyam med phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag
13a6(mdo sde): lhags| |gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid/ /pad+ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa/ /yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du/ /ri bo mchog rab 'di
13a7(mdo sde): la bdag cag lhags/ /mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku/ /dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gang / /yal ga mtha' yas rin chen shing
13b1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal du/ /bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag tu de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po stan
13b2(mdo sde): l as langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
13b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sngon ma thos/ sngon ma mthong ba'i snga ltas gda' ba 'di dag su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
13b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud+gal gyi bu/ shar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung
13b5(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan
13b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs so/ /'tsho'o/ /gzhes so/ /chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa
13b7(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skyes
14a1(mdo sde): bu dam pa de nyid dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas 'di yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
14a2(mdo sde): c es bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing
14a3(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
14a4(mdo sde): m go bos phyag btsal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su
14a5(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /grags chen shes rab chen po pa/ /thub chen dpa' bo chen po pa/ /srid pa'i mya ngan rgal ba po/ /nyon mongs rgal la phyag
14a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /thams cad du yang tha le ste/ /kun nas rab tu lhan ner bzhugs/ /kun nas rnam par grol ba po/ /phyag 'tshal mi mtshungs mtshungs med la/ /rab tu mi sgul
14a7(mdo sde): ri bo bzhin/ /gting tshod yangs pa rgya mtsho 'dra/ /mu stegs kun nas mi bskyod pa/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /gzod nas zhi
14b1(mdo sde): zhing ma skyes pa/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan/ /la la la ni lam yang bstan/ /la la yang dag nyid la bkod/ /la la yang dag mya
14b2(mdo sde): ngan bzlas/ /la la byang chub lung yang bstan/ /bag la nyal dang bsam pa mkhyen/ /khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med/ /de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams/ /gzigs pas khyod
14b3(mdo sde): kyi bka' 'grub bo/ /byang chub snying por bzhugs pa na/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dri ma sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyang / /khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs/ /rgal
14b4(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams sgrol zhing / /grol nas skye rgu sgrol mdzad de/ /srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi/ /'jig rten tshol ba khyod lags so/ /srid pa'i btson rar sems can
14b5(mdo sde): dag / yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams/ /sad par mdzad pa mgon po khyod/ /gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang / /thams cad byang chub
14b6(mdo sde): slad du zhugs/ /dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshal na/ /'dren pas de dag bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
14b7(mdo sde): bas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / byang chub sems
15a1(mdo sde): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
15a2(mdo sde): t hams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
15a3(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
15a4(mdo sde): skabs phye na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces
15a5(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin
15a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phye'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngas khyod
15a7(mdo sde): kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad
15b1(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams
15b2(mdo sde): lags| ji ltar na/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams
15b3(mdo sde): lags| ji ltar na/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ thabs mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
15b4(mdo sde): na| stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa
15b5(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ nam
15b6(mdo sde): mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ zla ba lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ nyi ma lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ seng+ge lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dul ba
15b7(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ cang shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ pad+ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams lags/
16a1(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
16a2(mdo sde): dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ blo zhi ba pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar
16a3(mdo sde): na| grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can
16a4(mdo sde): rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod
16a5(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
16a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams
16a7(mdo sde): lags| ji ltar na/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
16b1(mdo sde): na| btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mi khom pa brgyad rnam
16b2(mdo sde): par spangs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub kyi sems kyi ma stor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ skye ba dran pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral
16b3(mdo sde): ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob
16b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ lam
16b5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ lam la log par spyod pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag
16b6(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ chos gos gsum pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ phying pa can
16b7(mdo sde): rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ stan gcig pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ zas phyis mi len pa
17a1(mdo sde): rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ shing drung pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bla gab med pa
17a2(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dur khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ tsog pus rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
17a3(mdo sde): dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ma mo 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ cho ga dang /
17a4(mdo sde): spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sems can thams cad la sems
17a5(mdo sde): snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bgyid pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ nga rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
17a6(mdo sde): dad pa mang pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rten cing 'brel pa 'byung ba la mkhas
17a7(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bdag shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
17b1(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams la
17b2(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/
17b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ mang du thos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
17b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ bsam pa dang / bag la nyal 'tshal ba rnams
17b5(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ des pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ 'grogs na bde ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
17b6(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ tshul du shis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ gnas bca' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams
17b7(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na/ bsod nams bgyi ba la brtson pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag /
18a1(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
18a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
18a3(mdo sde): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la
18a4(mdo sde): khyod 'di lta bu'i don 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs
18a5(mdo sde): so| |zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi
18a6(mdo sde): bu| chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam sbyin/ mi 'jigs
18a7(mdo sde): pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying
18b1(mdo sde): rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin
18b2(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/
18b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bzang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par
18b4(mdo sde): byed de| rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na 'di ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams
18b5(mdo sde): cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/ chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med par gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par ston to/ /ji ltar rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po la yang
18b6(mdo sde): dag par ston pa de ltar gdol pa'am/ gdol bu la'ang dag par ston na/ de ma yin pa grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi gzhan dag lta ci smos/ chos kyi sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi
18b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe
19a1(mdo sde): na| rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba dang / mtshon cha bor ba yin te/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la gzhog go/
19a2(mdo sde): de sems can thams cad la par 'du shes pa yin/ mar 'du shes pa yin/ bur 'du shes pa yin/ gnyen bshes su 'du shes pa yin/ nye du'am snag gi gnyen mtshams dag
19a3(mdo sde): kyang rung bar 'du shes pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba de dang de dag tu sems can gyi ris su gang khyod kyi pha'am/
19a4(mdo sde): ma'am| bu'am/ gnyen bshes sam/ nye du'am/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gang yang rung ba'i gnas su ma gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu med do/ /zhes gsungs so snyam nas
19a5(mdo sde): de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs na/ srog chags chen po pa gzhan la lta ci smos te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs
19a6(mdo sde): pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
19a7(mdo sde): can gang mi dge ba'i las byed pa rab tu mthong na/ de dag zang zing gis sdud cing / zang zing gis bsdus nas mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bslang ste dge ba'i gnas su 'god do/ /de'ang
19b1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na mi dge ba'i chos phrag dog dang / ser sna dang /
19b2(mdo sde): ngan sems gsum spangs pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs te/ de bas na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /snyam ste/ de sbyin pa'ang sbyin zhing sbyin
19b3(mdo sde): pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi ro/
19b4(mdo sde): ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa'ang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/ phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ don gyi phyir ma yin/ g.yog
19b5(mdo sde): gi phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis phyir ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni/ chos nyid yin no snyam
19b6(mdo sde): ste| de de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis phan btags pa'i lan du phan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa
19b7(mdo sde): la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can
20a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / gcer bu dang / gos ngan pa dang / bgo ba ngan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / skyabs
20a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa lta bu'i bsod nams med pa dag mthong na/ de dag la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu bskyed cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gang
20a3(mdo sde): dag gi phyir bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sdug bsngal ba/ mgon med pa/ dpung gnyen med pa/ skyabs
20a4(mdo sde): med pa| gnas med pa/ rten med pa 'di dag yin te/ kun tu 'khyams na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon dang / dbung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / rten du
20a5(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam nas de snying rje rab tu mi bzod de/ bdog pa ci yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so/ /phan btags pa'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des
20a6(mdo sde): kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi bsnyes pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
20a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin/ brnyas shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ gshe zhing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ nyon mongs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/
20b1(mdo sde): phyug pas rgyags shing dregs te sbyin pa mi sbyin/ grags pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ ci sbyin pa de'ang bsti stang du byas shing
20b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /ri mor byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
20b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma lta bu dang / tshangs pa
20b4(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na/ lus kyis gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/ des gus pa bskyed/ ri mo bskyed nas gus par smra ba dang / phyag
20b5(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang / bsu ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dag byed do/ /de dag gi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang de dag la'ang grogs su 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
20b6(mdo sde): dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs
20b7(mdo sde): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ ji ltar na/ sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed ce na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag dang / de bzhin gshegs
21a1(mdo sde): pa'i sku gzugs la spos dang / me tog gam/ bdug gam/ byug pa'am/ skyang nul lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dag gis
21a2(mdo sde): te| de ltar na/ sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do/ /ji ltar na/ chos la bya ba dang byed ces na/ de chos nyan to/ /klog go/ 'chang ngo / /yi ger 'bri'o/ /kha ton byed do/ /kun chub par byed do/ /
21a3(mdo sde): sems so/ /ma log par sgom pa'i sbyor bas goms par byed de/ de ltar na/ chos la bya ba dag byed do/ /ji ltar na/ dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ces na/ de gos dang / bsod snyoms
21a4(mdo sde): dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / chung du na chu grang mo khyor gang tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul te/ de ltar na/ dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ de ltar na/
21a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di
21a6(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sbyin pa 'dis bdag lha'am lha la la zhig tu shog cig ce'am/ rgyal po'am rgyal po la la zhig tu shog cig ces de ltar sems mi
21a7(mdo sde): skyed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
21b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa 'di dag ji skad du bshad pa la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ sbyin pa ci dang ci sbyin yang sbyin pa de dang de
21b2(mdo sde): la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin no/ /de de ltar so sor rtog pas gang 'di sbyin pa'i snyes pa dang / sbyin pa'i dri ma dang / sbyin pa'i bar du gcod pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ de ltar sbyin
21b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun
21b4(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor
21b5(mdo sde): thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gzung ba dang bral ba
21b6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ las kyis 'jigs pa rnams yin/ kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa rnams yin/ 'jigs par lta ba
21b7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin no/ /
22a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
22a2(mdo sde): gshegs pas mdo sde'am/ 'dul ba'am/ gnas gang yang rung ba la la dag tu bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag ston pas bstan pa'i snyam du sems te/
22a3(mdo sde): gnas de dang de dag la shin tu legs par slob kyi/ rigs la 'dod chags bsam yin/ lta ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ 'khor ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ gang
22a4(mdo sde): zag gi skyon gyi phyir bslab pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ri mo med pa ma yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/
22a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis
22a6(mdo sde): ni| bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems
22a7(mdo sde): dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag la bdag gis bslab par bya'o/ /zhes rnam par dpyod do/ /byang chub sems
22b1(mdo sde): dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dag ni/ gang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de la sems can rnams dad par
22b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spyod/ yul ma yin par mi spyod/ dus ma yin par mi smra ba yin/ dus mi shes pa ma yin/ yul mi shes pa ma yin/ tshod mi shes pa ma yin te/ de
22b3(mdo sde): sems can de rjes su bsrung ba dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam phun sum tshogs shing 'jam dpar smra ba dang / dal bus smra ba dang / 'du 'dzi
22b4(mdo sde): mi mang ba dang / rab tu dben pa la mngon par phyogs pa dang / bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu dang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' cho ga phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/
22b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
22b6(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa'i gnas de dag la gus par byed pa yin/ brtson par byed pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i
22b7(mdo sde): sdom pas bsdams pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi
23a1(mdo sde): yongs su gdung ba'am/ zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba'am/ gti mug gi yongs su gdung ba'am/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la la'am/ yo
23a2(mdo sde): byad kyis phongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la rten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spang
23a3(mdo sde): ngo / /'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni/ gang / 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni/ gang zhe na/ mi sdug pa sgom pa ni/ 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o/ /yul gyi bzang mo ni/ 'dod
23a4(mdo sde): chags skye ba'i rkyen te/ mi sdug pa sgom pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rus pa
23a5(mdo sde): dang / rgyus pa dang / rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / pho ba dang / sul mang dang / long ka dang / lgang pa dang / mtsher pa dang / phyi sa
23a6(mdo sde): dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang /
23a7(mdo sde): gcin dag yod de/ dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du byis pa/ blun po/ mi
23b1(mdo sde): gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa de'ang dngos po 'di dag shes nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed na/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub
23b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa med pa yin no/ /yul gyi bzang mo de gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chags par 'gyur ba'i bud med gzugs bzang ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ mdzes pa/
23b3(mdo sde): mig tu sdug pa/ sems 'phrog pa mthong yang des de lta bu dag mthong na 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yul ni/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba dag ste/ byung nas med par
23b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin na/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la 'dod chags skyed par byed ces gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags
23b5(mdo sde): kyi gnyen po la rten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo / /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la rten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong
23b6(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la byams pa mang ba yin te/ de gzhi gang dang / rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin
23b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dag dang / rkyen de dag yongs su spangs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la rten cing zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ba yin no/ /ji
24a1(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi gnyen po la rten cing gti mug skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/ de de ltar yongs su rtog pas gti mug
24a2(mdo sde): dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug dang bral bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam/ yo byad ma 'byor kyang yongs su yi chad pa med de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams
24a3(mdo sde): cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
24a4(mdo sde): gcig pu lkog tu song ste rab tu dben pa la gnas shing 'di ltar bdag ni/ ma 'dres par gnas pa ste/ bdag ni/ rab tu dben pa na 'dug pa'o/ /bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs
24a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o/ /dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan dag ni/ kun kyang 'dres par gnas pa/ 'du 'dzi mang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams
24a6(mdo sde): pa'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyis
24a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams bsod nams dag gus par bya'o/ /tshul khrims gus par srung ngo //
24b1(mdo sde): shes rab gus par sgom mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ 'dod pa dang / 'thad pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar nyams su myong bar
24b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so snyam du dpyod do/ /de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ las kyis 'jigs pa yin no/ /
24b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la'ang 'jigs par lta zhing sdig pa chung
24b4(mdo sde): du'ang khyad du mi gsod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong rnams dug chung dus kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams dug chen pos kyang
24b5(mdo sde): skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sdig pa chen pos kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do/ /sdig pa chung dus kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byed do/ /zhes gsungs so snyam
24b6(mdo sde): du sems te/ de de ltar yongs su rtog pas kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
24b7(mdo sde): dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis yid brtan du rung ba yin te/
25a1(mdo sde): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi rnams byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu gnyis su med pa la 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor
25a2(mdo sde): bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa nor dang / yo byad kyi rnam pa dag 'dems kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi skyed
25a3(mdo sde): do| |gal te byang chub sems dpa' mchod rten gyi'am/ dge 'dun gyi dngos po'i phyir las su bskos nas yang dngos po des kyang nye bar mi 'tsho ste/ de 'di snyam du sems shing
25a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpas ni/ bdag gi lus las sha zos kyang bla'i/ gzhan gyi zas sam/ skom mam/ yo byad kyi rnam pa gang ci'ang rung ba dag ma
25a5(mdo sde): byin la| ma gnang bar spyad pa ni/ mi rung ngo / /zhes gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
25a6(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis gtses sam/ nor dang / 'khrig pa'i yan lag
25a7(mdo sde): gis brjod kyang mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
25b1(mdo sde): dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung na/ tshul khrims 'dis bdag lhar shog cig ce'am/ lha la lar shog cig ce'am/ rgyal
25b2(mdo sde): por shog cig ce'am/ rgyal po la lar shog cig ces sems mi bskyed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/
25b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin/ ngag dang / yid kyis yongs
25b4(mdo sde): su dag pa yin te/ ji ltar na/ lus kyi yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang lus kyi ngan du spyod pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ lus kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang
25b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ste/ de ltar na/ lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ ngag gis yongs
25b6(mdo sde): su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brdzun du smra ba
25b7(mdo sde): dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa ste/ de ltar ngag gis yongs su dag pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag yid kyi ngan du
26a1(mdo sde): spyod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log
26a2(mdo sde): par lta ba'o/ /de ltar na/ yid kyi yongs su dag pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims can yin no/ /rigs
26a3(mdo sde): kyi bu| chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod
26a4(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ chos kyi bzod
26a5(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tha
26a6(mdo sde): dad med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs
26a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar
26b1(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag nang gi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
26b2(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa de dag bzod cing dang du len la yongs su yi mi chad de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji
26b3(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma las smos pa'am/ pha las smos pa'am/ nye du las smos pa'am/
26b4(mdo sde): mkhan po las smos pa'am/ slob dpon las smos pa'i tshig gi lan ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa pha rol las thos sam/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la mi
26b5(mdo sde): snyan par brjod pa thos na/ mi khro zhing gnod par mi sems la 'khon du mi 'dzin te/ de bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
26b6(mdo sde): phyi'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag mdo sde
26b7(mdo sde): zab mo zab mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa rgyud chad pa/ mtshams sbyor ba las rnam par grol ba bsdur med pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad thog ma nas zhi ba'o//
27a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /zhes bstan pa de dag thos kyang mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur te/ chos 'di
27a2(mdo sde): dag ma shes ma thos par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /snyam du sems te/ de'i phyir gang chos 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / sems
27a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sgom pa dang / yongs su klog pa dang / mos pa 'di ni/ chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar
27a4(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba'i bsam pa skyes sam/ gnod sems kyi bsam
27a5(mdo sde): pa skyes na/ 'di ltar khro ba 'di gang nas byung / gang du 'gag /gang las 'byung / ji ltar 'byung / ci'i don du 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/ des de ltar yongs su brtags na/ khro
27a6(mdo sde): ba'i skye ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang la skye ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ji ltar skye ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su
27a7(mdo sde): mi mthong / rkyen gang gis skye ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la kun nas ldang ba mi mnga' ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
27b1(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems
27b2(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ nyin par bzod la mtshan mo mi bzod pa'am/ mtshan mo bzod la nyin par mi bzod pa'am/ bdag gi yul na bzod la gzhan gyi yul na mi bzod pa'am/ gzhan gyi yul na bzod
27b3(mdo sde): la bdag gi yum na mi bzod pa'am/ bshes pa la bzod la mi bshes pa la mi bzod pa'am/ mi bshes pa la bzod la bshes pa la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/
27b4(mdo sde): dus thams cad du'ang bzod/ yul thams cad du'ang bzod/ thams cad la'ang bzod pa yin te/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
27b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha dang / ma dang / bla ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang /
27b6(mdo sde): nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams la bzod la/ gzhan la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ tha na gdol pa gzhon nu yan chad la'ang bzod de/ de ltar na/ byang chub
27b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
28a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' don gyi phyir bzod pa ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/ phan thogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis ma yin no/ /ngo tsha
28a2(mdo sde): bas bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rtag par yang bzod pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa
28a3(mdo sde): yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nam de la khro ba skyed pa'i rkyen gang gis
28a4(mdo sde): zil gyis non na/ khu tshur gyis 'tshog par 'gyur ba'am/ thal mos 'tshog par 'gyur ba'am/ dbyig pas rdeg par 'gyur ba'am/ mtshon gyis 'debs par 'gyur ba'am/
28a5(mdo sde): mi gtsigs pa'i tshig gis ngan du brjod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen ma byung gi bar du bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gal te la la zhig gis brdegs sam/
28a6(mdo sde): bsdigs sam/ spyos sam/ brgyad na/ de la byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bdag nyid kyis las 'di dag byas te bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /mas ma byas/
28a7(mdo sde): phas ma byas/ nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/ las 'di dag bdag nyid kyis byas pas/ de'i phyir bdag nyid la rnam par smin par
28b1(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nang gi
28b2(mdo sde): sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems gzhag par bya'o/ /de de
28b3(mdo sde): ltar ma log par rtog pas de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis rnam par dkrugs kyang bzod/ rnam par ma dkrugs kyang bzod de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug
28b4(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po'am/ blon po
28b5(mdo sde): chen po phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur la/ de la sems can gzhan de dag gi mi snyan par brjod kyang rung / kyal
28b6(mdo sde): kyang rung / gtses kyang rung ste/ mi khro zhing gnod sems su mi byed la/ bdag por gyur pa lta bur mi ston gyi/ gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni/ bdag nyid kyis bzung
28b7(mdo sde): ba ste| sems can 'di dag ni/ bdag nyid kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya ba yin la/ de ltar yongs su bsrung ba na brlag par bya ba ni/ bdag gi mi cha'o/ /zhes de de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye
29a1(mdo sde): bar bzhag ste bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /
29a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa las sgrol ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis de
29a3(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
29a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas te 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du byid ba'i sems can rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o/ /zhes seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags kyi/ de ltar na/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /
29a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dul ba dang zhi ba la rab tu bkod par brtson pa la bdag nyid khro ba mang ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bzod
29a6(mdo sde): pa mang ba dang / phog snya byed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman pa thur ma can zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang rab rib
29a7(mdo sde): kyis ldongs par gyur nas sman pa des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi rab rib kyi skyon bsal bar bya'o/ /zhes bsam la/ de nas sman pa de bdag nyid kyang ldongs
29b1(mdo sde): par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ ji ga sman pa des sems can de dag gi rab rib kyi skyon thams cad bsal bar nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma lags
29b2(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar 'jig rten mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs pa'i gti mug gi dri ma
29b3(mdo sde): shes rab kyi mig gis bsal bar 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis ldongs na bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems te/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems
29b4(mdo sde): mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa las sgrol bar byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
29b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
29b6(mdo sde): dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mtha'
29b7(mdo sde): gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can
30a1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams
30a2(mdo sde): yin| snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
30a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems can phyi khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs
30a4(mdo sde): dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ de de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams shing
30a5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i drung du bdud sdig can 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' de la rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus thong zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas kyang sems can gyi
30a6(mdo sde): khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / mngon
30a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'di lta bu brtsams te/ de ni/ rdzun dang 'drid pa'i chos can/ byis pa'i skye bo
30b1(mdo sde): slu ba'o| |rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni/ sems can brtson 'grus brtsams pa gcig gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma
30b2(mdo sde): shes so| |rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni/ sems can bye ba du ma nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ngas shes kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de'i
30b3(mdo sde): phyir brtson 'grus zlog cig / don med par nyon mongs pa la sten pa por gyur ta re zhes dad pa dang bral bar byed cing kyal ka byed kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam dud sems te/ kye
30b4(mdo sde): ma 'di ni/ bdud sdig can bdag la kyal ka byed par 'dod do snyam ste/ des de ltar shes nas bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du/ sdig can/ khyod bya ba nyung du gyis shig /'jig rten gyi
30b5(mdo sde): bsko sham gyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ sdig can/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las bdag gir bya ba ni/ 'jig rten yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o/ /las kyi skye gnas pa'o/ /las
30b6(mdo sde): la rten pa'o/ /zhes gsungs te/ sdig can/ khyod kyang las bdag gir bya ba yin te/ las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ las kyi skye gnas pa/ las la rten pa yin gyi/ sdig can/ khyod gang nas
30b7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i lam nas song zhig / nga la kyal ka byas pas khyod yun ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o/ /bdud sdig can de'ang bdag gi sems ni/
31a1(mdo sde): sems kyi tshor bar rig nas yibs yibs te de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha
31a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis kyal ka byas te dad pa dang dbral bar byas kyang mi 'gyur/ mi 'dzum/ zhum par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can
31a3(mdo sde): yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus yun ring
31a4(mdo sde): po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de la grangs su'ang nye bar mi 'gro / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyu'i
31a5(mdo sde): bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta ci smos te/ de'i sems 'byung ba re re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
31a6(mdo sde): cad yongs su 'dzim cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spong ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrog pa'i brtson 'grus can
31a7(mdo sde): yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ha cang brtun ngas pa'am/ ha cang zhan pa'i brtson
31b1(mdo sde): 'grus mi rtsom ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ha cang brtun ngas pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ yab yab por 'gyur/ ha cang zhan pa ni/ le lor 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis
31b2(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom
31b3(mdo sde): ste| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang / 'od 'dom gang pa dang / mtshan
31b4(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes thogs pa med cing mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba khyu mchog de'ang bdag la'ang yod
31b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson
31b6(mdo sde): 'grus can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser ram/ nor bu rin po che chen po dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba ni/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ de ni/ a la la
31b7(mdo sde): 'bar ba'i gser ro/ /a la la 'bar ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba
32a1(mdo sde): yin no| |brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon de dag gang zhe na/ le lo ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/ /snyom las ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon
32a2(mdo sde): no| |zas la tshod mi shes pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/ /bdag mi shes pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang
32a3(mdo sde): skyon no| |'du 'dzi ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon te/ de dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang / brtson 'grus kyi skyon zhes bya'o/ /de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la med
32a4(mdo sde): pa yin te/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus de 'bar zhing dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byang ba yin no/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i
32a5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam thams cad du brtson
32a6(mdo sde): 'grus rtsom ste/ ci nas kyang lus skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sems skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar rtsom pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun du chud pa zhes bya ste/ de
32a7(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ de ltar rgyun du
32b1(mdo sde): chud pa'i brtson 'grus can de'i gang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam gyi bar du gcod pa gnod pa dang ldan pa de dag spangs pa yin/ gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa
32b2(mdo sde): dang mthun pa/ byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs dang mthun pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs byang chub tu 'brang ba de dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te/ de la mi dge ba'i sems skye ba
32b3(mdo sde): phra zhing chung ba 'ga' yang mi skye na/ che ba lta ci smos te/ de ni/ rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin
32b4(mdo sde): no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig
32b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig mnar med pa'i me'i phung po chen pos byur bur gang par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das pa na sems can gcig cig sdug
32b6(mdo sde): bsngal zhing skyabs med/ mgon med de/ gnas med/ rten med pa zhig yod na'ang sems can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir me'i phung po de la rkang gis 'bogs te 'jig rten gyi khams
32b7(mdo sde): de dag 'das nas sems can gcig po de dag thar par bya bar bdag spro na/ sdug bsngal phal pa lta ci zhig smos snyam ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nyan thos
33a1(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / mu stegs can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i
33a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du mir gyur pas ni/ byang
33a3(mdo sde): chub thob par dka' ste/ bdag gi brtson 'grus 'di ni/ chung shing zhan la bdag kyang le lo can te/ byang chub ni/ mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bskal pa mang po/ /bskal pa
33a4(mdo sde): brgya phrag mang po/ /bskal pa stong phrag mang po/ /bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang por sgrub dgos pas bdag ni/ de lta bu'i khur bkur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ byang
