33a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpas ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang / gang mngon
33a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di 'dra ba dang / lam 'di 'dra ba dang / brtson 'grus 'di 'dra bas
33a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs
33b1(mdo sde): bar gyur pa sha stag las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyi/ bdag kyang ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
33b2(mdo sde): 'gyur par sems can thams cad dang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar btsal lo 'bad do/ /
33b3(mdo sde): bdag sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa la ni/ sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang bla'i/ bdag la phan par brtson na mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ ma yin no snyam du sems
33b4(mdo sde): bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can
33b5(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na brtson 'grus de'i ro myang bar mi byed de/ brtson 'grus des gzhan la mi smod/ bdag la mi bstod de/ de 'di snyam du
33b6(mdo sde): shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag gi las la brtson pas gzhan la smod snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snyems pa med pa'i
33b7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus can yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan
34a1(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/ skyo ba
34a2(mdo sde): mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ mang du thos pa rnams yin/ ma log par gdams ngag sgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rjes su mthun
34a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/ dbang po rno ba rnams yin/ sems la mkhas pa rnams yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnams yin/ de la ma zhen pa rnams
34a4(mdo sde): yin no| / rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu
34a5(mdo sde): bsags shing tshe rabs tha dad pa dang de dag tu spyad pa legs par spyad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen
34a6(mdo sde): po lta bu'am/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu gang dang gang du skyes kyang khyim de'i mi dad pa yin te/ de skyes nas kyang
34a7(mdo sde): rgyu de dag dang / rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang
34b1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gam/ byang chub sems dpa' dag go /de skyes nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la goms pas 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/
34b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ nyam thag pa'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ na ba'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ mi gnas pa'o/ /kye ma skye rgu 'di ni/ yun ring po nas nad par gyur pa'o/ /kye ma skye
34b3(mdo sde): rgu 'di ni/ gti mug gis ldongs pa'o/ /de'ang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i phyir te/ de bas na/ 'jig rten gnas pa de lta bu la bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni/ bdag gi mi
34b4(mdo sde): cha'i| 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa
34b5(mdo sde): rnams ni/ gsal shing lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ mtshon shag ti lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ ral gri'i so lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ spu gri'i so lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/
34b6(mdo sde): sprul gyi mgo lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ rul pa'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ dri nga ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so snyam ste/ de de ltar skyo nas skra dang
34b7(mdo sde): kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig dag bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang / khong du ma chud pa
35a1(mdo sde): khong du chud par bya ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /de de'i rgyu/ de de'i rkyen de de'i gzhis kun rdzob kyi
35a2(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa thos pa 'dzin to/ /de gnyis ka la'ang mkhas pas gdams ngag yang dag par sgom mo/ /gdams ngag
35a3(mdo sde): ma log par sgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la 'jug ste/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag
35a4(mdo sde): pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting
35a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin to/ /des la ma khong du chud pas dbang po rno ba dang / dbang po gsal ba dang / de shes pa'i dbang po can yin no/ /de dbang po rno zhing dbang po gsal la de shes pa'i dbang
35a6(mdo sde): po can yin pas/ dben pa mang ba yin te/ de 'du ba thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo / /'du 'dzi thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo / /smra ba la dga' ba dang / 'dod
35a7(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / lha la rnam par rtog pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo| /shes kyi khe
35b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa yin te/ de sems la 'di snyam
35b2(mdo sde): du bdag gis sems 'di ci dge ba la spyod dam/ de ste mi dge ba'am/ 'on tam lung du ma bstan pa'am/ chos gang la spyod ces rnam par dpyod de/ gal te dge ba la spyod na de la sems
35b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / mos pa skyed do/ /dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no/ /'on te mi dge ba la spyod na de la skyo ba mang
35b4(mdo sde): ba dang / rtog pa mang ba yin te/ mi dge ba'i chos de dag spang ba la brtson pa yin no/ /mi dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug go /de
35b5(mdo sde): la 'dod chags rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang / 'bring po dang / chung du'o/ /de la 'dod chags chen po gang zhe na/ gang lus thams cad du khyab ste sems kun nas bzung zhing
35b6(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / gang gis de la gzhol zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems mi 'thob pa ste/ de la gzhol ba de la ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur te/
35b7(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa thams cad du thams cad med pa yin zhe na/ de gcig pu lkog tu song ste/ de nyid rjes su rnam par sems/ de nyid rjes su rnam par rtog cing / de nyid legs
36a1(mdo sde): par shin tu smon pa dang / de nyid la'ang yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na/ de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ 'dzem pa med pa yin zhe na/ de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen
36a2(mdo sde): de'i gzhis pha ma'am/ bla ma lta bu gzhan dag dang rtsod cing phyir zlog pa dang / rgol par byed cing des ngo mi tsha la yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na/ de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin te/ de
36a3(mdo sde): de'i rgyu| de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni/ 'dod chags chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dod chags 'bring po gang zhe na/ gang gis 'dod chags
36a4(mdo sde): rnams la sten par gyur na bya ba grub kyi bar du sten gyi/ bya ba grub nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems 'thob pa dang / 'gyod pa 'thob pa dang / sems la mi cha ba 'thob
36a5(mdo sde): pa ste| de ni/ 'dod chags 'bring po zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dod chags chung du gang zhe na/ gang gis 'dod pa rnams bsnyen par gyur kyang ma nams pa dang / byugs pa dang / lus kyis
36a6(mdo sde): reg pa tsam mam/ tshig tu smra ba tsam mam/ mthong ba tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba de ni/ 'dod chags chung du zhes bya'o/ /mdor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la chags pa'i
36a7(mdo sde): sems su gyur pa ste/ de ni/ 'dod chags zhes bya'o/ /de la zhe sdang gang zhe na/ zhe sdang yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang / 'bring po dang / chung du'o/ /de la zhe sdang
36b1(mdo sde): chen po gang zhe na/ zhe sdang gi rnam pa gang gis zhe sdang zhing rnga ma 'khrugs gtum par gyur nas mtshams med pa lnga las gang yang rung ba la la byed pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba gang byas pa la
36b2(mdo sde): mtshams med pa lnga bsdoms kyang grangs su'ang nye bar mi 'gro / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba de lta bu byed do/ /de de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis lus zhig nas sems
36b3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po dag tu skye zhing / gal te brgya lam na mir skye na'ang nag cing mig dmar la gtum zhing gnod sems mang bar 'gyur te/ de de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis yang sems can
36b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de ni/ zhe sdang chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la zhe sdang 'bring po gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur te sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas na myur ba myur ba/ skyen pa skyen
36b5(mdo sde): pa| la gor la gor du 'gyod cing de'i gnyen po la'ang sten pa ste/ de ni/ zhe sdang 'bring po zhes bya'o/ /de la zhe sdang chung du gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur nas tshig tsam dang / mi snyan pa
36b6(mdo sde): tsam dang / ngan du brjod pa tsam gyis mi dge ba'i las gsog pa ste/ de'ang de la brgyal bar 'ga' 'byung ste/ byung na'ang de'i skad cig/ yud tsam/ de'i thang gcig la gnyen po la sten pa
36b7(mdo sde): ste| de ni/ zhe sdang chung du zhes bya'o/ /de la gti mug gang zhe na/ gti mug kyang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang / 'bring po dang / chung du'o/ /gang de la gti mug chen po gang
37a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ gang ji skad du smos pa'i gnas de dag la nyes kyang dga' zhing mya ngan du mi byed/ smre sngags mi 'don/ 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de ni/ gti mug chen po
37a2(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /de la gti mug 'bring po gang zhe na/ gang gis mi dge ba'i las la la byas kyang la gor la gor du 'gyod cing / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi drung du 'chags shing
37a3(mdo sde): mi 'chab la/ de yon tan du'ang mi lta ba yin te/ 'di ni/ gti mug 'bring po zhes bya'o/ /de la gti mug chung du gang zhe na/ gang gis rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma yin pa/ bcas
37a4(mdo sde): pa'i kha na ma tho ba bslab pa kun spyad pa'i lam gnyis gsum las 'da' ba ste/ de ni/ gti mug chung du zhes bya'o/ /de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems phyir zlog pa la
37a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar sems la mkhas pa la/ gang 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa rnams la mos pa dang / 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa de lta bu med pa
37a6(mdo sde): yin te| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems la mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /'on te lung du ma bstan pa la spyod na/ de la dran pa dang ldan zhing nan tan du byed la/ de brtag pa la brtson pa
37a7(mdo sde): yin te/ de la ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa la spyod pa yin zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems phyi rol tu'ang mi rgyu/ nang du'ang mi rgyu/ dge ba la'ang mi spyod/ mi dge ba la'ang mi spyod/ lhag
37b1(mdo sde): mthong ba'ang mi spyod/ zhi gnas kyang mi 'dzin cing zhum la gnyid kyis non par gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu nyal nyal ba las sad pa mig gnyid kyis bsgribs pa'i sems mi
37b2(mdo sde): gsal ba de bzhin du de'i tshe sems la mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems gzengs bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhag pa la
37b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems la mkhas pa yin no/ /de de ltar sems la mkhas pa'i chos 'di dag ni/ sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /chos 'di dag ni/ rmi lam lta bu'o//
37b4(mdo sde): chos 'di dag ni/ dge ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni/ mi dge ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni/ 'byung ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni/ mi 'byung ba'o/ /zhes chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du
37b5(mdo sde): chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ sems la gnas pa/ sems las byung ba/ sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ sems shin tu bcil/ shin tu btul/ shin tu khong du chud par byas na/ chos
37b6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang shin tu bcil ba dang / shin tu btul ba dang / shin tu khong du chud par 'gyur te/ des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas/ de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis sems
37b7(mdo sde): zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ de sems nyid la sems 'dogs so/ /sems nyid kyis sems zhi bar byed do/ /sems nyid la sems rab tu bzhag go /de de ltar zhi ba la
38a1(mdo sde): brtson pas sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur te/ rtse gcig tu red nas mnyam par gzhog go /sems mnyam par bzhag pa la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
38a2(mdo sde): ba mngon du 'gyur te/ de yid dga' bar gyur nas 'dod pa las dben/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las
38a3(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed cing dga' ba dang / bde ba'i
38a4(mdo sde): ro'ang myang bar mi byed de/ mi rtag go snyam nas bsam gtan dang po las sems skyed do/ /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing chags pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas nang yongs
38a5(mdo sde): su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas
38a6(mdo sde): te gnas so/ /de dga' ba dang sdug bsngal ba yin par khong du chud par byed de/ sdug bsngal lo snyam nas btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ btang snyoms la gnas pas dran
38a7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa
38b1(mdo sde): de dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bsam gtan gsum pa gtong ngo snyam nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la sems gtong ste/ de bsam gtan
38b2(mdo sde): bzhi pa thob pas bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir ldog go / bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir ldog pas bde ba'ang spong / sdug bsngal ba'ang spong ste/ de bde ba'ang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs
38b3(mdo sde): shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te
38b4(mdo sde): gnas so/ /de bdag gi lus dang nam mkha'i lus su gcig tu mos par byed de/ de de ltar mos pas gzugs kyi 'du shes las thams cad du thams cad yang dag par 'das pa yin/
38b5(mdo sde): thogs pa'i 'du shes kyang nub pa yin/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs
38b6(mdo sde): kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
38b7(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das nas rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang
39a1(mdo sde): dag par 'das nas ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par
39a2(mdo sde): 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de'i gong na gang sems kyi mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu pa thams cad 'gags pa/ sgrib pa thams
39a3(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba 'di ni/ 'gog pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ste/ de ni/ shes par bya'o snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug gi /de la mngon par dga' ba'i rten gyi gnas
39a4(mdo sde): mi skyed do/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms
39a5(mdo sde): pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa
39a6(mdo sde): dang / bla dang / 'og dang / gra'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs
39a7(mdo sde): pa| rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga'
39b1(mdo sde): ba dang btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs
39b2(mdo sde): gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang / 'og dang /
39b3(mdo sde): gra'i 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/
39b4(mdo sde): mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do/ /de la'ang ma zhen pa yin te/ gong du'ang byang chub kyi tshogs
39b5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos rnams yongs su tshol lo/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /
39b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las kyi
39b7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'dus byas la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos
40a1(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ bdud kyi las yongs su spangs pa la mkhas pa rnams
40a2(mdo sde): yin| ma log pa'i shes rab can rnams yin/ mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la
40a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gzugs la rtog /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
40a4(mdo sde): par shes pa rnams la rtog ste/ de gzugs la rtog pa na gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs/ 'gag pa mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
40a5(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs/ 'gog pa mi dmigs so/ /de'ang don dam par yin gyi tha snyad kyi
40a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin ni/ ma yin te/ des don dam pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i rang bzhin de gnyis ka'ang brjod pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs
40a7(mdo sde): te| de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed de/ mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ rigs
40b1(mdo sde): kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
40b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ gar mkhan gyi tshon dang 'dra ba/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu rang bzhin gyis stong la sems can 'di dag kyang sems can
40b3(mdo sde): ma yin no/ 'on kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas de dag de'i phyir la ma khong du chud pa mi 'thob bo/ /de dag ni/ 'di snyam du gal te bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog
40b4(mdo sde): gam/ skye bo'am/ gso ba'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu med na/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med par 'gyur ro snyam
40b5(mdo sde): du sems mod kyi/ sems can med du zin kyang las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ mngon no snyam ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems can de'ang med la/ ji ltar dge ba dang / mi
40b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang mngon te yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin
40b7(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes
41a1(mdo sde): rab kyis rtog par byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag mi gnas pa/ g.yo ba zil pa'i thigs pa lta bu/ ri bo'i 'bab chu lta bu yin
41a2(mdo sde): te| de la mkhas pa su zhig 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la zhen pa dang / chags par byed pa'am/ de dag med par gyur pas mya ngan du byed snyam nas de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis skye ba
41a3(mdo sde): dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa la sems gtong ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
41a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ ma rig pas ldongs pa/ 'khor ba la phyogs pa/
41a5(mdo sde): srid pa'i zhags pas bcings pa ste/ len pa nye bar len to/ /de len pa'i rgyus dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las mngon
41a6(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa dang ldan pas srid par yang mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te/ de'i rgyu las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba yod pas rga bar 'gyur ro/ /rga ba'i chos can ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur
41a7(mdo sde): ro| |'chi ba las mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rgyun chags pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sdug bsngal gyi phung
41b1(mdo sde): po chen po 'ba' zhig po de zo chun rgyud mo'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyud du 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta
41b2(mdo sde): ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di
41b3(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ ma rig pa med par gyur pas 'du byed la zhen par mi 'gyur/ 'du byed la zhen pa med par gyur pas rnam par shes par mi 'gyur/ rnam par
41b4(mdo sde): shes pa med par gyur pas ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sred pa med par gyur pas len pa mi 'byung ste/ len pa
41b5(mdo sde): med pas srid par yang mtshams sbyor ba med par 'gyur/ srid par yang mtshams sbyor ba med par gyur pas/ skye bar mi 'gyur/ skye ba med par gyur pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre
41b6(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba
41b7(mdo sde): bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la
42a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ chos 'dis ni/ rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong bar
42a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni/ lan gcig phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba chad pa'ang mtshams sbyor ba med pa/ mya ngan las
42a3(mdo sde): 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /chos 'dis ni/ rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu gcig pu spyod par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang
42a4(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par byed de/ chos 'di dag mngon du mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gyi khams bdag gis bzung bdag
42a5(mdo sde): gis seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags te sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa thams cad sgrol lo/ /zhes dam bcas la/ gcig pu 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung
42a6(mdo sde): ba ni| bdag gi mi che'o snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen
42a7(mdo sde): po la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la'ang slob la slob pa'ang mi dmigs/ bslab pa'i lam yang mi dmigs so/ /gang slob pa de'ang
42b1(mdo sde): mi dmigs so/ /de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis chad par lta bar mi ltung ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
42b2(mdo sde): bdud kyi las spong ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ mi cha ba'i yul la gnas pa dang / 'jig
42b3(mdo sde): rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig la rten cing sgom pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro la ched cher 'dzin pa thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ngo / /nye ba'i nyon
42b4(mdo sde): mongs pa gzhan gang byang chub kyi lam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong zhing de dag gi gnyen po la'ang sten to/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
42b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi las yongs su spang ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag
42b6(mdo sde): dang / gsang tshig dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad la shes rab gtong ste/ de'ang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa
42b7(mdo sde): dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir te/ de la yon tan du blta ba'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /gzhan du na de 'di
43a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ gsung rab 'di ni/ dam pa ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'o snyam nas de de la yon tan du lta bas mu stegs can
43a2(mdo sde): gzhan gyi lta ba can du mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes
43a3(mdo sde): rab can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ skye rgu'i dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa/
43a4(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par gang de dang shes rab mnyam pa de lta
43a5(mdo sde): bu'i sems can sems can gyi ris la med de/ de ni/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ skye rgu'i dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa/ lha dang /
43a6(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na shes rab kyi bye brag gis zil gyis mnan pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin no/ /rigs
43a7(mdo sde): kyi bu| chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs
43b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ yul las
43b2(mdo sde): rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/
43b3(mdo sde): sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs mkhas pa nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ len pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/
43b4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i thabs
43b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag
43b6(mdo sde): me tog gi rnam pa'am/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa/ yongs su bzung ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
43b7(mdo sde): 'bul lo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de gang 'di dag bdug pa'i shing ngam/ spos kyi shing ngam/ rin po che'i shing ngam/
44a1(mdo sde): dpag bsam gyi shing ngam/ me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
44a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de mdo sde rnams las
44a3(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba gang 'di dag rgya chen po rgya che ba dag nyan cing de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
44a4(mdo sde): la yongs su bsngo'o/ /gang phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i las rnams byed cing byang chub kyi tshogs rnams yongs su
44a5(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed pa de dag la snying thag pa nas rjes su yi rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
44a6(mdo sde): pa'i mchod rten nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos gsol na/ sems can thams cad kyi ngang tshul ngan pa'i dri nga ba bsal ba
44a7(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o/ /de phyag dar dang / zhal zhal byed na/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam mi sdug pa med par 'gyur
44b1(mdo sde): pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o/ /de me tog gi gdugs gsol na/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med par
44b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzud do snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de phyir 'byung
44b3(mdo sde): na| 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ra nas 'don to snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de gnas khang gi sgo 'byed na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis bde
44b4(mdo sde): 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de sgo gcod na/ 'di ltar ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo rnams gcad do snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de 'dug na/ 'di ltar sems
44b5(mdo sde): can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la dgod do snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de glo g.yas pas nyal na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pas yongs
44b6(mdo sde): su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de de nas ldang na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba rnams las bslang ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /
44b7(mdo sde): de lus kyi ched la 'gro na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de der 'dug na/ 'di ltar sems can thams
45a1(mdo sde): cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de bkru bshal byed na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon
45a2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkru'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de lag pa bsnyal na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba rnams bsal lo snyam du sems
45a3(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /de rkang pa 'khru na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de so shing za na/ 'di ltar sems
45a4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar yongs su bsngo'o/ /
45a5(mdo sde): de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar shog cig snyam du sems bskyed de/ rigs
45a6(mdo sde): kyi bu| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/
45a7(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa'i mu stegs can gyi gnas pa de dang de dag tu 'phrul pa dag
45b1(mdo sde): mngon par sprul te/ de sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di rnams nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas bdag gis
45b2(mdo sde): slar slob dpon gyi tshul gyis gdul bar mi nus pas slob mar khas blang ngo snyam ste/ de dag gi khrod du rab tu 'byung ngo / /de rab tu byung nas ji ltar spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang / mang du thos pa
45b3(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa dman tshegs kyis kyang mu stegs can gzhan de dag zil gyis gnon pa de lta de lta bur rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /de dag gi nang na slob dpon dang bla ma lta
45b4(mdo sde): bur bkur bar 'gyur/ tshig gzung zhing ngag mi gcog par 'gyur te/ de kye sems can de dag nye bar gyur pa'o snyam du shes nas grogs po dag/ 'di ni/ skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang
45b5(mdo sde): bral ba dang / 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam ma yin no/ /zhes mu stegs can de dag gi ma legs pa brjod par 'gyur te/ des mu stegs can gzhan de dag gnas de rnams las bslang nas
45b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'god do/ /de phyi rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag gi gan du tshangs par spyod pa spyod do/ /de tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing chos de thob par
45b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir spyod cing rtsol lo/ /'bad do/ /rtsol zhing 'bad pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub ste/ ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan
46a1(mdo sde): pa gzhan de dag pas ches mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / ches 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang / slob dpon gyi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / mkhas par bkur bar
46a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub bo/ /des sems can de rnams yongs su smin pa'i dus dang / tshod shes nas grogs po dag/ lam 'di ni/ skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog
46a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur pa'i lam ma yin no/ /zhes bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi ma legs pa brjod pa yin te/ des sems can de dag gnas de las
46a4(mdo sde): bslang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'god de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/
46a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang rab tu 'dod chags can rab tu 'dod chags
46a6(mdo sde): mang pa'i sems can rnams mthong na/ des de dag gdul ba'i thabs gzhan med do snyam nas des de dag gi drung du bud med sprul pa bzang mo blta na sdug pa bud med thams cad
46a7(mdo sde): kyi mchog dag sprul te/ sems can de rnams de dag la rab tu chags par rig nas sprul pa'i bud med de ma la de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed du 'jug go /de'ang skad cig de nyid dang /
46b1(mdo sde): yud tsam de nyid dang / thang gcig de nyid la rul cing dri nga ba dang 'jigs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de mthong nas dngangs skrag skyo bar red de/ bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i dring ba'i nang
46b2(mdo sde): nas gnag thar par byed pa su zhig yod ces nyam thag par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ de byang chub gsum las gang yang rung ba'i byang
46b3(mdo sde): chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can de dag la chos ston te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
46b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can su mtshams med pa'i las byed pa'am/ mi dge ba'i las byed pa
46b5(mdo sde): mthong na/ de'i gan du song ste kye skyes bu/ ci'i phyir yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas zhes de skad zer ro/ /des kyang smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag gis mtshams med pa'i las byas pas
46b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir bdag la yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur grang zhes yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas so/ /de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa'
46b7(mdo sde): sdom pa 'dzin du 'jug go / nyes pa'ang 'chags su 'jug go /de la chos bstan pa zab mo zab mo'ang byed de/ de ste 'gyod pa mi gtong na/ de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma
47a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ sems kun bsten pas yang dag par yid ches pa skyed do/ /de nas sems can de yang dag par yid ches pa skyes nas byang
47a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de la dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / rangs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / rangs pa rnyed pas de chos bstan du rung bar 'gyur/ byang chub
47a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag dang mthun pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de'i mdun du 'di lta ste/ pha mar sprul pa mngon par sprul te 'di skad zer ro/ /kye skyes bu/
47a4(mdo sde): khyod ltos la 'gyod pa chod cig /nga'ang khyod kyi grogs te/ las 'di lta bus su'ang shin tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ don thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba med
47a5(mdo sde): do| |las de ye shes kyis bsal du mi nus pa'ang ma yin no/ /zhes de skad smras nas pha ma srog dang phral lo/ /srog dang phral nas kyang rdzu 'phrul de ston to/ /de nas sems can de 'di
47a6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kyang pha ma srog dang phral na/ bdag 'dra ba lta ci zhig smos snyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'ang de'i tshe sems can de la ci nas kyang
47a7(mdo sde): de'i las de sbrang ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i chos ston par byed do/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas
47b1(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas sems can gang chos bstan par rung zhing nus pa
47b2(mdo sde): dag mthong la/ de dag kyang shin tu mi dge ba'i las byed par gyur na/ de dag gdul ba'i thabs su byang chub sems dpas 'phrul pa dag mngon par sprul te/ de la sems can gang rnams
47b3(mdo sde): rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la rgyal por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do/ /sems can gang rnams blon po chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur pa de dag la blon po chen por sprul pa
47b4(mdo sde): mngon par sprul par byed do/ /sems can gang rnams bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul mis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang /
47b5(mdo sde): yul mir sprul pa dang / sems can gang rnams lhas 'dul ba de dag la lhar sprul pa dang / gang lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba de dag la lag na rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do/ /sems
47b6(mdo sde): can gang rnams 'jigs pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa ston/ sems can gang rnams brdegs pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bcad pa dang / bcing bas gdul ba de dag
47b7(mdo sde): ba de 'dra bar ston/ sems can gang rnams des pas 'dul ba de dag la des pas 'dul/ sems can gang rnams mtshams med pa byed 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la
48a1(mdo sde): brgyad par 'dod pa de dag thabs sna tshogs kyis bzlog cing zil gyis gnon par byed/ phyogs gzhan du'ang bskor bar byed do/ /mtshams med par 'gyur
48a2(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po sbas te/ de 'dra bar de'i mdun du sprul pa ston to/ /yang na sems can dmyal ba ston to/ /mngon par shes pa ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe'i mtshan ma shes pa ni/
48a3(mdo sde): byed 'dod pa dang / gsod 'dod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas snying rje chen po'i sems skyes te/ de yang 'di snyam du/ kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni/ phung bar 'dod pa'o/ /kye
48a4(mdo sde): ma sems can 'di rnams ni/ brlag par 'dod pa'o snyam du sems shing / de dag des lag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthong nas mi dga' ba'i sems chen po bskyed
48a5(mdo sde): de| de'ang 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu bzhag pa'i bar
48a6(mdo sde): du mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal bskur bar bzod na/ sems can 'di rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las byas te mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'dod pa thabs gzhan
48a7(mdo sde): gyis ni| bzlog par mi nus te/ sems can de rnams tshe'ang thung / dad pa'ang med pa dag cig la yul gzhan du bskor ba'am/ zil gyis mnan par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni/ bdag la
48b1(mdo sde): med na| sems can 'di rnams mi dge ba'i lus zhig nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar mi 'gyur grang / de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag nas las bdag
48b2(mdo sde): gir bya ba dang 'dra bar byas nas sems can de rnams la byams pas khyab par byas te/ thabs gzhan gyis mi nus nas chad pa rab kyis 'chos te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can
48b3(mdo sde): la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
48b4(mdo sde): can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par mi lcogs mi nus te/ zas dang gos lhur 'dzin cing de kho nas chog par rtsi ba mthong na/ de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yi ge
48b5(mdo sde): dang / gtsug lag dang / rgya dang / grangs dang / shod thabs la sogs pa'i las dge ba dang ldan pa dag ston te/ mi dge ba dang ldan pa mi ston to/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
48b6(mdo sde): can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phung po ri rab
48b7(mdo sde): tsam thob na'ang len te/ dngos po ngan pa zhig thob na'ang len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems te/ sems can 'di dag ni/ ser sna can/ brkam pa/ 'dod pas 'khol ba/ 'jungs pa
49a1(mdo sde): yin te| de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis chu'i phung po chen pos non pa bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung nub byed pa de dag la de ni/ yun ring por don
49a2(mdo sde): dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de blangs nas bdag gir mi byed/ chags pa'i sems mi bskyed de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du sangs rgyas dang /
49a3(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun dag la bya ba byed do/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la'ang phan par byed do/ /sbyin pa'i bdag po de'ang gzengs bstod pa dang / shin tu dga' bar byed de/
49a4(mdo sde): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
49a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lcogs shing nus pa zhig la/ de'ang nyan thos dang / rang
49a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob par rtsol zhing 'bad de brtson 'grus rtsom pa mthong na/ de gnas de nas bslang ste tha na 'khor dbye ba'ang byas nas theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de ltar na/
49a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang /
49b1(mdo sde): shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems bskyed du 'jug /byang chub kyi
49b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba/ tshul khrims tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag ni/ brtson 'grus la 'jog /sems can gang rnams bslab ba kun spyod pa
49b3(mdo sde): phra mo las 'gal ba dag de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis sems can kun khebs shing 'khod de/ dga' mgu rangs pa'ang mi rnyed pa de dag la de ci nas kyang gnas de nas ldang ba de lta de lta bur
49b4(mdo sde): chos ston par byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyis
49b5(mdo sde): bu| ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar
49b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ rnyed pa chung yang chos rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa yin/ de gcig pu lkog tu song ste rab tu dben par gnas nas de 'di ltar sems te/ ma la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
49b7(mdo sde): la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba bsam mo snyam nas de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems te/ de ltar de'i sems pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa
50a1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ de la gang mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba mngon par
50a2(mdo sde): byed pa 'di ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems skye ba 'di ni/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
50a3(mdo sde): phyin pa'o/ /mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sems mngon par mos shing shin tu dga' ba 'di ni/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba de la
50a4(mdo sde): gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems skye ba 'di ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba de nyid la gang nye bar rtog pa 'di ni/ de'i
50a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang
50a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
50a7(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dman
50b1(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par
50b2(mdo sde): bsngags pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mtha' yas pa'i smon
50b3(mdo sde): lam pa rnams yin/ mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
50b4(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde ba 'dod cing smon lam mi 'debs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub
50b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ khams gsum las skyo ba dang /
50b6(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par smon lam mi 'debs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
50b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa ma lus par de thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das
51a1(mdo sde): nas bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
51a2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la
51a3(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste mthar gyis byang chub
51a4(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa spyod du btsud nas byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol pa gdab bo/ /yongs su mya ngan las
51a5(mdo sde): 'da' ba rnams kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par
51a6(mdo sde): bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'di ltar
51a7(mdo sde): bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ci nas kyang bdud kyi sgra'am/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o/ /
51b1(mdo sde): des smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog
51b2(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gzhan gyi dring la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam mi 'debs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bdag nyid
51b3(mdo sde): kyis shes rab kyis dpyad de/ sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal ba la bltas nas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
51b4(mdo sde): dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
51b5(mdo sde): kyi tshogs rnams kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig bzung nas nyi tshe ba'i smon lam mi 'debs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
51b6(mdo sde): btsugs te sems mi skyo bar byas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang / gang dag dka' ba spyod pa
51b7(mdo sde): la gnas pa dang / gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag rnams la snying
52a1(mdo sde): thag pa nas bsam ste/ de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed pa de dag la mos par byed do/ /mos par gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo / /rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa
52a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon
52a3(mdo sde): lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin yang chos zab mo zab mo rnams thos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab mo thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
52a4(mdo sde): par rol pa zab mo thos pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo thos kyang mi skrag/ rab tu mi skrag /shin tu mi skrag par mi byed do/ /de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mtha'
52a5(mdo sde): yas| sangs rgyas kyi yul kyang mtha' yas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'ang mtha' yas te/ de ni/ bdag 'dra bas shes par mi
52a6(mdo sde): nus kyi| sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so snyam du sems te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
52a7(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu rgod gdul dka' bar rig ste/ de rnams kyis yi chad nas 'di lta bu'i dmu rgod 'di lta bur
52b1(mdo sde): gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis chog go/ zhes te/ de'i phyir yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur te gang na sems can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten
52b2(mdo sde): gyi khams yongs su dag par smon lam mi 'debs so/ /sems can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar yang mi 'gyur
52b3(mdo sde): te| de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gang rnams ngan pa/ brtson 'grus chung ba/ blun po glen pa/ lug ltar lkug pa'i
52b4(mdo sde): rang bzhin can/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa de las bsnyigs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
52b5(mdo sde): kyis spangs par gyur pa yod pa de dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/ bdag gis de dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug tu bcug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
52b6(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems pa'i sems bskyed pa re re la'ang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo'o//
52b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags pa gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon
53a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
53a2(mdo sde): legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang / bla na med pa
53a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / yang de las 'das par smon lam mi 'debs pa 'di ni/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam
53a4(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mar ram/ 'bru mar gyi snod kha da chad du gang ste/ lhag par rdul phra rab tsam gyi thigs pa'ang mi shong na/ de'i phyir e ma'o snod gang ba/ e
53a5(mdo sde): ma'o snod shin tu gang ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la smon lam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir smon
53a6(mdo sde): lam ma rdzogs pa rdul phra rab tsam yang med do/ /de bas na/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
53a7(mdo sde): dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
53b1(mdo sde): lta ste| zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams
53b2(mdo sde): yin| shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dbang gi
53b3(mdo sde): stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i phyin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
53b4(mdo sde): bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs
53b5(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil gyis mi non pa yin te/ de ltar na/ zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub
53b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs la gang stobs kyis thub pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na
53b7(mdo sde): med de| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/
54a1(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpas ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de/ de ltar na/
54a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
54a3(mdo sde): sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ma mthong ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa dang / khong du ma chud
54a4(mdo sde): pa de dag med de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa
54a5(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin/ lta ba nyams pa ma yin/ cho ga nyams pa ma yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems
54a6(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
54a7(mdo sde): dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul
54b1(mdo sde): gyi yul thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa mchog gis zil gyis gnon to/ /de 'dod na dzam+bu'i gling skra nyag ma gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go /de bzhin
54b2(mdo sde): du gling bzhi pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no/ /de 'dod na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
54b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog go / de bzhin du gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu
54b4(mdo sde): dang / lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang / bri bar
54b5(mdo sde): yang mi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan tshun du 'dres par mi 'gyur/ sems can de rnams la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rdzu
54b6(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong
54b7(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob bo/ /de 'dod na brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rin po che rnam pa sna
55a1(mdo sde): tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byin gyis rlob ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
55a2(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
55a3(mdo sde): ji snyed cig don tha dad pa dang / tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa dang / brjod pa tha dad pa dang / tshul tha dad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dpas skad cig yud tsam thang gcig
55a4(mdo sde): gcig la thams cad 'dzin par byed/ khong du chud par byed/ sgom par byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang
55a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
55a6(mdo sde): ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang rnam par 'khrug par byed pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na/ byang
55a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs
55b1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gyi ris na ma mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de
55b2(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa
55b3(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes
55b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod
55b5(mdo sde): yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'phrog pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can
55b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye
55b7(mdo sde): shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la
56a1(mdo sde): bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung po rnams skye ba yang dag par mthong / 'jig pa dang / 'gog
56a2(mdo sde): pa'ang yang dag par mthong ngo / /des phung po skye ba rnams snying po med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / gsog tu yang dag par mthong / phung po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong
56a3(mdo sde): ste| de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag ni/ bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gso ba med pa/ gang zag med pa yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo bdag tu 'dzin
56a4(mdo sde): pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag ni/ 'di ltar bdag cag gi phung po rnams bdag go /bdag cag gi phung po rnams la bdag yod do/ /bdag cag gi bdag la phung po rnams yod
56a5(mdo sde): do| |bdag cag gi bdag ni/ phung po can no snyam ste/ de dag bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas de kho na nyid khong du mi chud do/ /de kho na nyid khong du mi chud pas mgal me'i 'khor
56a6(mdo sde): lo ltar 'khor bar 'khyams mo snyam du sems shing / de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
56a7(mdo sde): zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
56b1(mdo sde): sems dpas chos la sgro 'dogs pa dang / chos la skur pa'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'di snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brtags pa'i ming gdags te/
56b2(mdo sde): chos de'ang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ yi ge de dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi/ 'di ni/ ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam du bya'i/ 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /glo bur du byung ba'i
56b3(mdo sde): chos de'ang thams cad du thams cad med pa ma yin te/ gzhan gyi rkyen dang / gzhan gyi rkyen la sdod pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni/
56b4(mdo sde): yod do| |zhes de thams cad byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
56b5(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba'i ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing
56b6(mdo sde): skad cig gnyis pa la mi 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni/ skad cig thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
56b7(mdo sde): nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
57a1(mdo sde): sems dpas nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
57a2(mdo sde): rnams kyang rab tu shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes so/ /des ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de'ang rab
57a3(mdo sde): tu shes| ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la rang sangs rgyas spyod pa de'ang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la byang chub
57a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' spyod pa de'ang rab tu shes/ des ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs pas spyod pa de'ang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs
57a5(mdo sde): pas skabs phye na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rab tu shes kyi/ rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis ni/ ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams ni/ rnam
57a6(mdo sde): par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang
57a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ rang sangs
57b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/ sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ de
57b2(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrog pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la
57b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni/ mu stegs can thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrog pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub
57b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi 'phrog pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
57b5(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yongs su dag cing rnyog pa med pas sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/ des de na sems can la la byang chub tu sems
57b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la sa
57b7(mdo sde): dang po la gnas pa dag dang / la la sa bcu'i bar la gnas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi
58a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dag dang / la la bya ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
58a2(mdo sde): dag dang / la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la bde 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo / /de ltar na/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par
58a3(mdo sde): lta ste| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis
58a4(mdo sde): grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'am/ 'greng ba'am/ 'dug pa'am/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba na lhun gyis grub cing ye shes 'byung
58a5(mdo sde): ste| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gnyid kyis log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rdub pa dag lhun gyis 'grub cing 'byung ngo / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de'ang de bzhin du blta'o/ /
58a6(mdo sde): ye shes de'ang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
58a7(mdo sde): dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan
58b1(mdo sde): nyid gcig par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du'ang rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su btags pa'i mtshan nyid du'ang rab tu
58b2(mdo sde): shes te| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das
58b3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/
58b4(mdo sde): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum
58b5(mdo sde): tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po gsum pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/
58b6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yangs shing tshad med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin/ gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin /chos
58b7(mdo sde): kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin/ rin po che'i snod du gyur pa rnams
59a1(mdo sde): yin| rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/ mi sgul ba rnams yin/ mi dngang ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
59a2(mdo sde): yangs shing tshad med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po ni/ thams cad du yangs shing tshad med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ bsod
59a3(mdo sde): nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu yangs shing tshad med pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
59a4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po ni/ 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar
59a5(mdo sde): gyur pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la sogs pa byang chub kyi
59a6(mdo sde): tshogs rnams dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
59a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ sa chen
59b1(mdo sde): po ni| gnod pas kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur/ phan pas kyang chags par mi 'gyur te/ de la gnyis su 'du shes pa'ang mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag
59b2(mdo sde): gis khong khro bar mi 'gyur/ phan pa dag gis kyang chags par mi 'gyur te/ de ni/ sems can de dag la chags pa dang / khong khro ba'ang mi skyed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnod
59b3(mdo sde): pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po ni/ sprin chen
59b4(mdo sde): po las 'bab pa'i chu klung chen po kun zed de/ bzod cing kun 'dzin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa chen po rang
59b5(mdo sde): tu phab pa kun zed cing bzod la 'dzin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas
59b6(mdo sde): su gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po ni/ sems can thams cad 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
59b7(mdo sde): yang sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa
60a1(mdo sde): yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa bon thams cad ni/ sa
60a2(mdo sde): chen po'i gzhir gyur pa las skye'o/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzhir gyur pa las skye ste/ de ltar na/
60a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
60a4(mdo sde): na| sa chen po ni/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/ sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna
60a5(mdo sde): tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin no/ /ji
60a6(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi chen po gang dag nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar 'gyur ba dag kyang sa
60a7(mdo sde): chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang ngo / /de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rtsi chen po rnams kyang byang chub
60b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi sgrul ba yin zhe na/
60b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po ni/ 'di ltar sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yin no/ /de bzhin
60b3(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyi nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi sgul ba
60b4(mdo sde): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dngang ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po ni/ glang po che'i rgyal po dang / ri dwags kyi rgyal po rnam pa
60b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag / rab tu mi skrag/ shin tu mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyi sgra thos na mi
60b6(mdo sde): skrag / rab tu mi skrag /shin tu mi skrag /skrag par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dngang ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
60b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta
61a1(mdo sde): ste| dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/ dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin/ dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa'i gsher ba can rnams
61a2(mdo sde): yin| nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud thams cad srul ba rnams yin/ dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams
61a3(mdo sde): yin| 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ mtho dma' 'gengs pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
61a4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni/ gzhol bar 'gro ba
61a5(mdo sde): dang / gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge
61a6(mdo sde): ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni/ rtswa dang / shing gel pa
61a7(mdo sde): dang / rtsi dang / nags tshal thams cad skyed de/ skyes pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi phyogs
61b1(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed do/ /skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur gyi bar du phyir zhing rgyas par byed do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag
61b2(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin no/ /
61b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis gsher ba can yin te/ gzhan
61b4(mdo sde): yang gsher bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyis dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/ sems can gzhan yang dga' ba dang / dad
61b5(mdo sde): pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can du byed do/ /de la dga' ba ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o/ /dad pa ni/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la brten pa'o/ /rangs pa ni/
61b6(mdo sde): gang sems dag pa ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams
61b7(mdo sde): cad srul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni/ shing gi rnam pa dang / rtswa'i rnam pa'i rtsa ba dag gi rgyun thams cad srul lo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sgom
62a1(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/ ji ltar na/ nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di dag gi ming yang mi shes pa
62a2(mdo sde): dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i bag chags kyang med par 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba yin
62a3(mdo sde): no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni/ rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal lo/ /
62a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba yin no/ de la bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bral bas na/ dang ba'o/ /'dod
62a5(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral bas na/ rnyog pa med pa'o/ /dbang po rab tu dang bas na/ gsal ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal
62a6(mdo sde): ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni/ sa chen po dpyid kyi tsha bas
62a7(mdo sde): gdungs pa dang / de las gzhan yang sems can rnams dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs
62b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /ji ltar
62b2(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni/ skom pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi skom pa rnam par zlog go /de
62b3(mdo sde): b zhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la sred pas nyen pa'i sems can nyen par gyur pa dag la gang gis sems can de dag gi yul la sred pa zlog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
62b4(mdo sde): kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred par zlog par byed do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin zhe na/
62b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i 'jings ni/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa'ang 'di lta ste/ bdud
62b6(mdo sde): thams cad dang / mu stegs can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
62b7(mdo sde): dpa' mtho dma' 'gengs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i klung ni/ so'i phyogs mtho dma' 'gengs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu'i
63a1(mdo sde): klung gis sems can gyi khams mtho dma' 'gengs te/ ji ltar na/ chus 'gengs pa ltar sems can la gnod pa byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
