63a2(mdo sde): gyi| sems can de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu klung 'bebs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtho dma' 'gengs pa yin no//
63a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chus ni/ sa'i phyogs skam zhing rdul 'thul
63a4(mdo sde): ba thams cad snum par byed cing / rdul de dag zhi bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsub pa rnams 'di lta ste/ shes rab la gnas pa'i
63a5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi chus sems snum par byed cing sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i
63a6(mdo sde): rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang
63a7(mdo sde): ldan na| byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad kyang sreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
63b1(mdo sde): rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad kyang skem par byed/ me'i phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ snang bar gyur pa rnams yin/ skrag par byed pa rnams
63b2(mdo sde): yin| dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa rnams yin/ mchod par bya ba rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la
63b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ce na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni/ phyag dar khung dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang /
63b4(mdo sde): rtsi dang / sdong po thams cad sreg go /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi
63b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
63b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni/ lo tog dang / rtsi dang / sdong bu'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /de bzhin
63b7(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'ang ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar
64a1(mdo sde): na| sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skem par byed ce na/ rigs
64a2(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni/ chu bran gyi 'dam thams cad skem par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis zag pa'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams
64a3(mdo sde): cad skem par byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skem par byed do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/
64a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sems can grang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba med par bya ba'i phyir me'i phung po byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs
64a5(mdo sde): pa'i grang ba'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad med par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyis rab tu dro bar byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' me'i
64a6(mdo sde): phung po dang 'dra ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gangs kyi rtse mo'am/ ri bin da'i rtse mo la me'i phung po
64a7(mdo sde): chen po 'bar na/ des dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed/ dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang / dpag tshad gsum kho ra khor yug tu'ang snang bar byed do/ /de
64b1(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi snang bas dpag tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong du'ang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar yang khyab par byed pa
64b2(mdo sde): nas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i bar du'ang khyab par byas nas sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed de/ ye shes kyi snang ba des mi shes pa'i
64b3(mdo sde): mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
64b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri dwags khro bo'am/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po khro bos me'i phung po chen po mthong na/ skrag/ rab tu skrag/ shin tu skrag par gyur cing / 'di lta ste/ me'i 'jigs pas
64b5(mdo sde): skrag pas gnas de ring ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar spong ngo / /de bzhin du bdud rnams sam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/ skrag/ rab tu skrag /
64b6(mdo sde): shin tu skrag par gyur cing / 'di lta ste/ gzi brjid chung pa'i phyir gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming yang mi thos na mthong ba lta smos kyang ci smos par ring ba bas kyang
64b7(mdo sde): shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongs su spong ngo / /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin zhe na/
65a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las me'i phung po chen po mthong ste/ de de logs su song ba dang / des de
65a2(mdo sde): na grong ngam/ rdzi'u brang mthong na/ de shugs phyin te rab tu dbugs phyin nas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i
65a3(mdo sde): 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na shugs phyin par 'gyur/ rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs
65a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du
65a5(mdo sde): gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa ste/ ji ltar na/ rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol
65a6(mdo sde): bu la'ang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/ ji ltar rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu
65a7(mdo sde): la'ang de bzhin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/ rigs
65b1(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me la ni/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ lha dang / mi dang /
65b2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston par 'du shes pas mchod de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/
65b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me stag chung du'ang tshig pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na mi brnyas pa yin no/ /de bzhin du mos pas spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthu
65b4(mdo sde): stobs ma rnyed pa theg pa chen po la las dang po pa'ang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brnyas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyin dang /
65b5(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
65b6(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa
65b7(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas med par spyod pa dang / spyod yul kun mu med
66a1(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa dang / chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa dang / 'gro ba
66a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las mthun par 'gyur ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rdub pa'i srog nye bar
66a3(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin pa dang / chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs
66a4(mdo sde): su 'god pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par
66a5(mdo sde): 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od
66a6(mdo sde): dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug gi ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi dkyil
66a7(mdo sde): ' khor na 'dul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i phyir
66b1(mdo sde): ro| |rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ thams cad du thogs pa med cing gnas med
66b2(mdo sde): rten med de/ gzugs med kyang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / ri rab dang / rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo / /de bzhin du byang
66b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas pa yin te/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mchod rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
66b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
66b5(mdo sde): pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi
66b6(mdo sde): khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / mig gi skye mched
66b7(mdo sde): dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang /
67a1(mdo sde): reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la mi gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams
67a2(mdo sde): dang / lha dang / mi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag tu 'gyur pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dag
67a3(mdo sde): tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la'ang gnas par mi byed de/ de
67a4(mdo sde): thams cad la mi gnas pas dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin nyid la sogs par rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mar ma gyur cing
67a5(mdo sde): dmigs pa med la rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'ang byed la/ phyogs bcu mtha'
67a6(mdo sde): yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i myur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du'ang rgyu la/ chos kyi lus kyis mi snang ba'ang yin zhing mi rtog /
67a7(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
67b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu mu med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag tu reg par byed de/ g.yob
67b2(mdo sde): cing rgyu'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang chos mu med pa dag kun rdzob dang / don dam par kun nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed/ rig par byed/ rnam par
67b3(mdo sde): 'god cing ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas dag tu yid
67b4(mdo sde): kyi mgyogs pa dang ldan zhing / phyogs bcu thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod yul bar gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul kun tu
67b5(mdo sde): mu med pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
67b6(mdo sde): bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ ri dang / khyim dang / nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag tu 'dud par byed/ rab tu rnyil bar byed/ rnam par 'jig par byed/ 'thor bar byed/ mi snang bar
67b7(mdo sde): byed do| |de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mos snyems pa rnams gzugs
68a1(mdo sde): dang / dar la bab pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / bzo dang / thos pa dang / yid gzhungs pa
68a2(mdo sde): dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang / dpal che ba'i dregs pas myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan gyis bdag bstod pa rnams la de dag khyad zhugs pa'i phun sum
68a3(mdo sde): tshogs pa bstan pa dang / chos bstan pas nga rgyal chom par byed cing dge ba dri ma med pa la sbyor bar byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems
68a4(mdo sde): pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sbrin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
68a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ phyogs bzhi nas sbrin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang / zab cing gsal la mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can/
68a6(mdo sde): glu rol sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grag pa/ glog gi phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig
68a7(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya dag kun nas yongs su khebs par byas te 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang / lo tog dang / sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir char gyi rgyun chen po rtag tu rgyun mi chad par
68b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'bebs pa'i sbrin chen po kun nas slong ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang lus sna tshogs kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i
68b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byed pa/ 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas ba'i glog gi phreng ba'i rgyun 'byung ba/ yang dag pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag
68b3(mdo sde): stong phrag drug cu pa sgrog pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyis yang dag par mtho ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nam mkha' khyab par byed pa dag gi 'jig
68b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas khebs par byas shing ngan song dang mi khom pa la sogs pa nas sems can rnams rnam par bslang ste rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang / dpe byad
68b5(mdo sde): bzang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar rnam par dag pa'ang byin gyis brlabs te/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang byin gyis brlabs nas
68b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa/ dga' ba dang bde ba mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i
68b7(mdo sde): lo tog dang / rtsi chen po dang / sdong po thams cad rnam par skyed pa dang / thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar
69a1(mdo sde): byed pa dang / rgud pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sbrin chen po
69a2(mdo sde): kun nas skyed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
69a3(mdo sde): dper na/ rlung mar dri zhi ma po'i char gyi rgyun gyi snying po can ldang na/ sems can rnams kyi gdung ba yongs su zhi bar byas shing lus shin tu sim pa dang / bsil bar byed do/ /de bzhin
69a4(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ngan 'gro dang / ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tshom dang /
69a5(mdo sde): phongs pa mi zad pa dang / yul la sred pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang bral zhing phrad pa dang / nad rnams bcil nas dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs pa'i gdung
69a6(mdo sde): bdag dam pa'i chos kyi char dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam dang / mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / bstan pa don yod pa
69a7(mdo sde): la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed cing nyon mongs pa med pa'i
69b1(mdo sde): sa la 'god pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las mthun par gyur pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rdub pa'i srog nye bar
69b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas mngon par
69b3(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bstabs pa'i chos dkar po'i rlung mar nye bar spyor ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pas kyang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur
69b4(mdo sde): ro| |rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / khor yug ri dag dang / khor yug
69b5(mdo sde): ri chen po rnams dang / gling chen po bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang / ri rab dang / ri rab chen
69b6(mdo sde): po dang / de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / gangs dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang dag dang / dzam+bu'i gling dag dang / gling chen po
69b7(mdo sde): bzhi dag dang / stong dag dang / stong gnyis pa dag dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dag dang / bkod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mngon par sgrub bo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
70a1(mdo sde): rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum tshogs pa nye bar sgrub bo/ /skyed do/ /yongs su gzhog go/ de la ji ltar
70a2(mdo sde): gangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /ji ltar gling chen po bzhi ba dang ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na ni/ nyan
70a3(mdo sde): thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /ji ltar stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /ji ltar stong
70a4(mdo sde): gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
70a5(mdo sde): khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar gtugs pa/ shin
70a6(mdo sde): tu rnam par dag par grags pa mchod pa la dmigs pa thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyis thams cad mngon du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams
70a7(mdo sde): brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o/ /de la rgya mtsho ltar ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho rnams blta'o/ /gling dang / bar gyi gling
70b1(mdo sde): dang / ri gzhan dang / gling chen po bzhi pa la sogs pa ltar ni/ sbyor ba dang / gzungs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o/ /grong rdal dang /
70b2(mdo sde): nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang ltar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod pa rnams blta'o/ /dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal ltar ni/ sa dang / pha rol tu phyin
70b3(mdo sde): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang ba dang / dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
70b4(mdo sde): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la sangs rgyas bcom
70b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams
70b6(mdo sde): g ang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la
70b7(mdo sde): de lta bu'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan
71a1(mdo sde): par gyur te/ rnam grangs des shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed
71a2(mdo sde): cig 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas
71a3(mdo sde): gtugs pa dag na sems can yod do cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de snyed
71a4(mdo sde): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i
71a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang brgya byin gcig cig ldan par gyur te/ d
71a6(mdo sde): e bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas ba nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba
71a7(mdo sde): sha stag tu gyur la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
71b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang tshangs pa chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji ltar sems can thams cad kyang de
71b2(mdo sde): bzhin du gyur te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa/ 'od zer gyi sbrin chen po'i dbang bskur bas
71b3(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba/ dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu/ de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i dbyings
71b4(mdo sde): su gtogs pa'i dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i
71b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni/ rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba sbu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo/ /ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs
71b6(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu las dpe byad bzang po re re mngon par 'grub bo/ /dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i
71b7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo/ /de'ang brjod du med pa
72a1(mdo sde): bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba nya ste dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od
72a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo/ /de'ang brjod du med pa stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bltar
72a3(mdo sde): mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo/ /de'ang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin
72a4(mdo sde): g shegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas par 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can
72a5(mdo sde): thams cad bsam pa yongs su sim par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
72a6(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas
72a7(mdo sde): par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos
72b1(mdo sde): gyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sbrin la gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus
72b2(mdo sde): dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba/ dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la dzam+bu chu bo'i
72b3(mdo sde): g ser las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa nam mkha'i tshad tsam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs
72b4(mdo sde): su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig tu blangs shing khyer yang ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba'am 'bri bar mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de bzhin
72b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya'i mtshan ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma
72b6(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can dang / shin tu dka' rgyal dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sbrin dang / sangs
72b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od de/ bcu gnyis po de ni/ de dag go/ de la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i spyod pa dang / log pa'i nan tan
73a1(mdo sde): thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
73a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs
73a3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad
73a4(mdo sde): cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na dri zhim po dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa/ stong
73a5(mdo sde): gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgoms pas thogs pa med cing yid
73a6(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba/ phyir mi ldog pa/ phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du
73a7(mdo sde): 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag
73b1(mdo sde): gi gzugs brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba/ yang dag par non pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i char gyi snang ba'i
73b2(mdo sde): sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro
73b3(mdo sde): ba thams cad mi mthun pa med cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba/ ngan 'gro la
73b4(mdo sde): sogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
73b5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa grangs med pas rnam par rol pa/ chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par
73b6(mdo sde): mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba thob pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i sgom pa sna tshogs yongs
73b7(mdo sde): su rdzogs la/ gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs par grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa
74a1(mdo sde): chen po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i
74a2(mdo sde): sa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ mi'i kha dog las 'das la/ lha'i kha dog ni/ ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
74a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni| 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni/ ma thob pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyis kun tu
74a4(mdo sde): 'od ni| mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i
74a5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do/ /de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin chen kun tu
74a6(mdo sde): 'phags dang / shin tu gnas pa dang / mi sgul ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes
74a7(mdo sde): sgron ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ mtha'
74b1(mdo sde): yas so| |gzungs ni/ bcu gnyis te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang bskur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyil pa
74b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang / rgya mtsho mtha' yas dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad+ma bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa
74b3(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzungs te/ de dag la sogs pa snga ma
74b4(mdo sde): bzhin no/ /mngon par shes pa ni/ drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / rdzu
74b5(mdo sde): 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / gang zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go /dbang ni/ bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa
74b6(mdo sde): grangs med pa dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang /
74b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa
75a1(mdo sde): ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas
75a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pa'i smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
75a3(mdo sde): thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba
75a4(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs par
75a5(mdo sde): byang chub pa dang / dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnams thams
75a6(mdo sde): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa smon pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
75a7(mdo sde): kyi dbang rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab
75b1(mdo sde): kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i
75b2(mdo sde): stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don
75b3(mdo sde): bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyi spyod lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i srung ba
75b4(mdo sde): chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du
75b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams
75b6(mdo sde): cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe
75b7(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan
76a1(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems
76a2(mdo sde): can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang / thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gis theg pa'i mchog gis
76a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang / zung dang snrel gzhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams dang /
76a4(mdo sde): ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa rnams dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha'
76a5(mdo sde): dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba
76a6(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston pa rnams dang / byis pa dang / nyan thos mi zad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na'ang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar bsten
76a7(mdo sde): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal
76b1(mdo sde): pa bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
76b2(mdo sde): gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs
76b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs
76b4(mdo sde): dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par ldang ba thams cad mkhyen
76b5(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin
76b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa
76b7(mdo sde): thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams
77a1(mdo sde): cad thob par 'gyur ba'i 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so//
77a2(mdo sde): de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma
77a3(mdo sde): bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /
77a4(mdo sde): dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs
77a5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong
77a6(mdo sde): ba 'jug pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
77a7(mdo sde): 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ bco brgyad po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /de la de bzhin
77b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni/ rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
77b2(mdo sde): med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med pa na sems can rnams ni/ bdag med par ma mos pas
77b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ sems can med pa na sems can rnams ni/ sems can du smra'o/ /zhes sems can rnams
77b4(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ srog med pa na sems can rnams ni/ srog tu smra'o/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
77b5(mdo sde): rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gang zag med pa na sems can rnams ni/ gang zag la gnas pa'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos
77b6(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ med pa na sems can rnams ni/ yod par lta'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gnas med pa na sems can
77b7(mdo sde): rnams ni/ gnas la rten to/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gzhi med pa na sems can rnams ni/ gzhi la dga'o/ /zhe
78a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ nga yir bya ba med pa na sems can rnams ni/ nga yir bya ba la brten
78a2(mdo sde): to| |zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag po med pa na sems can rnams ni/ yongs su bzung ba la brtson no/ /zhes
78a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa na sems can rnams ni/ dngos po la brten to/ /zhes sems can rnams la
78a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ma skyes pa na sems can rnams ni/ skye ba la brten to/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen
78a5(mdo sde): po skye'o| |chos thams cad ni/ ma 'phos ma byung ba na sems can rnams ni/ 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba la brten to/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o//
78a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa na sems can rnams ni/ kun nas nyon mongs so/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams
78a7(mdo sde): cad ni| 'dod chags dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni/ 'dod chags par byed do/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams
78b1(mdo sde): cad ni| zhe sdang dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni/ zhe sdang bar byed do/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gti mug
78b2(mdo sde): dang bral ba na sems can rnams ni/ gti mug par gyur to/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'ong ba med pa na
78b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni/ 'ong ba la gnas pa'o/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'gro ba med pa na sems can
78b4(mdo sde): rnams ni/ 'gro ba la gnas so/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa na sems can
78b5(mdo sde): rnams ni/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ spros pa med pa na sems can
78b6(mdo sde): rnams ni/ spros pa la dga'o/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ stong pa na sems can rnams ni/ lta ba la zhen to/ /
78b7(mdo sde): zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa na sems can rnams ni/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul can no/ /zhes
79a1(mdo sde): de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ smon pa med pa na sems can rnams ni/ smon lam la spyod
79a2(mdo sde): do| |zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha
79a3(mdo sde): ba'i skyon la zhugs par gzigs nas de dag la gnod sems kyi tha ba'i skyon spong ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen
79a4(mdo sde): po skye'o| |kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga bar zhugs pa/ lam gol ba la gnas pa yin gyi/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o/ /
79a5(mdo sde): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi
79a6(mdo sde): nor la 'phrog pa yin gyi/ de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong pa dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la 'god
79a7(mdo sde): do| |zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ bu smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru la sred pas 'khor ba ste/
79b1(mdo sde): snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa yin gyi/ de dag la shin tu mi rtag par bstan par bya'o/ /zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /
79b2(mdo sde): kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ mi rigs pas 'tsho ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyi/ de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems
79b3(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag
79b4(mdo sde): cag ni| chog shes pa'o/ /snyam du 'dzin gyi/ de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu chog par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de
79b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni/ khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod shin tu nyon mongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyi/ de dag las phyung
79b6(mdo sde): zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ rgyus
79b7(mdo sde): nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems can rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyi/ de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus
80a1(mdo sde): brtsam par chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /sems can rnams ni/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes rnam
80a2(mdo sde): khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyi/ de dag la gang 'di
80a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye ste/ rigs kyi bu/ rnam
80a4(mdo sde): pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po skye'o/ /de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa
80a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na/ byang chub sems
80a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bsod nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa phyir mi ldog pa sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po'i chos kyi
80a7(mdo sde): sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na srog chags stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /srog chags
80b1(mdo sde): brgya stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /lha'i bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /rigs kyi bu/ de
80b2(mdo sde): ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos kyi rnam par 'god pa na dpag tu med grangs med de/ de dag gi phyi ma'i
80b3(mdo sde): mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na/ sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig
80b4(mdo sde): bstan te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las mthun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rdub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa
80b5(mdo sde): yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu
80b6(mdo sde): med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi par bcas pa/ ri rab dang / ri btang bzung dang /
80b7(mdo sde): ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi dad ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang
81a1(mdo sde): gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas
81a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byung
81a3(mdo sde): ba'i tshe ji skad du brjod pa'i ri rab dang / rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen
81a4(mdo sde): po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin
81a5(mdo sde): pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen
81a6(mdo sde): po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya
81a7(mdo sde): stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus
81b1(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin zhe na/
81b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de/ nags tshal
81b3(mdo sde): dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang / nying
81b4(mdo sde): lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig
81b5(mdo sde): pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhog
81b6(mdo sde): par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ thob par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'di dag ni/ ngan song sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ bde 'gro
81b7(mdo sde): sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ bdag po sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o/ /
82a1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni/ mi sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ lha sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni/ brgya byin dang /
82a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ gzugs dang / g.yog dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / dpal chen po sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ rig pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ sgyu rtsal to/ /
82a3(mdo sde): 'di dag ni/ bzo'i gnas so/ /'di dag ni/ gtsug lag sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o/ /'di dag ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni/
82a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni/ theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ bdag dang / gzhan gyi don yang dag par thob
82a5(mdo sde): par byed pa/ kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni/ sa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rig
82a6(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
82a7(mdo sde): par rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /zhes rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas gzungs pad+ma bkod pa la sogs pa la
82b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dag byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su
82b2(mdo sde): 'god pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char
82b3(mdo sde): rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang mi rnams shin tu dga' ba dang /
82b4(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan med par rnam par rtse ba dang / nyams bde zhing yongs su spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par kha dog dang / stobs dang / mthu dang / yid bde ba las yongs su mi nyams
82b5(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / rnga dang / sil snyan la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs/ yongs su skyod cing 'byin par byed do/ /de bzhin
82b6(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang
82b7(mdo sde): gis sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skyo
83a1(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis snang
83a2(mdo sde): bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par 'dod par 'gyur ba'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang /
83a3(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa dang / 'di lta bu 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i
83a4(mdo sde): me tog la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so/ /lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / snel zhi dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi
83a5(mdo sde): za ba nye bar sgrub bo/ /tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brjod cing ston la rnam par dag par byed do/ /chos thams cad ston/ kun tu yang
83a6(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston to/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro/ /ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byed de/ chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i
83a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do/ /dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do/ /mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas par byed
83b1(mdo sde): do| |de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char
83b2(mdo sde): rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
83b3(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi
83b4(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gtong ba yin
83b5(mdo sde): zhe na| rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung mar ni/ bskal pa'i mthar thug ste 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
83b6(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang / khor yug ri dang / rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing rnam par 'thor ba dang / rmeg med par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de lta
83b7(mdo sde): bu'i stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med par ldang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i sems can bsod nams dang / ye shes
84a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs
84a2(mdo sde): su bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas chos kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang
84a3(mdo sde): ba'i lhag mthong dang ldan pa/ bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa/ tshul bzhin yid la byas nas yang dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting nge
84a4(mdo sde): 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la brten te srid pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad bshig cing rnam par gtor te lus med par byas nas yang
84a5(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum
84a6(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa rnam par gzhig pas gnas gyur pa rnam par dag pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang
84a7(mdo sde): bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsags
84b1(mdo sde): pa| ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug ri
84b2(mdo sde): la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gdul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'pho ba dang /
84b3(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rlung med lta bu rnams yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
84b4(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing sems
84b5(mdo sde): can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul bcu po 'di bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha dang /
84b6(mdo sde): mi gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na/ de dag thams cad ji skad du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas pa/ yid bde ba dang bcas par thob par 'gyur te/
84b7(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na'ang gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par
85a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du byed
85a2(mdo sde): pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang
85a3(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro/ /gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni/ mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la brten pa'o/ /lha
85a4(mdo sde): dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po bzhi pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
85a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha'
85a6(mdo sde): yas pa rnams yin/ ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos
85a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de
85b1(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin
85b2(mdo sde): no| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i
85b3(mdo sde): sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed
85b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi
85b5(mdo sde): bu| chos bcu po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin
85b6(mdo sde): no| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang / mthong na dga' ba rnams yin/ chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams bri
85b7(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dga' ba la mos
86a1(mdo sde): shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu
86a2(mdo sde): sim par byed pa nas ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu tshe ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid
86a3(mdo sde): du 'ong bas rab tu sim par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang /
86a4(mdo sde): rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang / dang ba dang / sems shin
86a5(mdo sde): tu dga' bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta ste/ dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi
86a6(mdo sde): rgyud dang ba dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
86a7(mdo sde): zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyas kyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang thog ma
86b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de rnam pa
86b2(mdo sde): thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba mar gyi ngo la dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/ bco lnga la ji ltar rnam pa thams
86b3(mdo sde): cad du thams cad mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de na de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams
86b4(mdo sde): cad du thams cad rab tu 'bri ste/ ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba shar na bram ze
86b5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar
86b6(mdo sde): na'ang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bsod
86b7(mdo sde): nams kyi las rnam par smin pas grub pa ni/ yongs su dag ste/ rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang / gsal ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid
87a1(mdo sde): kyis mngon par grub pa/ rdzus te skyes pa/ pha ma'i btsog pa dang / mer mer po las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang ba dang / gsal ba yin
87a2(mdo sde): no| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni/ bzhon pa mchog la zhon te gling bzhir snang bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang byang chub sems dpa'i
87a3(mdo sde): theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni/ rtag tu brgyan cing rgyan ma rnyings pa
87a4(mdo sde): yin no| |de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni/ rtag tu rgyun
87a5(mdo sde): mi chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas
87a6(mdo sde): dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'ang 'di lta ste/ bsod
87a7(mdo sde): nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas
87b1(mdo sde): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
87b2(mdo sde): dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du
87b3(mdo sde): lhan ner byed pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos mngon par shar ba rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs
87b4(mdo sde): rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa kun ston pa yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge bar
87b5(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba nas ji ltar skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta
87b6(mdo sde): ste| dper na/ nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to/ /rigs
87b7(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar na pad+ma rnam par 'byed bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang gdul ba'i sems can gyi pad+ma rnam par 'bye bar byed do/ /
88a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na 'ang phyogs bcu thams
88a2(mdo sde): cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling
88a3(mdo sde): du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag nam snang ba de'i tshen shar ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba de'i tshe na dge ba'i chos rnams shar ces
88a4(mdo sde): bya'o| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams
88a5(mdo sde): thams cad du thams cad nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do/ /
88a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bar byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel to/ /rigs
88a7(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang nyi ma ni/ ngas 'od thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid
88b1(mdo sde): thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang / mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs thams cad 'od med par 'gyur
88b2(mdo sde): mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma ni/ ngas 'di dag 'od med par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
88b3(mdo sde): na| nyi ma shar na dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa legs par ston to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang
88b4(mdo sde): bas mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa legs par ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ lam
88b5(mdo sde): ngan pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar na rmo rko ba'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang dge ba'i chos
88b6(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar na skye bo dge ba ni/ dga' bar 'gyur la/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de
88b7(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma shar na'ang skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni/ dga' bar 'gyur la/ lam ngan par zhugs pa
89a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba
89a2(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni/ mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig
89a3(mdo sde): pa'i mun pa sel ba nas skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi
89a4(mdo sde): bu| chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag mi tsha ba rnams yin/ mi brtabs pa rnams yin/ mi zlog pa
89a5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dabs na rgyu ba rnams yin/ ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/
89a6(mdo sde): len pa med pa rnams yin/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'joms pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba rnams yin no/ /
89a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ gar 'gro
89b1(mdo sde): yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas bag mi tsha zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro bar pag mi tsha
89b2(mdo sde): zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ wa thams cad kyi sgras mi brtabs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang pha rol gyi rgol ba thams
89b3(mdo sde): cad kyis brtsad pas brgal byang mi brtabs shing rgod pa dang / zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ bskugs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub
89b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng+ge'ang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis bskugs na mi zlog cing mi zhum par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ sgra gang gis ri dwags phra mo thams cad
89b5(mdo sde): dang / wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrog go /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang bdag med pa'i seng+ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par
89b6(mdo sde): chags pa'i gzhan mu stegs can gyi ri dwags rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge ni/
89b7(mdo sde): bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag gdul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa'i seng+ge'i sgra mi sgrog go /rigs kyi
90a1(mdo sde): bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ kun tu lta'ang mi 'jigs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lta'ang mi
90a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dabs na rgyu ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang
90a3(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis dben pa la mngon par phyogs shing nags tshal dang / nags tshal gyi 'dabs na spyod pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ ri'i phug na gnas pa yin
90a4(mdo sde): no| |de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang ye shes kyi brag ri'i phyug na gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ mi len par 'gro ba yin no/ /de bzhin
90a5(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad por zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ seng+ge ni/ gcig bu gnyis su med pa
90a6(mdo sde): bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas pha rol gyi sde 'joms so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la
90a7(mdo sde): 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'joms so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ grong gi 'dabs gang na seng+ge rgyu ba der ri dwags phra mo
90b1(mdo sde): dag gis lo thog rnams chud mi gzon to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'ang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi ri dwags phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos
90b2(mdo sde): kyi lo thog chud mi gzon te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo thog srung ba'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
90b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems
90b4(mdo sde): brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems byi dor shin tu byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ khur chen po 'khyer phod pa rnams yin/
90b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams yin/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang
90b6(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can pas drang pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
90b7(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun nas
91a1(mdo sde): ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi
91a2(mdo sde): dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu ltar 'jig rten na spyod pa rnams yin/ rtag
91a3(mdo sde): tu rgyun mi chad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar bzhag pas nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes pa'i phyir sangs
91a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tshom med pa rnams yin/ rang gis lam mthong bas gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring
91a5(mdo sde): mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes
91a6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma gos pa rnams yin/ sdig pa chung ngu'ang
91a7(mdo sde): lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi rtsub pa rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa
91b1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ blo rnam par bye ba rnams yin/ blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa
91b2(mdo sde): yin pa nas ji ltar na/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ chu'i nang nas byung yang ma chags par skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i
91b3(mdo sde): chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi chos nyid thob
91b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gis mi gos te/ de'i thabs de ni/ shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no/ /
91b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma la ni/ chu'i thigs pa chung ngu'ang mi chags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu'ang mi chags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
91b6(mdo sde): na| sa'i phyogs gang du pad+ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go / de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul
91b7(mdo sde): khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go / rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi
92a1(mdo sde): mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/ lha
92a2(mdo sde): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas
92a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ kha bye na/ 'di lta ste/
92a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bur snang ngo / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no/ /
92a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing mi rtsub pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba
