92a6(mdo sde): yin| mi brlang zhing mu cor mi smra ba'i rang bzhin can yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ rmi lam dang / ltas dang / yud tsam dag la mthong na'ang 'di lta ste/ don
92a7(mdo sde): 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'ang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams
92b1(mdo sde): cad du'ang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ nam rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
92b2(mdo sde): nam shes rab dang byang chub kyi yan lag me tog rgyas pa de na blo rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de ni bltas na
92b3(mdo sde): mig gi dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ rnams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/ myangs na lce'i dbang po tshim par byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po
92b4(mdo sde): tshim par byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe na
92b5(mdo sde): bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri ma nams na sna'i dbang po rnam par dag par
92b6(mdo sde): byed| myangs na lce'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon tan brjod pa rnam par bsam pas yid kyi dbang
92b7(mdo sde): po rnam par dag par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad+ma ni/ skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub
93a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang skye ba'i tshe sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
93a2(mdo sde): dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po
93a3(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma dang 'dra ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no/ /bcu
93a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par sgrub bo/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes
93a5(mdo sde): sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad gdul lo/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
93a6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud
93a7(mdo sde): dam| tshangs pa'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med
93b1(mdo sde): par song ste sems can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /shes rab kyi gru sbyar te sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya
93b2(mdo sde): mtsho las bsgral lo/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /mgon med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sems can
93b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnyen bya'o/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / mi dang /
93b4(mdo sde): lha ma yin du bcas pas skye rgu'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to/ /sangs rgyas kyi seng+ge'i sgra sgrog go /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par rtse'o/ /glang po chen
93b5(mdo sde): po'i blta bas blta bar bya'o/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i/ spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/ dka' bar spyod pas ma yin/
93b6(mdo sde): zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no/ /zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba
93b7(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa
94a1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas bsam pa shin tu gnas pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi
94a2(mdo sde): bskyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / brtson pa chung ba'i yid la byed pa mi spyod pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams
94a3(mdo sde): yin| 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma'i spyod lam dang bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams
94a4(mdo sde): yin| 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /'di lta ste/ lus kyis 'du 'dzi med pa dang / ngag gis 'dod pa chung ba dang /
94a5(mdo sde): sems kyis smon pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral pa rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa'ang chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa gzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa
94a6(mdo sde): tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi smod/ mi skyud/ yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na cung zad byas pa'ang tshor zhing de la bstod par byed/ gzengs bstong par
94a7(mdo sde): byed| yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ de la yon tan du lta ba yin no/ /ji ltar lta ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag
94b1(mdo sde): gis snyan par ston cing sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis bstod cing sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa'
94b2(mdo sde): rnams ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhe la non te shar gnyer ba rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis des pa ston cing sems kyis 'khon gyi mdud par 'dzin
94b3(mdo sde): pa rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston cing sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul mi 'chos/ kha gsag mi byed
94b4(mdo sde): 'jungs pa dang phrag dog gis kun tu glags pa ma yin/ sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab smyan mi byed/ phan tshun du bar 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems
94b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni/ lus kyis kyang ri mo bskyed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don smra ba las su rung ba'ang sgrub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
94b6(mdo sde): pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa
94b7(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de skra dang kha spu bregs/ gos ngur smrig dag gyon nas yang dag par dad pas de
95a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo / /de rab tu 'byung ba na rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung / rkun pos gtse ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis
95a2(mdo sde): gtse ba med pa dang / 'jigs pas gtse ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin te/ de
95a3(mdo sde): dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba yin pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par byed/ sten par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de dag las chos kyang nyan to/ /thos nas kyang nan tan
95a4(mdo sde): byed| nga rgyal gyi zil gyis gnon pa yin te/ de nga rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/ ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa thob bo/ /de lam shin tu rtogs pas
95a5(mdo sde): chos nyid thob bo/ /chos nyid thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba ma btab pa yin no//
95a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
95a7(mdo sde): nem nur med pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin
95b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa dang / byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa dang / tshul
95b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/
95b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas ji ltar na/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
95b4(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang / zhi ba'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / tshad med pa'i sku dang /
95b5(mdo sde): phal la med pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med cing the tshom med de/ de ltar na/
95b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad
95b7(mdo sde): ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ma mngon sum du lung ston pa dang / gsang ste lung ston pa dang / ldem po dag
96a1(mdo sde): gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa'am/ ca co med de/ de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba'i nyes pa mi 'byung
96a2(mdo sde): ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa/ rdul thams cad spangs pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/
96a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur ba/ zhi ba/ dang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnam par gsal ba ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'khrul pa'am/ ca co
96a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba de ni/ gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do/ /zhes thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tshom med
96a5(mdo sde): de/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par
96a6(mdo sde): dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ci dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa/ sems la
96a7(mdo sde): gnas pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems
96b1(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis shes par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul
96b2(mdo sde): las shin tu 'das pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/
96b3(mdo sde): de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tshom med pa yin te/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na/ byang
96b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi rgyu/ byang chub kyi gzhi/ byang chub kyi phyir byang
96b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi skrag pa dang / khur chen po khyer
96b6(mdo sde): ba dang / mthu brten pa dang / rtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo
96b7(mdo sde): dang / mtha' yas pa'i blo dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / go cha brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / dam bcas
97a1(mdo sde): pa las mi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas pa phal la med pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
97a2(mdo sde): zhes thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi bslu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tshom med de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag
97a3(mdo sde): par sgrub pa la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang byang
97a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i mig chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo/ /lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon
97a5(mdo sde): gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pas shes pa chags pa med pa/
97a6(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa 'thob bo/ /de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni/ lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang
97a7(mdo sde): ldan pa| ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos
97b1(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o/ /sems can 'di rnams ni/ lus kyi
97b2(mdo sde): legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/
97b3(mdo sde): yang dag par lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar yang
97b4(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la lta ste/ sems can gyi khams de nyid kyang dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnams la rnam par lta'o/ /de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon
97b5(mdo sde): bdag byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o/ /zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam
97b6(mdo sde): de yongs su rdzogs so/ /bdag gi brang pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo/ /zhes thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem
97b7(mdo sde): nur med/ the tshom med do/ /gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni/ byang chub ces bya'o/ /bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas des na/ rdzogs par sangs rgyas
98a1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa
98a2(mdo sde): gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di theg pa ni/ gcig kho na ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o/ /zhes thos pa 'di ni/
98a3(mdo sde): yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin pa'o/ /ma nor pa'o/ /gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa gzhan rnams kyang 'di las byung
98a4(mdo sde): ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni/ dzam+bu'i gling du 'du'o/ /dzam+bu'i gling la brten to//
98a5(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o/ /de'i phyir gling gcig kho na ste/ de ni/ dzam+bu'i gling ngo / /de bzhin du thag pa thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par 'du'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
98a6(mdo sde): pa'i theg pa la gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ngo / /de'i phyir theg pa gcig kho na ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'i snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de
98a7(mdo sde): nem nur med/ the tshom med de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na/ tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad
98b1(mdo sde): ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs bshad pa thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'i/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o
98b2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tshom med de/ de
98b3(mdo sde): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon
98b4(mdo sde): par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir
98b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta ci smos
98b6(mdo sde): snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med/ the tshom med de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji
98b7(mdo sde): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di ltar sems so/ /gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa dang / bag la
99a1(mdo sde): nyal mkhyen te/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas the tshom gcod cing yongs su smin pa
99a2(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to snyam
99a3(mdo sde): byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go /zhes thos pa 'di ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /'di ni/ de kho na'o/ /'di ni/ mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem
99a4(mdo sde): nur med/ the tshom med de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
99a5(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang
99a6(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams
99a7(mdo sde): yin| nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug pa rnams yin/ ro gcig pa rnams yin/ chu bo kun zad pa rnams yin/ dus las mi yol ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i
99b1(mdo sde): gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ mi zad pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas ji ltar na mi zad pa'i bar du
99b2(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas mi zad do/ /de
99b3(mdo sde): bzhan du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems can thams cad kyis yon tan rin po che blang bas mi zad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
99b4(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa'ang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis
99b5(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ chu tshad med pas na/ yangs shing rgya che ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
99b6(mdo sde): dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas na/ yangs shing rgya che ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ bags kyis gzhol/ bags kyis 'bab/ bags kyis
99b7(mdo sde): bab bo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste
100a1(mdo sde): dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
100a2(mdo sde): yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
100a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyed bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de
100a4(mdo sde): dag thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba'am/
100a5(mdo sde): gang bar yang mi mngon no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba'am/ gang bar mi mngon no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
100a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po ni/ dus las mi yol lo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gdul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo/ /rigs kyi
100a7(mdo sde): bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang / chos dkar po thams cad kyi
100b1(mdo sde): gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyis chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can
100b2(mdo sde): thams cad la chos ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
100b3(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no/ /
100b4(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos
100b5(mdo sde): thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba
100b6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smad pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la
100b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas ji ltar na/ de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la
101a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar ro/ /rab tu 'bar ro/ /kun tu
101a2(mdo sde): rab tu mched cing 'bar ro/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshub pas rnam par rmongs so/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa
101a3(mdo sde): 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo/ /de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su
101a4(mdo sde): tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go/ /chos thams cad la brtags pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chung
101a5(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos thams
101a6(mdo sde): cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so/ /de
101a7(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la las snang ba ni/ ngo
101b1(mdo sde): mtshar to snyam du sems so/ /de ltar na/ blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so/ /des don shes pas don
101b2(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs so/ /don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo / /de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas
101b3(mdo sde): thar par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
101b4(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
101b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go /chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa
101b6(mdo sde): po dang mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gso ba ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de
101b7(mdo sde): la chos thams cad bdag med ces bya ba 'di ni/ rigs pa'o/ /'di ni/ chos nyid dang mthun pa'o/ /chos thams cad sems can med pa srog med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rigs pa'o/ /'di ni/
102a1(mdo sde): chos nyid dang mthun pa'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong
102a2(mdo sde): ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung ba'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rigs pa'o/ /
102a3(mdo sde): 'di ni/ chos nyid dang mthun pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni/ rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni/ rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul ba de
102a4(mdo sde): ni| rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni/ rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid ston pa de ni/ rigs pa'o/ /de'ang de dag spobs pas na/ de'i phyir rigs par spobs pa rnams shes
102a5(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i spobs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
102a6(mdo sde): dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad pa rnams
102a7(mdo sde): yin| spobs pa mi brtabs pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phal la med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa zil gyis mi
102b1(mdo sde): non pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
102b2(mdo sde): dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dar
102b3(mdo sde): 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi zhan pa'i sobs pa can rnams yin/ yeng yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ de dag
102b4(mdo sde): gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin/ mi gsal ba'i spobs pa can ma yin no/ /
102b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ 'dar 'dar po ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor gyis 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems
102b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ 'khrul pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo brtan zhing mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ zhan pa ma yin no/ /de
102b7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/ seng+ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi dngang ba
103a1(mdo sde): yin no| |byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ yeng yeng po med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ nyon mongs pa
103a2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni/ yeng yeng bor 'gyur ba yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni/ ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ don dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
103a3(mdo sde): chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa
103a4(mdo sde): ni| tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ gtsug lag gi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi ni/ tshig
103a5(mdo sde): 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi ni/ ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de
103a6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni/ sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan
103a7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi ni/ ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ gang phyis smra bar bya ba de sngar smra ba'am/ gang sngar smra bar bya ba phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin
103b1(mdo sde): no| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dus shes pa yin/ tshod shes pa yin/ skabs shes pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ rtsub pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba/
103b2(mdo sde): mi snyan pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang
103b3(mdo sde): bral ba rnams kyi ni/ ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs
103b4(mdo sde): pa mi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ni/ ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs
103b5(mdo sde): kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'jam par smra ba rnams
103b6(mdo sde): yin/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ mi ngom pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba
103b7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/
104a1(mdo sde): 'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can
104a2(mdo sde): rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' don du smra ba ni/ tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni/ phan par smra bas
104a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /
104a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi ngom pa ni/ nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa
104a5(mdo sde): dang bral ba ni/ ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa ni/ ngang tshul des pas sems can
104a6(mdo sde): rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni/ bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna
104a7(mdo sde): tshogs can ni/ dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar
104b1(mdo sde): byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar byed pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
104b2(mdo sde): rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston to/ /zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams
104b3(mdo sde): la ma yin/ ma dad pa med pa rnams la ma yin/ g.yo dang sgyus glags pa rnams la ma yin/ 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / phrag dog dang / ser
104b4(mdo sde): snas glags pa rnams la ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
104b5(mdo sde): rnams la chos kyi ser sna'ang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa'ang med/ sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa'ang med/ sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'ang med mod kyi/ sems
104b6(mdo sde): can 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
104b7(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/
105a1(mdo sde): sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to/ /sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa
105a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang / g.yo med pa rnams dang / sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la chags pa dang
105a3(mdo sde): bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par ston
105a4(mdo sde): nus pa rnams dang / dbang po rno ba/ gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa
105a5(mdo sde): bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang
105a6(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rjod pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/
105a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / yang dag par sgrub pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
105b1(mdo sde): par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub yang dag par sgrub
105b2(mdo sde): pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa spang ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang /
105b3(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rgyun du
105b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa yang mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir
105b5(mdo sde): chos ston kyang dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
105b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs so/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang 'jog mod kyi/ las
105b7(mdo sde): dang las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming des yod pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni/ yi
106a1(mdo sde): ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge rnams ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten/ tha snyad la brten/ brtag pa la brten te/ ming med pa'i
106a2(mdo sde): chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/ ming de'ang gsog go /gsob bo/ /gang gsog dang gsob de la don dam pa med do/ /gang la don dam pa med pa de rdzun te/ slu ba'i chos so/ /gang rdzun
106a3(mdo sde): zhing slu ba'i chos de ni/ byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rjod pa rnams yin no/ /'phags pa dkon mchog
106a4(mdo sde): sprin/ bam po lnga pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub
106a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la gzugs las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
106a6(mdo sde): las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang
106a7(mdo sde): 'brang la gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chos las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chos las 'da' bar yang mi 'byung /
106b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de
106b2(mdo sde): ni/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu
106b3(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba
106b4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/
106b5(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang pa rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
106b6(mdo sde): dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rangs te/ de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brten te gnas so/ /de
106b7(mdo sde): la dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /
107a1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pas na/ sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing lus dang ngag dang yid
107a2(mdo sde): kyi gnas dan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de shin tu yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa yin no/ /de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa
107a3(mdo sde): mang ba yin no/ /stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs pa'i lta bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go /de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo //
107a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de kho na zhes bgyi ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
107a5(mdo sde): bu| 'di lta ste/ de kho na zhes bya ba 'di na/ yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
107a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang mi slu ba de ni/ yang dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni/
107a7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
107b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di ni/ so so rang gis rig pa yin te/ 'di ni/ yi ge dag gis gdams par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni/ yi ge thams cad las yang
107b2(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa/ smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ spros pa
107b3(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ phye ba dang btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod
107b4(mdo sde): yul ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las
107b5(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las
107b6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas ma yin pa/ mi gnas pa/ zhi ba/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis rig pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma gos pa dang rnam par dag pa/
107b7(mdo sde): gya nom pa/ mchog dam pa/ phul/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ ther zug /mi 'jig pa'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi dbyings 'di ni/
108a1(mdo sde): 'dug pa kho na'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag chos nyid 'di thob nas sems can de dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam
108a2(mdo sde): ste| don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dka' ba brgya dag byed pa rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o/ /
108a3(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o/ /gnyis su med pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o/ /byang chub
108a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
108a5(mdo sde): stsal pa| rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o/ /rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
108a6(mdo sde): bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang shes rab kyis mngon du bgyis pa de rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
108a7(mdo sde): kyi bu| ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni/ chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo / /lus kyis ni/ mngon du byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
108b1(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa| bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gis thos pa las byung ba'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas chos khong du chud par gyur pa de rang gis rig pa
108b2(mdo sde): ma lags sam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ma yin te/ thos pa tsam mam/ bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ dpe nyon cig
108b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'brog chen po'i dpyid kyi zla ba tha ma la mi la la zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro ba de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ongs te/ de'ang
108b4(mdo sde): dpyad kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras te/ kye skyes bu/ kho bo dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs
108b5(mdo sde): te skom gyis nyen na/ mtsho'am/ lteng ka'am/ rdzing gang chu bsil ba dang rnyog pa med pa/ gsal bas gang ba yod de/ gang du bdag tsha ba dang / skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam
108b6(mdo sde): bdag la ston cig ces zer na/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de'ang lam shes pa/ lam mkhas pa/ lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de na chu'i nyes pa dang
108b7(mdo sde): bral ba'i chu sngon chad mthong la/ sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po/ lam 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/ kye
109a1(mdo sde): skyes bu| khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang / nags tshal de'i dbus nas mtsho'am/ lteng ka'am/ rdzing bu chu
109a2(mdo sde): bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du
109a3(mdo sde): sems| dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te skom gyis nyen pa'i mi des chu thos ma thag dang / bsam pa tsam gyis tsham med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang yang bral bar
109a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ram/ chu de'i bsil ba'ang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi de nam der phyin nas des chu der
109a5(mdo sde): zhugs te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe mi de'i tsha ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /des bsil ba'ang rang gis rig par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
109a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ thos pa tsam dang / bsam pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so/ /de la rigs kyi bu/
109a7(mdo sde): 'brog ces bya ba de ni/ 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dwags so/ /mi dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ nyon mongs
109b1(mdo sde): pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing yul gyi sred pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
109b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa/ chos myong ba/ chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/
109b3(mdo sde): don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ dpe nyon cig /rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i tshad bskal par
109b4(mdo sde): bzhugs te dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / gya nom pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las
109b5(mdo sde): brtsams te bsngags pa brjod na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
109b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/ bsam pa tsam gyis
109b7(mdo sde): rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang dpe nyon cig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig gis shing thog
110a1(mdo sde): gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs pa zhig myangs par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing thog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di
110a2(mdo sde): lta ste| kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te brjod na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ ci mi des shing thog gi
110a3(mdo sde): ro de rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnam
110a4(mdo sde): grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/ bsam pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
110a5(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs par gsungs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ shin tu legs par gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos
110a6(mdo sde): kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das /rigs
110a7(mdo sde): kyi bu| de dag gis chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin
110b1(mdo sde): te| rigs kyi bu/ de dag gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
110b2(mdo sde): dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stobs
110b3(mdo sde): kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong
110b4(mdo sde): pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa
110b5(mdo sde): nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang
110b6(mdo sde): rab tu shes te/ de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs/
110b7(mdo sde): de'i rgyu| de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis med par yang mi ltung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no/ /
111a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi
111a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba
111a3(mdo sde): rnams yin/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba
111a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa rnams yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
111a5(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
111a6(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa'ang de 'dra na/ de bzhin
111a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gnas 'di ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa'i
111b1(mdo sde): yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsam na/ sems can thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
111b2(mdo sde): kyang pha rol tam/ tshur rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi dmigs kyi/ tha mar na dub pa'i bskal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ zab
111b3(mdo sde): cing gting dpag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ rgya che ba nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ rtog gi ba thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa can
111b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni/ brtag pa'am/ bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
111b5(mdo sde): bas gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
111b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phye'i/ /khyod dris shig /byang
111b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag bstod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsung na/ de ji ltar
112a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la bstod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi dri ba
112a2(mdo sde): tshul bzhin du dris so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes byang
112a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de
112a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang / chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag bstod pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyis
112a5(mdo sde): non pa dang / rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa dang / bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa'am/ kha gsag
112a6(mdo sde): byed cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag bstod pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs
112a7(mdo sde): pa nye bar bzhag pas chos bstan pa'i skal pa yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de'ang de dag la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar
112b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma
112b2(mdo sde): 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni/ rgya chung la
112b3(mdo sde): mos pa| dman tshegs la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/ dad pa chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus bstan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes
112b4(mdo sde): pas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de'ang nan tan gyis sgrub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman
112b5(mdo sde): pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/ sa'i phyogs de'ang sman pa gcig pur zad de gnyis su med la de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang mi
112b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni/ sdug bsngal pa/ nad kyis nyen pa/ sman la mi mkhas pa/ gnod pa la sten pa yin
112b7(mdo sde): gyi| bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o/ /snyam nas sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du kye sems can dag /da ni/ sman pa ste/ nad la mkhas pa'o/ /nad kyi gzhi la
113a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa'o/ /sman la mkhas pa'o/ /zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni/ sman pa'o/ /
113a2(mdo sde): zhes bya bar shes shing yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to/ /de nas sman pa de sems can de dag gso zhing nad zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du
113a3(mdo sde): sems| sman pa de bdag la bstod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
113a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'ang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso ba
113a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ chos kyi sman chen po stob pa yin yang nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi ni/ shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par
113a6(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang / bsngags pa dag nyid brjod de/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i
113a7(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba thob nas yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to/ /de nas de dag
113b1(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug
113b2(mdo sde): pa dang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas bdag la bdag nyid bstod pa/
113b3(mdo sde): mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon
113b4(mdo sde): kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang / byang
113b5(mdo sde): chub dang / lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/
113b6(mdo sde): gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam
113b7(mdo sde): thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
114a1(mdo sde): lta ste| nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams
114a2(mdo sde): yin| nges par rtogs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems
114a3(mdo sde): can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa
114a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
114a5(mdo sde): byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
114a6(mdo sde): lta ste| sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/ byang chub tu sems bskyed
114a7(mdo sde): do| |byang chub tu sems bskyed nas chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing rtsol/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang byed do/ /de dag chos
114b1(mdo sde): thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed/ tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/ gnod
114b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'khrugs pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas shes rab
114b3(mdo sde): la gzhog par byed cing / sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi zad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba dag gis nyen kyang byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag
114b4(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan ba/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no/
114b5(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni/ 'khor ba'i btson ra rab tu 'bar ba nas byung ba'o/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag gis 'khor ba'i dpyang thag yun ring po nas
114b6(mdo sde): thogs pa chad do/ /zhes dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag ni/ rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal to/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba
114b7(mdo sde): skyed do| |bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgrengs pa'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal lo/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes
115a1(mdo sde): bcom ste ji ltar rdul kyang mi nang ba de ltar bcom mo/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag nyid ni/ dbugs phyin pa yin gyi/ da ni/ gzhan yang
115a2(mdo sde): dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag nyid ni/ 'jig rten gnas pa/ yun ring po nas gnyid log pa/ sred pa'i snyoms pas yongs su zin
115a3(mdo sde): pa| mig gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang nas sad pa yin gyi/ da ni/ gzhan yang sad par bya'o/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag nyid ni/ ngan 'gro dang / ngan song
115a4(mdo sde): dang / log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyi/ da ni/ gzhan yang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol
115a5(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te grogs med cing gnyis su med par gar yang 'khyams
115a6(mdo sde): shing lam la mi mkhas la/ lam mi shes shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba rnyed do/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong
115a7(mdo sde): khyer dang nye bar gyur to/ /zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /
115b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs
115b2(mdo sde): rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma phyung bar mi 'gyur
115b3(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /
115b4(mdo sde): lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ yid kyis rnam par
115b5(mdo sde): shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma phyung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
115b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas pa yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smas par
115b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma phyung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang / dang
116a1(mdo sde): ba dang / rangs pa skyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid rgal bar gyur to/ /zhes btang snyoms su
116a2(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan
116a3(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shi 'pho ba'ang ston/ skye ba'ang ston/ btsas pa dang / byis pa'i
116a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston/ mngon par 'byung ba'ang ston/ dka' ba spyod pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/
116a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
116a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi
116a7(mdo sde): pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ dga'
116b1(mdo sde): ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las
116b2(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba/ mi mnyam pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma chags pa shi 'pho par mthong na/ rtag pa'i 'du shes
116b3(mdo sde): ldog cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems
116b4(mdo sde): can gang dag bag med par spyod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod/ rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas byang chub sems dpa'i
116b5(mdo sde): drung du mi 'dong / mi rten/ bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la/ bdag cag kyang 'khod de/ dus kyang ring du
116b6(mdo sde): yod kyi| slabs kyis 'dong bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag gi bag med pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems
116b7(mdo sde): dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de/ bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
117a1(mdo sde): tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa de dag gi
117a2(mdo sde): mthu mthong na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub sems
117a3(mdo sde): dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug
117a4(mdo sde): pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa
117a5(mdo sde): dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas
117a6(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ sems can
117a7(mdo sde): gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su
117b1(mdo sde): smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mu stegs can gzhan tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems
117b2(mdo sde): can gang dag gis yun ring bo nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o/ /zhes smon lam btab pa
117b3(mdo sde): yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston la/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed de/ de dag gis
117b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang / rgyags
117b5(mdo sde): pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug 'dul ba ston to/ /sems can gang zhi ba
117b6(mdo sde): la gnas pa de dag de las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon
117b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang / ca co sna tshogs yod pa de dag thams cad med cing stong
118a1(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong na/ bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la
118a2(mdo sde): 'khod de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes smon lam 'debs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang ston par bkur
118a3(mdo sde): ba dang / ston par dam bca' ba de dag gis 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar bcad pa dang / sems can dge
118a4(mdo sde): b a'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ka shi'i grong rdal du
118a5(mdo sde): song nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de
118a6(mdo sde): dag 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ rgyu/ 'di ni/ rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan
118a7(mdo sde): gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
118b1(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin
118b2(mdo sde): no| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos las phyir log pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser sna dang bral
118b3(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ thabs la mkhas pa
118b4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/
118b5(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang tshor ba mi zad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar
118b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'am/ yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la gnod pa'i sems skyes par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/ byang
118b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni/ rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na/ de ni/ sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang
119a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis byol song gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dag tu skyes nas
119a2(mdo sde): kyang byol song gi sdug bsngal mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des yi dwags
119a3(mdo sde): kyi nang du skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal mi zad pa rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba mang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang du skyes pas dge ba'i
119a4(mdo sde): bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa 'thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sngon spyad
119a5(mdo sde): pa ste| sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rkyen
119a6(mdo sde): de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
119a7(mdo sde): snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa
119b1(mdo sde): yin te| de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing / bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pas dbang po
119b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing / dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
119b3(mdo sde): ni| mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can blun pa/ rmongs pa/ lug ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can/ skal ba med pa/ legs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes
119b4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i mthu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ mar mi shes pa/ phar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa dag gi nang du mi
119b5(mdo sde): skye'o| |byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba/ dbang po gsal ba/ mkhas pa/ mkhas par bkur ba/ skal ba yod pa/ legs par
119b6(mdo sde): bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par byed pa'i mthu yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyod du 'dzin
119b7(mdo sde): pa| bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ sngon gyi shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/
120a1(mdo sde): gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o/ /
120a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
120a3(mdo sde): ni| thabs mkhas pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ gang na sangs rgyas mi zhugs pa dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byar med pa'i
120a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
120a5(mdo sde): de ni| sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mnga' ba dang / dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul
120a6(mdo sde): can ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ gnas de lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/ skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang ba'i phyir dge
120a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa
120b1(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo dang sgyu med de drang
120b2(mdo sde): zhing sems gya gyu med la sems dang ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang / the tshom med pa rnams
120b3(mdo sde): yin| chos la slob dpon 'chab pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/
120b4(mdo sde): ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes
120b5(mdo sde): kyis zhes dang bcas/ ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol/ theg pa chen po la gnas/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba'i gang zag
120b6(mdo sde): rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang
120b7(mdo sde): chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs
121a1(mdo sde): rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod
121a2(mdo sde): pa med pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med pa rnams yin/ dga' ba mang ba rnams yin/ sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin/ rdzus te skye ba
121a3(mdo sde): rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dam pa'i chos la rim
121a4(mdo sde): gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin te/ de de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis
121a5(mdo sde): lus dang / srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo / /klog go /kun chub par byed do/ /gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston to/ /de dam pa'i chos yongs
121a6(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa la brtson pas 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi tshul khrims rnam pa gsum gyis tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su
121a7(mdo sde): dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de'ang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/ sgrib pa med pas
121b1(mdo sde): dga' ba mang ba yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/ /sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su
121b2(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir tshe rabs
121b3(mdo sde): dran pa yin te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no/ /gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas tshe rabs
121b4(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs rjes su dran pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
121b5(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran
121b6(mdo sde): pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
121b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang
122a1(mdo sde): zag chos smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang ma
122a2(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen
122a3(mdo sde): pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin
122a4(mdo sde): no| |rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams
122a5(mdo sde): pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o/ /lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / cho ga nyams pa'i gang
122a6(mdo sde): zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo can gyi gang zag rnam par
122a7(mdo sde): spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / khyim pa dang sten pa rnam
122b1(mdo sde): par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas na sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' des gnas 'di
122b2(mdo sde): dag rnam par spong ba'i tshe gang zag de dag la zhe sdang ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /khong khro ba'i sems dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan
122b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni/ khams so sor bsten te/ bsten par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal gyi/ de bas na/ bdag gis bsten pa yongs su spang
122b4(mdo sde): bar sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
