122b5(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su
122b6(mdo sde): dag pa rnams yin/ lus rma med pa rnams yin/ lus legs par grub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yin/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba
122b7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams yin/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /
123a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob pa rnams yin no/ /byang chub sems
123a2(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos
123a3(mdo sde): nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sa dang po la byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus mi mnyam
123a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus
123a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba dang / gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus rma med pa 'thob bo/ /sa bzhi pa la byang
123a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa 'thob bo/ /sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir
123a7(mdo sde): chos kyi lus 'thob bo/ /sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba
123b1(mdo sde): 'thob bo/ /sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob bo/ /sa brgyad pa la spros pa
123b2(mdo sde): thams cad bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo/ /sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo/ /sa bcu
123b3(mdo sde): pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes par bya ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
123b4(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyid tha dad du bgyi ba
123b5(mdo sde): mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ lus tha dad pas tha dad du bya ba med de/ yon tan gyi mthus ni/ tha dad du bya ba yod do/ /byang chub
123b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la/ yon tan gyi mthus tha dad du bgyi
123b7(mdo sde): ba mchis pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ lus lus zhes bya ba 'di ni/ tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus su brjod pa'i
124a1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /yon tan dang / mthu'i mtshan nyid ni/ tha dad par blta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
124a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bas
124a3(mdo sde): na| don gyi dbang 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byi dor ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che dang / byi dor byas pa'i
124a4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che ni/ 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya bar nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ji ltar byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che'i
124a5(mdo sde): mthu dang / yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa de ltar ni/ byi dor ma byas pas ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
124a6(mdo sde): sku'i nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de bzhin gshegs
124a7(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ni/ sems can gyi khams tshad
124b1(mdo sde): med pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/
124b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de tsam du khyab par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar dri ma'i lhag ma lus pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta
124b3(mdo sde): ste| dper na/ tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ni/ zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas zla ba nya ba'i bar du zla ba yang zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ chos gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba
124b4(mdo sde): de lta bur zla ba nya ba la ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs
124b5(mdo sde): pa'i skur bcas te lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi
124b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba nya ba'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus
124b7(mdo sde): su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni/ ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
125a1(mdo sde): lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ khro ba
125a2(mdo sde): dang / gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad
125a3(mdo sde): po de dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin /
125a4(mdo sde): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/
125a5(mdo sde): bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams
125a6(mdo sde): yin| 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams
125a7(mdo sde): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams yin/ mchod
125b1(mdo sde): par 'os pa rnams yin/ phyin par byed pa rnams yin/ brtan par bya ba rnams yin/ nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/ rgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
125b2(mdo sde): tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas
125b3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas ji ltar na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas
125b4(mdo sde): pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/ rgyal po dang / rgyal po chen po'i blon po dag gis bkur ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub
125b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/
125b6(mdo sde): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang slob pa dang /
125b7(mdo sde): mi slob pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os
126a1(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/ 'brog dgon pa lam grogs kyi tshogs 'chan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde
126a2(mdo sde): zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang na sems can lam grogs
126a3(mdo sde): kyi tshogs nyon mongs pa'i 'chan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon
126a4(mdo sde): chen po la brten na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten
126a5(mdo sde): na| mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/
126a6(mdo sde): dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/ rgyal po dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ de bzhin
126a7(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded
126b1(mdo sde): dpon chen po ni/ nam phyogs su 'gro bar chas te lam grogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe grong khyer chen
126b2(mdo sde): por phyin gyi bar du rgyags phun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
126b3(mdo sde): d ed dpon chen po'ang nam sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing sems can lam grogs mang po dang de 'khor ba'i 'phrog dgon pa chen por 'jug par
126b4(mdo sde): 'dod la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pas 'gro'o/ rigs kyi bu
126b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUR+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru la sogs pa mang
126b6(mdo sde): po bsags shing phyogs su 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i
126b7(mdo sde): tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shin tu bsags shing 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/ nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /byang chub
127a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang chos kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/ 'di lta
127a2(mdo sde): ste| nor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtso bo dang / dbang yod pa dang / ngag mnyan pas lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub
127a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yongs kyi gtso bo dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ma log par smra bas sems can lam
127a4(mdo sde): grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni/ grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin
127a5(mdo sde): no| |de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar
127a6(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de
127a7(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no//
127b1(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lam mnyam pa'ang rab tu shes/ lam nyam nga ba'ang rab tu shes/ lam bde ba'ang rab tu shes/ 'tsham pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/ lam chu che ba dang /
127b2(mdo sde): chu med pa'ang rab tu shes/ lam gyi dgong ma la dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam gyi tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'khyog pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam drang po dag kyang rab
127b3(mdo sde): tu shes| lam 'byung ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang
127b4(mdo sde): ldan na| byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lam ston
127b5(mdo sde): gyi nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to/ /nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam mi ston to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
127b6(mdo sde): kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis lam ston gyi rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mi ston to/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang
127b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mi ston to/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen
128a1(mdo sde): pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam dang / stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag gi
128a2(mdo sde): lam mi ston to/ /mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston gyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa mi ston to/ /sems g.yeng pa'i
128a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi lam ston gyi g.yeng ba'i lam mi ston to/ /spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid kyi
128a4(mdo sde): lam ston gyi byis pa spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lam mi ston to/ /'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston gyi 'khor
128a5(mdo sde): ba'i lam mi ston to/ /lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la lam srol ma dod pa ma yin pa dang / tsher ma med pa'i lam ston gyi nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang
128a6(mdo sde): ba'i lam mi ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam log par ston pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
128a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas
128b1(mdo sde): so| |tshor ba rnams dang / sems rnams dang / chos rnams dang / yul rnams dang / dgon pa rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang /
128b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa rnams
128b3(mdo sde): dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/
128b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag
128b5(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongs su spong ngo / /de 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas brtsams te yar la klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go /lus la bdag
128b6(mdo sde): med par yang rtog go / lus mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chu rgyus kyis glags pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste/ de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe
128b7(mdo sde): gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang / lus la 'dod chags pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / lus la zhen pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ de'i rgyu/
129a1(mdo sde): de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur
129a2(mdo sde): te| de ltar na/ lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di
129a3(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ tshor ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams ni/ bde
129a4(mdo sde): bar 'dzin te/ byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal bde ba zhes bya bar 'dzin gyi/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni/ thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud do snyam nas de spang
129a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir nan tan du byed do/ /sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyi/ bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam ste/ de de ltar rtog pas tshor
129a6(mdo sde): ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /de tshor ba dag la chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med cing de dag spang ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ /gzhan
129a7(mdo sde): dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu
129b1(mdo sde): nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems 'di ni/ mi rtag pa la rtag par mngon par dga' ba'o/ /sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o/ /bdag
129b2(mdo sde): med pa la bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'o/ /mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o/ /g.yo zhing mi brtan pa la myur du 'gyur ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o/ /
129b3(mdo sde): ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o/ /bde 'gro rnams chud son pa'o/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rkyen du gyur pa'o/ /chos
129b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi thog mar sems 'gro ste/ sems yongs su shes na/ chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang
129b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten sems kyis bris pa ste/ /sems ni sems kyis mi mthong ngo / /dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i/ /las ni sems kyis bsags pa'o/ /sems ni 'gal me lta bur 'khor//
129b6(mdo sde): sems ni rta ltar 'khyams pa yin/ /sems ni nags kyi me ltar tshig/ sems ni chu chen bzhin du skyed/ /de de ltar rtog pas sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas
129b7(mdo sde): te| sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro'o/ sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/ sems nyid de'i dbang du gyur pas chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems
130a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di
130a2(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa dang / de dag la gnas pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams
130a3(mdo sde): so| |zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cing de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson
130a4(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /chos 'di dag ni/ dge ba'o/ /zhes bya bar shes nas chos de dag la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog ste/ chos de dag kyang yang dag par blangs shing
130a5(mdo sde): gnas so/ /gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang
130a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra
130a7(mdo sde): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la chags par 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro ba'i sems kyang mi skyed de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag dngos po med pa'i
130b1(mdo sde): chos rnams la chags pa skyed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha ste/ de ni/ bdag byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags
130b2(mdo sde): par gyur nas zhen par 'gyur ro/ /zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /rmongs nas dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams bar sgom par mi 'gyur te/ de'i rgyus ngan song du 'gro bar
130b3(mdo sde): gsungs so/ /zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar bdag chos gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha ste/ de ni/ bdag gi mi bzod pa dang / dang du mi lan pa
130b4(mdo sde): dang / khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni/ smad par 'gyur/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni/ dpya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de de ltar rtog
130b5(mdo sde): pas yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ yul rnams kyis mi rmas shing rma byung bar mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang bslab pa bcas pa de nyid la 'god de/
130b6(mdo sde): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar
130b7(mdo sde): bzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa med par rnam pa spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/ /zhi bar rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas
131a1(mdo sde): so| |dgon pa la ni/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gzhan gyi sems mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag bdag gis sems dang / sems las
131a2(mdo sde): byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/ bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed cing sems pa de ni/ bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la bya ba thams cad
131a3(mdo sde): dang bral nas tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la sgom pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu
131a4(mdo sde): nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
131a5(mdo sde): rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal
131a6(mdo sde): b o'i pho brang 'khor dag na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na gnas gang tshul dang mi 'dra zhing yongs su spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi mthun pa de dag
131a7(mdo sde): yongs su spong ngo / /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chang ma'i khyim mam/ smad tshong gi khyim mam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ rgyan po'i gnas sam/ ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi
131b1(mdo sde): tshogs sam/ gar mkhan dang / glu gar gyi gnas dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'dra ba de dag yongs su spong zhing / de dag la dran pa
131b2(mdo sde): shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
131b3(mdo sde): dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag
131b4(mdo sde): la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la
131b5(mdo sde): sems gtong ste/ ci nas kyang zhen par mi 'gyur/ sred pa mi skyed/ chags pa mi skyed/ bdag gir mi byed/ nor du mi 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir mi 'dzin pa dang / ci nas kyang
131b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du byas shing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba de ltar gtong ste/ gal te yang de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis
131b7(mdo sde): grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa zhig byung yang des khengs par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal mi skye/ rgyags pa mi skye ste/ de 'di snyam du sems so/ /ring por mi thogs par
132a1(mdo sde): grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang las byung ba dang / gang gis byung ba dang / grags ba dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa gang yin
132a2(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyang med par 'gyur na/ de la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing mi gnas pa'i chos mi brtan pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba dag la dga'
132a3(mdo sde): ba'i sems skyes pa'am/ khengs par 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang /
132a4(mdo sde): grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab
132a5(mdo sde): pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang
132a6(mdo sde): bslab pa 'di nyid la bslab ste mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang bslab pa 'di
132a7(mdo sde): nyid la bslabs shing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang
132b1(mdo sde): bslab pa 'di nyid la bslab ste mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /zhes de ltar yid ches pas bslab pa rnams la nan tan du byed pa yin te
132b2(mdo sde): brtson par byed pa dang / legs par bya ba byed cing shin tu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa
132b3(mdo sde): shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams
132b4(mdo sde): cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun
132b5(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag gang las byung ba dang / rkyen gang gis byung ba'i gzhi'ang rab tu shes te/ des de ltar shes nas 'byung ba de
132b6(mdo sde): dang / rkyen de dag yongs su spong ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams
132b7(mdo sde): cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam
133a1(mdo sde): par bzhag pa rnams yin no/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin/ bam po drug pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar
133a2(mdo sde): khrod pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ sems dma' ba rnams yin/ yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ de la ma
133a3(mdo sde): zhen pa rnams yin/ nyes par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ yon tan du lta ba rnams yin/ bdag la mi bstod pa rnams yin/ gzhan la mi smod pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims
133a4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lha 'du ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pa nas ji ltar
133a5(mdo sde): na| lha 'du ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dad cing bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad
133a6(mdo sde): cing yid ches pa yin/ de srog gi phyir yang yang dag par blangs pa mi 'jig cing yang dag par blangs pa las mi 'gyur te/ de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pas bsam
133a7(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / de sems dma' zhing nga rgyal med pa yin/ de nga rgyal med cing sems dpa' bas phyag dar khrod pa ngan ngon yongs su bor ba skye bo thams cad
133b1(mdo sde): dang mi mthun pa dag sdud do/ /de dag bsdus nas 'khru bar byed do/ /de 'khru ba dang / glan pa dang / btsem pa dang / btso bar byed pa na kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su mi skyo
133b2(mdo sde): ste| yongs su mi skyo ba rkyen du byas nas ji tsam gyis don 'grub par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par de la zhen par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni/ zhigs pa'o/ /kye
133b3(mdo sde): ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni/ sbom pa'o/ /kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni/ shig mang ba ste/ lus la mi bde zhing rdul 'byin to/ /zhes nyes par lta ba ma yin gyi/ phyag dar
133b4(mdo sde): khrod pa 'di dag ni/ drang srong gis bgos pa'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba dang mthun pa'o/ /'phags pa'i rigs dang mthun pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'o/ /de bzhin
133b5(mdo sde): gshegs pas bsngags pa'o/ /zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan tu lta ba yin te/ de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis bdag la mi bstod do/ /gzhan la mi smod do/ /de
133b6(mdo sde): bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa dang bral bas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas lha rnams 'du ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs
133b7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su btsa' ba yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ bram ze dang / rgyal
134a1(mdo sde): rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin/ tshangs pa mtshungs pa spyod pa rnams kyis gzengs bstod par bya ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu
134a2(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
134a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams la spyod pa dman tshegs kyis ci zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
134a4(mdo sde): rnams ni/ 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyor ba yin te/ stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams 'jig rten dang mthun par spyod kyi stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/ rigs
134a5(mdo sde): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu ma thob pas ni/ nyon mongs pa ma langs pa'i gnyen po bsten par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/
134a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos sam/ 'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom
134a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i lan gsol du bdag gis tshig mi phyin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ mos pa la smos
134b1(mdo sde): pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ chos gzigs pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni/ chos gzigs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang la'ang mos par bgyi ba ma mchis so/ /
134b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi'i mi rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mos pa
134b3(mdo sde): d man pa gzhan dag la spyad pa dman tshegs ston cing de dag gi mdun du sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
134b4(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag de lta bus 'dul ba'i slad du ste/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa
134b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skyes pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
134b6(mdo sde): stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir phyag dar khrod par 'gyur gyi/ dman pa la mos pa'i phyir ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
134b7(mdo sde): phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chog shes pa
135a1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'dod pa chung ba rnams yin/ kun tu btsal ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ gsog pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ bsags pa chud zos pa dang bral
135a2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ bsags pa chud zos pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba rnams yin/ yid mi bde ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'khrug pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ len pa med
135a3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog shes shing 'dod pa chung ba yin/
135a4(mdo sde): de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba med pa yin/ kun tu tshol ba med pas na gsog pa med pa yin/ gsog pa med pas na bsags pa chud za ba med pa yin/ bsags
135a5(mdo sde): pa chud za ba med pas na bsags pa chud zos pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa yin/ sdug bsngal med pas na yid mi bde ba med pa yin/ yid mi bde ba med pas na
135a6(mdo sde): 'khrug pa med pa yin/ 'khrug pa med pas na len pa med pa yin/ len pa med pas na zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de
135a7(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phying pa can rnams yin no/ /
135b1(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi bsam pas mi 'gro ste/ de'i phyir phying pa can zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du zhe sdang gi bsam pas mi 'gro/ gti mug gi bsam pas mi 'gro
135b2(mdo sde): khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam pas mi 'gro/ phrag dog dang ser sna'i bsam pas mi 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi bsam pas mi 'gro/ grags pa 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/ shes
135b3(mdo sde): kyi khe 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi 'gro zhing bdud la mi 'dud/ dga' bar byas nas snyems pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir phying pa
135b4(mdo sde): can zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phying pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
135b5(mdo sde): bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa rnams yin/ mthar gyis bsod snyoms len pa rnams yin/ yongs su
135b6(mdo sde): yi chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ chog shes pa rnams yin/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ bsod snyoms bza' ba
135b7(mdo sde): la tshod shes pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu yongs su bsdus pa rnams yin/ ril po'i 'du shes med pa rnams
136a1(mdo sde): yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa yin pa nas ji ltar na/ ril po'i 'du shes med pa'i bar
136a2(mdo sde): du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ldan pa sdug bsngal pa dag mthong na/ sems can
136a3(mdo sde): de dag la phan par bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms pa'i yi dam 'dzin te/ de nam grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong 'dab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ba de'i tshe dran pa shin tu nye bar
136a4(mdo sde): bzhag pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pas dbang po mi g.yo ba dang / dbang po mi rgod pa dang / dbang po dul ba dang / gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la dran
136a5(mdo sde): pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o/ /de bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro na de bsod snyoms mthar gyis len pa yin te/ mgo 'phang bstod cing bram ze'i
136a6(mdo sde): rigs shing sA la ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong ngam/ rgyal rigs shing sA la ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong ngam/ khyim bdag shing sA la ltar che zhing mtho ba'i grong 'byor pa dag
136a7(mdo sde): tu mi 'jug gi / mtha' gcig nas bzung ste na ma de'i don grub par gyur gyi bar du bsod snyoms la spyod de/ gzhan du na gnas gang na khyi za ba'am/ ba drus ma'am/
136b1(mdo sde): byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rang bzhin gyis ngang tshul ngan pa'i srog chags sam/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo kyal ka bya ba'i bsam pa can dag yod
136b2(mdo sde): pa'am| smad pa'i gnas thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la 'gro na yongs su yi mi chad cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med la/ sems
136b3(mdo sde): can de dag la chags pa'ang mi skyed/ khong khro ba'ang mi skyed de/ yongs su yi chad pa med pas so so ci rigs pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog shes pa yin te/ des bsod snyoms
136b4(mdo sde): de blangs nas bdag gi gnas su 'ongs te lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag /rkang lag bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
136b5(mdo sde): rten rnams la bkur sti dang / rim gro byas te gnas su song nas bsod snyoms de las cha gcig ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir gzhog go /gnyis pa ni/
136b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi phyir gzhog go/ gsum pa ni/ sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi phyir gzhog go /cha bzhi pa ni/ bdag za ste/ de za ba na 'dod chags med
136b7(mdo sde): par za ste/ chags par ma yin/ brkam par ma yin/ zhen par ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na ji tsam du lus gnas par 'gyur ba dang / 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir za ste/ ji ltar ha
137a1(mdo sde): cang yang nyams dma' ba dang / ha cang yang lus lci bar mi 'gyur ba ltar ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ha cang yang nyams dmas na ni/ dge ba'i phyogs
137a2(mdo sde): la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/ /lus ha cang lcis na ni/ gnyid kyis non par 'gyur ro/ /des bsod snyoms de zos nas dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa
137a3(mdo sde): dang | brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / le lo med pa dang / snyom pa med pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
137a4(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dus pas bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa yin/ bdag tu 'dzin pa med pas bdag gi shas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi
137a5(mdo sde): bu| chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig
137a6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud thams cad kyis bsdigs kyang byang chub kyi snying po'i stan gcig las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten
137a7(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i bsam gtan las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye
137b1(mdo sde): shes las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ stong pa nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las mi g.yo ba rnams
137b2(mdo sde): yin| lam las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
137b3(mdo sde): stan las mi g.yo ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ stan gcig po ni/ 'di yin te/ de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan no/ /rigs kyi bu/ stan gcig po ni/
137b4(mdo sde): 'di yin te/ de ni/ chos kyi stan no/ /stan de las byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi g.yo ste/ de bas na/ stan gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang
137b5(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no/ /
137b6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi brkam pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ mi chags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ de dag gis nam tshod bzung bar gyur pa de'i tshe nyi tshod
137b7(mdo sde): yod dam med kyang rung ste/ de dag gi lus ston pa'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ sbrang rtsi'am/ bu ram mam/ rtsa ba'i khu ba'am/ sdong po'i khu ba'am/
138a1(mdo sde): 'bras bu'i khu ba de lta bu dag bzar mi rung ngo / /gzhan za ba mthong na'ang khong khro ba'i sems dang / 'jungs pa'i sems kyang mi skyed do/ /yang gal te
138a2(mdo sde): zas phyis mi len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ji lta bu'i nad kyis srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'am/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du 'gyur te nad tshabs che na/ des 'gyod
138a3(mdo sde): pa med cing the tshom med par byas la sman yin par sems nye bar bzhag pas spyad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa
138a4(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
138a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa rnams
138a6(mdo sde): yin| dbang po ma nyams pa rnams yin/ mang du thos pa rnams yin/ nus pa rnams yin/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ ri dwags dang 'dra
138a7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ lus kyi mtha' bsrings pa rnams yin/ dben pa la mngon du phyogs pa rnams yin/ mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
138b1(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin pa nas ji ltar na/ mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
138b2(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ chos nyid la
138b3(mdo sde): mkhas shing cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / 'gro ba dang / phyir 'gro ba la mkhas pas gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyi
138b4(mdo sde): bslab pa'i lam bstan pa de la 'di lta ste/ don dang / tshig dang / 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis mi bkri ba yin no/ /de ltung ba byung
138b5(mdo sde): na ltung ba las 'byung ba rab tu shes shing gnas de dag kyang yongs su spong ngo / /gnas de dag la gus pa byed cing 'chags pa mang ba yin no/ /sdig pa de la smod cing 'gyod
138b6(mdo sde): de mthol bar byed do/ /gnas gang dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang dag tu mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang dag tu chen por 'gyur ba
138b7(mdo sde): dang | gang dag tu 'bring dang / gang dag tu chung dur 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i yun ji srid pa de dag kyang rab tu shes/ de'ang
139a1(mdo sde): nan tan gyis sgrub bo/ /de mig gi dbang po ma nyams pa dang / rna ba'i dbang po ma nyams shing yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad ma nyams par dgon phan
139a2(mdo sde): gnas te/ gnas gang na 'tsho ba med pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas so/ /gnas gang dag na bsod snyoms blang ba'i spyod yul dang ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye
139a3(mdo sde): ba dang / gnas gang dag na chu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa/ gtsang zhing dri ma med pa/ tshegs chung ba yod pa dang / gnas gang na shing phun sum tshogs pa/ me tog phun
139a4(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ lo ma phun sum tshogs pa/ gcan gzan khro bo med pa/ phug dang ldan pa/ sman gshong dang ldan pa/ thag thug med
139a5(mdo sde): pa| 'gro na bde ba/ zhi ba/ gnyis su med pa'i gnas de 'dra ba dag na gnas so/ /de gnas de dag na gnas shing gang des sngon blags pa dang / sngon thos pa de nyin lan
139a6(mdo sde): gsum mtshan lan gsum du sgra ha cang yang mi che/ ha cang yang mi chung ba dang / dbang po mi rgod cing phyir rol tu ma song ba'i sems kyis dad pas nye bar 'tsho zhing tshig nye
139a7(mdo sde): bar bzung ste mtshan ma 'dzin cing gnyid kyis ma log par kha ton byed do/ /gal te dge slong dgon pa pa'i drung du rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan
139b1(mdo sde): bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ grong pa'am/ yul gyi mi dag 'ongs na/ de de dag la gus par legs par 'ongs so/ /zhes brjod par bya ste/ des rgyal po chen po ji ltar gdan bting
139b2(mdo sde): pa la bzhugs shig / ces de skad byas nas gal te 'dug nas gnyi ga'ang 'dug par bya'o/ /de ste mi 'dug na gnyi ga'ang mi 'dug par bya'o/ /gal te dbang po rgod par gyur na/
139b3(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis phyogs na dge slong dang / bram ze rnams tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ mang du thos pa dag mi rgod dang / spre'u rnams kyis ma
139b4(mdo sde): gtses par gnas pa de ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /zhes bstod par bya'o/ /de ste brtan zhing dul la dbang po rab tu zhi ba zhig yin te/ chos bstan par rung na/ de la chos
139b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs bstan par bya'o/ /de ste chos sna tshogs bstan pa la mi dga' na/ de la skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstan par bya'o/ /de ste skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstan pa la
139b6(mdo sde): mi dga' na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rgya che ba/ rgya che ba dag bstan par bya'o/ /bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi dag 'ongs na'ang ci
139b7(mdo sde): rigs par bya ba dag bya'o/ /de de ltar mang du thos pas chos nyan pa rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa yin te/ sems can de dag kyang de la dga' ba dang / dad pa
140a1(mdo sde): dang | rangs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa kun nas langs pa rnams kyi gnyen po'ang nus pa yin no/ /mang du phos pa'i stobs bskyed pas bdag
140a2(mdo sde): tu 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin no/ /de bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bas dgon pa de na mi 'jigs/ mi skrag /mi dngang / bag tsha ba med cing / rab tu dben pa la
140a3(mdo sde): mngon du phyogs par gyur te gnas so/ /de dgon pa de na dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing 'du 'dzi med par gnas pas ri dwags dang 'dra ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
140a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dgon pa pa ni/ ri dwags ltar rtag tu 'jigs pa ma yin te/ de la ri dwags kyi nyes pa yang med mod kyi/ ji ltar ri dwags dag bdag 'di'i lan bon gyi/ srog
140a5(mdo sde): gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes yul dang yul gyi phyogs ring po bas kyang ring por spong ba 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdag 'di'i lan bon gyi/ yi dam
140a6(mdo sde): gyi bar chad dam/ sems g.yeng bar gyur na mi rung ngo / /zhes bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang 'du 'dzi mi byed cing 'du 'dzi dag thag ring po
140a7(mdo sde): bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo / /de de ltar thag bsrings te gnas pas dben pa la mngon par phyogs pa yin/ de rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs pas dgon
140b1(mdo sde): pa de la yon tan du lta ba dang / zhi bar lta ba yin/ de yon tan du lta zhing zhi bar lta bas na/ mi dga' ba dang mi 'dre'o/ /mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pas na/ dgon pa'i chos rnams
140b2(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs nas spyod de/ de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa nas mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin
140b3(mdo sde): no| |rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing
140b4(mdo sde): drung pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong dang ha cang nye ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ grong dang ha cang ring ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ ldam ldum tsher ma can gyis
140b5(mdo sde): gang ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ shing ma lu ta dang / ka bya ka tsu'i 'khri shing gis gang ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ shing lo ma bskams pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ spre'u gnas
140b6(mdo sde): pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ bya gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ gcan gzan khro bo gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ 'gron po gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ mi g.yon can
140b7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten gyi/ gang na lus bag yangs shing sems dga' bar 'gyur ba'i shing drung de lta bur rten to/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
141a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shing drung pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe
141a2(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ dgun nam/ dpyid dam/ dbyar ram/ ston yang rung ste/ rtsig drung na mi gnas/ shing drung na ma yin/ sog ma spubs par ma yin/ ri'i sman gshong du ma yin/
141a3(mdo sde): chu lkog tu ma yin/ grang ba skyob par yang mi byed/ rlung skyob par ma yin/ char skyob pa ma yin/ nyi ma skyob pa ma yin/ ba mo'i skyabs kyang mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na gal te byang
141a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa pa nam lus kyis mi nus par gyur na/ des gtsug lag khang du gnas te nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sbyangs pa'i
141a5(mdo sde): yon tan bcas te/ ci nas kyang bdag gtsug lag khang na gnas bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar 'bad pa de ltar bya'o/ /zhes sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gtsug lag
141a6(mdo sde): khang de la'ang chags pa mi skyed de zhen par yang ma yin no/ /de'ang 'di ltar sems te/ sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams la phan gdags par bya'i/ bdag cag gis bdag nyid
141a7(mdo sde): gso bar mi bya'o snyam ste/ de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bla gab med pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
141b1(mdo sde): dpa' bla gab med pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gang na gnas kyang
141b2(mdo sde): rung | skyo ba med pa rnams yin/ de dag shi ba'i 'du shes rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nye bar gzhog pa yin/ de dag rnam par zos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dmar bar 'du
141b3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / rnam par sdos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dul bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par bam par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par 'thor bar
141b4(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / keng rus su 'du shes pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nye bar gzhog pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas ni/ byams pa'i sems su bya'o/ /
141b5(mdo sde): phan pa'i sems dang / sems can la snying brtse ba dang / tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra'i cho ga dang ldan zhing sha dang 'bags pa med par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dur
141b6(mdo sde): khrod kyi gam yon ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sha za ba mthong na ma dad pa skye zhing gtse bar sems pa'i mi ma yin pa dag gnas pa yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
141b7(mdo sde): dur khrod pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag byas/ dge slong rgan rabs rnams la phyag byas te/ gsar bu rnams kyang dga' bar byas
142a1(mdo sde): la 'greng ste 'dug par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi mal stan la 'dug par mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyar
142a2(mdo sde): bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa ni/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten dang mi mthun gyi/ 'phags pa dang ni/ mi mthun pa med do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa'
142a3(mdo sde): dur khrod pa gang zag gi mal stan la bdar na/ des ci nas kyang 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan gyis kyang dpya bar mi 'gyur bar shin tu rtogs par byas la/ dge slong de'i
142a4(mdo sde): bsam pa'ang shes nas gdod stan de la gdol bu dang 'dra bar dma' ba'i sems kyis stan de la 'dug par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
142a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tsog pu pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yongs
142a6(mdo sde): su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/ sems yongs su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/ gnyid kyis non te 'dug pa ma yin/ lus dub pas 'dug pa ma
142a7(mdo sde): yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' tsog pu pa 'dug pa ni/ byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su bkang ba'i phyir 'dug go /sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir 'dug go /lam mngon
142b1(mdo sde): du bya ba'i phyir 'dug go / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug go /sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'dug go /nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir 'dug go /rigs
142b2(mdo sde): kyi bu| chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tsog pu pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams
142b3(mdo sde): yin no| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mal stan la ma chags pa rnams yin/ bdag nyid kyang mal snyan mi 'ding / gzhan yang 'ding du mi 'jug /gding ba'i phyir brda mi byed
142b4(mdo sde): cing | gzhan du na lo mas gang ba'am/ rtswa sa gang ba'i gnas kyang rung ste/ gnas de dag tu nyal bar byed cing sa gang gi phyogs na sprul gyis gang ba'am/ sbrang ma dang / sha
142b5(mdo sde): sbrang gis gang ba'am/ khung mang ba de dag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo / /de dag nyal ba na glo g.yas pas nyal bar byed de/ rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas
142b6(mdo sde): lus chos gos dag gis shin tu g.yogs shing dran pa dang shes bzhin du snang ba'i 'du shes dang / ldang ba'i 'du shes su nyal bar byed de/ gnyid kyis bde ba la chags par
142b7(mdo sde): mi byed/ snyes pa'i bde ba la'ang ma yin te/ gzhan du na de dag ci com 'byung ba chen po gnas shing 'tsho ba'i phyir nyal bar byed la/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag
143a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams yin
143a2(mdo sde): no| |rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa sgom pa mang ba rnams
143a3(mdo sde): yin| byams pa sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ skyon la mkhas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid sgom pa mang ba
143a4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ mtshan ma med pa sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ rnal 'byor sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ rgyun du sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/
143a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
143a6(mdo sde): dpa' gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag par bzhugs nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis lus drang po drang po dang / lus bags
143a7(mdo sde): kyis glod pas skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis de 'di snyam du sems so/ /ji snyed du mi'i nang na kha zas dang / zas
143b1(mdo sde): skom gtsang ma'ang rung / bzang po'ang rung / ngan pa'ang rung / ro phun sum tshogs pa'ang rung / ro chung ba'ang rung ste/ de thams cad lus kyi mes reg pa dang / btsog par 'gyur te/ rul
143b2(mdo sde): cing dri nga ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'phrod pa yin na/ de la byis pa 'di dag ni/ shin tu zhen cing rab tu chags so/ /bdag cag ni/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnas
143b3(mdo sde): te| yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus la ma zhen ma chags par bya'o/ /de'i phyir skyo ba'i sems kyang mi bskyod do snyam ste/ de
143b4(mdo sde): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa sgom pa mang ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
143b5(mdo sde): dpa' gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur te nang du yang dag par bzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs te shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis lus drang po drang po dang / lus bags kyis
143b6(mdo sde): glod pas skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sems so/ /sems can gang dag khro ba dang gnod sems mang ba/ mi
143b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i las byed pa rnams dang / gang rnams bdag la rgol ba dang / dgra bo gcugs med par shar gnyer ba rnams byung ba'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang rung ste/ bdag gis de dag
144a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi khro ba dang / gnod sems rab tu zhi bar byas te byang chub kyi snying po la 'god par bya'o/ /de'ang ngag tsam gyis ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas sems
144a2(mdo sde): te| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgom pa mang ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/ 'di la
144a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags skyes pa dang / khro ba skyes pa dang / gnod sems kyi sems skyes na/ 'di snyam du sems so/ /chos 'di su la skye ba de yang rten cing 'brel
144a4(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba'o/ /chos gang skye ba de'ang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /rkyen gang dag gis skye ba de dag kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos
144a5(mdo sde): gsog de dag la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag la rma 'byin snyam ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgom pa mang ba yin no/ /ji
144a6(mdo sde): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyon la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag gi rgyud la skyon yod pa de dag spang ba'i phyir nan tan byed/ gzhan
144a7(mdo sde): gyi rgyud la yod pa mi nus pa'i rang bzhin de dag la'ang btang snyoms su gnas so/ /skyon de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la ri mo mi byed pa dang / chos dang /
144b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / 'phags pa rnams dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams la ri mo mi byed pa ni/ skyon no/ /bdag la
144b2(mdo sde): ri mo byed pa dang / gzhan la brnyas pa dang / yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang /
144b3(mdo sde): srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mi rtag par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa
144b4(mdo sde): rnams la mnyes par mi byed pa dang / byis pa'i skye bo dang sten pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su spong ba dang / sems can ngan pa'i ngang tshul can la bsnyen bkur byed pa
144b5(mdo sde): dang | sdig pa'i grogs po la sten pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dang / mdo sde zab mo spong ba dang / mdo sde zab mos skrag pa dang / snyoms las dang / le lo
144b6(mdo sde): dang | bdag la brnyas pa dang / gzi brjid chung ba dang / spobs pa med pa dang / gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa dang / mi 'gyod pa la 'gyod pa dang / 'gyod pa la mi 'gyod pa dang / sgrib
144b7(mdo sde): pa kun nas ldang bas glags pa dang / g.yo sgyus bcings pa dang / rmugs shing gnyid kyis non pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / rus la 'dod chags pa dang / rigs
145a1(mdo sde): la 'dod chags pa dang / lta ba la 'dod chags pa dang / yul la 'dod chags pa dang / 'khor la 'dod chags pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan gyi gsang tshig
145a2(mdo sde): la sten pa dang / dam pa'i chos las 'byol ba dang / yi dam 'dor ba dang / mi dge ba dang ldan pa dag la rtsol ba dang / dge ba dang ldan pa dag la mi rtsol ba dang / rab tu
145a3(mdo sde): byung ba dang sde ba dang / skyes pa dang sde ba dang / bud med dang sde ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo dang sde ba dang / mu stegs can dang sde ba dang / dgon pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /
145a4(mdo sde): zas kyi tshod mi shes pa dang / bla ma'i drung du mi 'gro ba dang / kha ton gyi dus mi shes pa dang / spyod yul gyi gnas mi shes pa dang / bslab pa phra mo dag la gus par mi byed pa
145a5(mdo sde): dang | sdig pa chung ngu rnams la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / dbang po gti mug gis bsgribs pa dang ldan pa dang / g.yeng ba la dbang po grims pa dang / rgod par spyod pa
145a6(mdo sde): dang | bcos dka' ba dang / bka' blo mi bde ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dag la mtshan ma dang / mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang / khro ba rnams
145a7(mdo sde): la sems mi byams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying mi brtse ba dang / na bas skyo bar mi byed pa dang / shi bas mi skrag pa dang / kun nas 'bar ba las mi 'byung
145b1(mdo sde): ba dang / lus la so sor mi rtog pa dang / tshul khrims la so sor mi rtog pa dang / ci byas ci byed ci bya zhes so sor mi rtog pa dang / mi bsam pa la sems pa dang / mi rtag pa la
145b2(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / mi smon pa la smon pa dang / mi 'byung ba la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / mi dga' ba la dga' bar 'du shes pa dang / lam ma yin pa la lam du 'du shes pa dang /
145b3(mdo sde): ma thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang / 'phral gyi bya ba la chags pa dang / byed pa ngan pas g.yeng ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs rgya chen po rnam par spong ba dang / theg pa chen po la
145b4(mdo sde): mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan
145b5(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / rtsod pa lhur byed pa dang / 'thab pa'i ngang tshul can dang / brlang ba dang / rtsub pa dang /
145b6(mdo sde): pho theg can dang / spyi rtol che ba dang / gtum pa dang / gdug pa dang / ngag mi snyan pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / mi gtsigs par smra ba dang / ngan du smra bas smra ba dang / rdzun zer
145b7(mdo sde): ba dang / spros pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / spros pa la gzhol ba ni/ skyon no/ /de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid
146a1(mdo sde): sgom pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas gnas gang dang gang dag la sems 'jug cing sems mngon par dad pa'i gnas
146a2(mdo sde): de dang de dag la ngo bo nyid yongs su btsal na stong par rtogs so/ /sems de gang yin pa de'ang yongs su brtags na stong pa'o/ /gang gis brtags pa de yang stong par
146a3(mdo sde): rtogs so/ /de de ltar rtog pas mtshan ma med pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de la nang gi mtshan ma gang dang gang snang bar gyur pa de dang de dag mtshan ma med par
146a4(mdo sde): byed do| |ci nas kyang lus mi dmigs pa dang / lus la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang / lus la sems mi gtong ba dang / phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams mi dmigs
146a5(mdo sde): pa dang / phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang / sems mi gtong ba de ltar mtshan ma med par byed de/ /de phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral
146a6(mdo sde): ba dang / lus kyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral bas nang gi mtshan ma rnams spang ba'i phyir zhugs te sgom pa la mngon par dga' ba bskyed do/ /de sgom pa mang bas rtag tu sgom
146a7(mdo sde): pa la brtson pa yin/ rgyun mi 'chad par zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la gnas pas gnas pa yin/ de la zhi gnas ni/ sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /lhag mthong ni/
146b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos so sor rtog pa'o/ /de sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gyod pa med cing rab tu dga' ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar tshul khrims
146b2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ rnal 'byor spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams la ni/ rnal
146b3(mdo sde): 'byor yang dag par 'grub bo/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni/ rnal 'byor la spyod de/ de bas na/ rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu
146b4(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ /
146b5(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi zang zing gi phyir ma yin no/ /bstan pa kun bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi rnyed pa'i phyir ma
146b6(mdo sde): yin no| |dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi bkur sti'i phyir ma yin no/ /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams rjes
146b7(mdo sde): su gzung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin no/ /mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir thos pa
147a1(mdo sde): 'dzin to/ /sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to/ /shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba'i sems can rnams shes rab kyi
147a2(mdo sde): mig thob par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos
147a3(mdo sde): pa 'dzin to/ /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa chen po'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to/ /bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa'i
147a4(mdo sde): ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi theg pa chung ngu la ni/ mi smon to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde
147a5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'ang rab tu
147a6(mdo sde): shes| 'dul ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes/ 'dul ba zab pa'ang rab tu shes/ 'dul ba zhib pa'ang rab tu shes/ rung ba dang mi rung ba'ang rab tu shes/ rang bzhin gyis kha
147a7(mdo sde): na ma tho ba'ang rab tu shes/ bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba'ang rab tu shes/ so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i gleng gzhi dang 'byung ba'ang rab tu shes/ nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'ang rab
147b1(mdo sde): tu shes| byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'ang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi
147b2(mdo sde): bu| chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi
147b3(mdo sde): bslab pa dag la shin tu bslab pa rnams yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslab pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la shin tu bslab pa
147b4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ de dag shin tu bslab pas na/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pas dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa ma
147b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i spyod yul rnams yongs su spong / de dag de'i phyir gnas ma yin par mi spyod/ yul ma yin pa dang / dus ma yin par mi spyod/ de dag dge sbyong gi spyod yul la spyod pa
147b6(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram zes 'di lta ste/ don dang mi ldan pa de dang / des mtshang 'drur med la gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de snyed la 'jog par
147b7(mdo sde): byed do| |de dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs pas spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ spyod lam rab tu zhi bas spyod lam bcos pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /rigs
148a1(mdo sde): kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs
148a2(mdo sde): kyi bu| chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i bdag po
148a3(mdo sde): yin| gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par 'dzud/ sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba rnams yin/ gzhan dag gis sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/ sbyin pa'i bdag po gzhan
148a4(mdo sde): dag la'ang gzengs bstod cing rab tu dga' bar byed/ gzhan dag la byin na yang 'di snyam du bdag cag la byin cig gzhan la ni/ ma yin no/ /bdag cag gir
148a5(mdo sde): gyur la| gzhan dag gir ma gyur cig/ ces sems mi skyed/ 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'tsho ba'i yo byad de dang de dag thob par gyur cig /
148a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba dang ldan te bde bar gyur cig/ bdag cag gis kyang de nyid kyi don du 'bad par bya/ btsal bar bya'o/ bdag cag
148a7(mdo sde): gis der ser sna dang / phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /zhes sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ser sna
148b1(mdo sde): dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe
148b2(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la snyoms par spyod pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la
148b3(mdo sde): gnod sems med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don kho nar sbyin pa dag sbyin/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la bsam
148b4(mdo sde): gtan du byed/ shes rab sgom/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par sgrub mod kyi/ gnyis la gnas pa'i sems kyis sgrub pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la
148b5(mdo sde): mthun mong gi sems dang / sems can thams cad la dmigs pas sgrub ste/ ci nas kyang chos nyid myur du 'thob par 'gyur ba de ltar grub bo/ /de dag 'khor ba rab tu 'bar
148b6(mdo sde): ba nas bdag nyid byung nas gzhan dag kyang 'byin te/ de'ang mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar bzhag cing 'byin gyi sdug pa'i sems kyis ma yin te/ khong khro bas ma yin no/ /rigs
148b7(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag la bu sdug pa/ phangs pa/ byams pa/ yid du 'ong ba drug cig yod la/ bu de dag la tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de
149a1(mdo sde): mtshungs par byams shing / mtshungs par sbyor bar gyur pa las de'i bu de dag byis pa yin te/ gog pa/ mi shes pa/ mi mkhas pa dag cig yod la/ de nas
149a2(mdo sde): tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de'i khyim me thar te/ de'i bu de dag kyang so so na 'khor bar gyur nas rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de 'di
149a3(mdo sde): ni| sngar je dbyung ngo / /de nas phyis 'di dbyung ngo snyam du de ltar sems sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
149a4(mdo sde): ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de bu rnams la sems snyoms pas de gang dang gang dag ji ltar mjal ba de dang de
149a5(mdo sde): dag de bzhin du 'byin to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bu dang
149a6(mdo sde): 'dra ste| 'phags pa rnams ni/ ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de byis pa/ mi gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa/ 'gro ba drug so so na gnas pa de dag 'khor ba'i khyim me thar
149a7(mdo sde): pa nas gang dang gang ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid de ltar 'byin to/ /phyung nas kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhi bar rab tu gzhog go /
149b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
149b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs
149b3(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi/ zang zing gi mchod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /nan tan gyis mchod pa dag sems can rnams la phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang /
149b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi don la zhugs pa dang / yi dam mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las mi gtong ba dang /
149b5(mdo sde): ji ltar smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang / yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
149b6(mdo sde): bkur byas pa yin gyi/ zang zing gi mchod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ chos kyi sku ste/ chos la mchod na/ de bzhin
149b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ nan tan gyis yang dag par grub pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la
150a1(mdo sde): phan zhing bde ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can gyi don
150a2(mdo sde): de'ang yi dam btang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / smras pa las nyams pa dang / dam bcas pa las nyams pa
150a3(mdo sde): dang / yid yongs su skyo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas yang dag par 'thob par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
150a4(mdo sde): kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ sems can gyi don la rag las pa ste/ gal te sems can rnams med na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon
150a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa yin gyi/ zang zing
150a6(mdo sde): gi mchod pas ma yin pa de ltar blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba
150a7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang
150b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste rab tu byung nas bdag ni/ grogs po dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams shing dang
150b2(mdo sde): 'dra'o| |zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis gzugs mi sdug par khas blangs shing bdag gis gos kha dog mi sdug pa bgyis te tshul bzhin du bsgyur to/ /zhes nga
150b3(mdo sde): rgyal bcom pa yin/ spong ba'i rgyu spong ba'i phyir mgo bregs shing lag na lhung bzed thogs te grong nas grong du 'gro'o/ /zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ gdol bu dang 'dra bar
150b4(mdo sde): dri ma'o ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o/ /zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag ni/ bsod snyoms pa ste/ bdag gi 'tsho ba gzhan la rag lus so/ /zhes nga rgyal
150b5(mdo sde): bcom pa yin/ brnyes pa'i bsod snyoms ngan don len to/ /zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par bya
150b6(mdo sde): dgos so/ /zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ tshig dang / spyod yul dang / kun spyod pa de dang des mgu bar
150b7(mdo sde): bya'o| |zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams thob par bya'o/ /zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ sems can khros pa dang / gnod sems can rnams
151a1(mdo sde): kyi nang na bzod pa mang bar bya'o/ /zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom
151a2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan
151a3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu phun sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin/ gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog/ gzhan gyis mi bkri/ ston pa gzhan med pas yang dag par lta ba
151a4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ g.yo dang sgyus spyod pa dang bral bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ gya gyu med pa'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin/ dbang po rno bas
151a5(mdo sde): shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rgyu dang bas sgrib pa dang kun las ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang bral bas dge ba'i bshes
151a6(mdo sde): gnyen la rten pa rnams yin/ legs par bshad pa tshol bas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams yin/ chos bstan pa la log par mi 'dzin pa rnams yin/ rgya
151a7(mdo sde): chen po la mos pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rab tu shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams
151b1(mdo sde): yin no| |byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig nyan par
151b2(mdo sde): gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig ngas bstan gyi/ legs par shin tu nyon la yid
151b3(mdo sde): la zungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
151b4(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can thams cad la thun mong ba'i byams pa chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin
151b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ji ltar sems can gcig la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la'ang khyab ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la khyab
151b6(mdo sde): nas nam mkha'i dbyings la khyab kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang ma shes pa'ang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ nyan thos
151b7(mdo sde): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mthun mong ma yin pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems can
152a1(mdo sde): gcig la snying rje ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la snying rje zhing de la phan par mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs
152a2(mdo sde): pa ni| chos ston pa mi zad pa dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa du ma nas bskal pa brgya stong tshad med/ grangs med pa du ma'i bar du rnam grangs
152a3(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / tshul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis sems can thams cad la dus gcig tu chos ston kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa zang
152a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ dri ba la lung bstan pa shin tu ston pa tshad med pa dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te sems can ji snyed
152a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la dus gcig tu tshig dang / yi ge gzhan dang gzhan dag gis dri ba tha dad du dris
152a6(mdo sde): k yang de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig la dris pa lung bstan pa'i ston pa bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ba la lung
152a7(mdo sde): bstan pa'i ston pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chags pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi spyod yul pas yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ gal
152b1(mdo sde): te sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur la/ de dag thams cad dus gcig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya stong du ma la snyems par zhugs te/ de bzhin
152b2(mdo sde): du snyoms par zhugs nas bskal pa brgya stong du mar ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang gzhan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi mtha' ma mu mi rnyed do/
152b3(mdo sde): /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ tshad med pa'i gzugs kyi sku mngon par grub pa dang /
152b4(mdo sde): ldan te| rigs kyi bu/ gal te sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar gyur na/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thad gcig yud
152b5(mdo sde): tsam gcig la sems can re re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston to/ /gal te gzugs gzhan dang gzhan la mos par gyur na/ de la'ang de bzhin
152b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis sems can re re'i mdun du gzugs gzhan dang gzhan nye bar ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
152b7(mdo sde): 'phral gyi spyan gyi yul tshad med de/ rigs kyi bu/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis gzigs kyi mi'i mig gis ma yin pa'i sems can yod pa gal te rigs kyi bu/ grangs dang bsam
153a1(mdo sde): p a las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ma lus pa kun de 'dra bar gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gi mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras
153a2(mdo sde): bu ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrul gyi snyan gyi yul tshad med de/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te de lta bu nyid kyi sems
153a3(mdo sde): can gyis mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de dag thams cad kyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig la sgra dbyangs brjod
153a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgra lhan cig tu phyung ste brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bdag bdag gi sgra rnams kyang so sor gsan to/ /so sor rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
153a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ye shes tshad med pa/ mi zad pa/ mu med pa/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te sems can gyi khams ma lus pa so sor
153a6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa rjes su rnam par rtog cing / bsam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rjes su sems la/ so so na las sna tshogs byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas skad
153a7(mdo sde): cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig la sems can 'di ni/ 'di la rnam par rtog go /sems can 'di ni/ 'di la sems so/ /sems can 'di ni/ las 'di byed do/ /
153b1(mdo sde): de'i 'bras bu ni/ 'dir 'gyur ro/ /zhes rab tu mkhyen te/ de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum char la'ang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis skad cig thang gcig yud
153b2(mdo sde): tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyen to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
153b3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ngas pa med/ dbang po bslad pa med/ sems 'khrug pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
153b4(mdo sde): pa ni| nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ zhi ba/ rab tu zhi pa/ nye bar zhi ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la nyon mongs pa yod pa de'i sems ni /
153b5(mdo sde): bslad par 'gyur te/ sems bslad pas mnyam par 'jog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ zag pa med pa/ nyon
153b6(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs pa/ chos thams cad la dbang ba/ mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod yul thams cad
153b7(mdo sde): las byung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyod lam re re la'ang ting nge 'dzin re res spyod pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du spyod cing mya ngan
154a1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i lus kyi tshe dbang du spyod na gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bskal
