154a2(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa du mas yang dag par grub pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ dpag pa dang / bsam pa dang / brtag par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems
154a3(mdo sde): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par 'grub
154a4(mdo sde): pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
154a5(mdo sde): yul bsgrub par bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par sgrub par mi nus kyi/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos
154a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe nas brtsams te bskal pa bgrang bar bya'i/ thog ma'i sems nas brtsams te ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'
154a7(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos nas dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa rnyed
154b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can de dag ni/ skyid de ba/ legs par bgyi ba'i las bgyid pa/ las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa/ dad pa dang mos pa mang zhing byang chub tu nye ba lags na/ su dag thos
154b2(mdo sde): nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa rnams lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag
154b3(mdo sde): ring por mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di 'dra ba dag nyid kyi snod du gyur par mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no//
154b4(mdo sde): de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
154b5(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis the tshom dang / yid gnyis dang / nem nur mi bskyed par
154b6(mdo sde): bya'o| |rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis nub bdun du yid la bya ba gzhan med cing sems ma 'khrugs par bsam pa drag po dang / dad pa drag por zhugs te/
154b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di rjes su sems la zhag bdun 'das pa dang des mchod pa'i cho ga nye bar bzhag nas gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos te dad pa mngon
155a1(mdo sde): du byas la 'dug par byas na/ des de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ste mi byed dam cho ga ma tshang bar byed na/ de sems
155a2(mdo sde): rtse gcig par 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i tshe 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
155a3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/ sems can gang la la ma dad par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
155a4(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/ sems can gang mi zad pa rtsub pa'i bsam pa'i gnod sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la
155a5(mdo sde): yang dgrar 'du shes par 'gyur ba dag yod do/ /de dag de'i phyir lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ sems can gang
155a6(mdo sde): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba bshad pa 'di la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang / ston par 'du shes
155a7(mdo sde): skyed na| rigs kyi bu/ sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di tshe rabs de dang de dag gzhan la'ang rigs kyi bu/ de dag gis thos par nges par bya'o/ /de nas 'khor
155b1(mdo sde): der 'dus pa'i sems can kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon bdag cag gis kyang thos pa lta ci
155b2(mdo sde): zhig snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste ljags kyi dbang pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bkab bo/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par
155b3(mdo sde): bkab nas dbu mngon par bkab bo/ /dbu mngon par bkab nas sku mngon par bkab bo/ /sku mngon par bkab nas seng+ge'i khri mngon par bkab bo/ /seng+ge'i khri mngon par bkab
155b4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo/ /de nas nyan thos kyi 'khor/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'khor/ de nas thams cad yod
155b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bkab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyir bsdus
155b6(mdo sde): te thams cad yod pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di 'dra ba'i ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed
155b7(mdo sde): rnams dad par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed rnams mngon par dad par gyis shig /de ni/ khyed kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom
156a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo/ /srog
156a2(mdo sde): chags brgya stong du ma ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go /sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can du mas ni/ byang chub tu
156a3(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sbrin/ bam po bdun pa ste/ tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam
156a4(mdo sde): par sel pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
156a5(mdo sde): su'ang 'dogs la don dam par na gzugs su'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
156a6(mdo sde): par shes pa'ang 'dogs la don dam par na rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /sa'i khams su'ang 'dogs la don dam par na sa'i
156a7(mdo sde): khams su'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par
156b1(mdo sde): shes pa'i khams su'ang 'dogs la don dam par na rnam par shes pa'i khams su'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /mig gi skye mched du'ang 'dogs la don
156b2(mdo sde): dam par na mig gi skye mched du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye
156b3(mdo sde): mched dang / yid kyi skye mched du'ang 'dogs la don dam par na yid kyi skye mched du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /bdag tu'ang 'dogs la don dam par
156b4(mdo sde): na bdag tu'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /sems can du'ang 'dogs la don dam par na sems can du'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /srog
156b5(mdo sde): dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bur yang 'dogs la don dam par na srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed
156b6(mdo sde): las skyes pa dang / shed bur yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /'jig rten du'ang 'dogs la don dam par na 'jig rten du'ang mi 'jigs shing mngon par
156b7(mdo sde): mi chags so/ /'jig rten gyi chos rnams su yang 'dogs la don dam par na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /sangs rgyas
157a1(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams su'ang 'dogs la don dam par na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su'ang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so/ /byang chub tu'ang 'dogs
157a2(mdo sde): la don dam par na byang chub dang byang chub par byed pa'ang mi dmigs shing de la mngon par mi chags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ gang ming dang / 'dogs pa dang /
157a3(mdo sde): tha snyad de ni/ kun rdzob ces bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi chos rnams la ni/ don dam pa med mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi chos rnams med par yang don dam pa bstan par yang mi nus
157a4(mdo sde): so| |rigs kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas de dag la kun rdzob tu mkhas shing don dam par ma yin pa de ni/ kun rdzob la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi
157a5(mdo sde): bu| chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' don
157a6(mdo sde): dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin/ mi 'gag pa'i chos nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos
157a7(mdo sde): nyid dang / mi len mi 'dor ba'i chos nyid dang / tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos nyid dang / smrar med pa'i chos nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i chos
157b1(mdo sde): nyid dang / brjod du med pa'i chos nyid dang / zhi ba'i chos nyid dang / 'phags pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa ni/ mi skye'o/ /
157b2(mdo sde): mi 'gag go /mi 'jig go /mi len to/ /mi 'dor ro/ /yi ge dag gis smra bar bya ba ma yin no/ /yi ge rnams kyis mi brjod do/ /spros pas mi rtogs so/ /rigs kyi bu/
157b3(mdo sde): don dam pa ni/ brjod du med pa ste/ zhi ba'o/ /'phags pa rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ don dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung
157b4(mdo sde): ma skyes kyang rung mi 'jigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon la yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim
157b5(mdo sde): med par rab tu 'byung ngo / /rab tu byung nas kyang chos 'di kho na thob par bya ba'i phyir mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas so/ /rigs
157b6(mdo sde): kyi bu| gal te don dam pa med du zin na tshangs par spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba'ang don med par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi phyir
157b7(mdo sde): don dam pa yod pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams don dam pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
158a1(mdo sde): don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams
158a2(mdo sde): yin no| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos rnams gsog nyid du rab tu shes/ gso ba nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang / mig yor lta bu nyid dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu
158a3(mdo sde): nyid dang / sgra brnyan lta bu nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / mi gnas pa nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes so/ /de dag 'di snyan
158a4(mdo sde): du sems te/ chos 'di dag ni/ 'di ltar gsog/ 'di ltar gsob/ 'di ltar snying po med pa/ 'di ltar mig yor lta bu/ 'di ltar gzugs brnyan lta bu/ 'di ltar sgra
158a5(mdo sde): brnyan lta bu/ 'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu/ 'di ltar mi gnas pa/ 'di ltar g.yo ba/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin yang 'di dag skye bar snang ngo / /gnas pa
158a6(mdo sde): dang / 'jig par yang snang ngo snyam mo/ /de dag 'di ltar sems te/ yang chos 'di rnams skye ba'i rkyen ni/ gang rnams yin/ chos 'di rnams 'gag pa'i rkyen ni/ gang
158a7(mdo sde): rnams yin snyam mo/ /de dag 'di ltar sems te/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis chos 'di dag skyes te/ ma rig pa las byung ba'o/ /ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /ma rig pa la
158b1(mdo sde): brten pa'o/ /ma rig pa la brten nas 'du byed rnams 'byung ba yin/ 'du byed la brten nas rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes yod na ming dang gzugs su
158b2(mdo sde): 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /ming dang gzugs su btags na skye mched drug rnams su 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched rnams yod na reg par 'gyur ro/ /reg pa yod na tshor ba
158b3(mdo sde): rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshor ba'i rgyus byis pa rnams sred pas nyen par 'gyur ro/ /sred pas nyen na len pa 'dzin to/ /len pa bzung na srid pa'i mtshams su sbyor bar
158b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /srid pa yod na skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba yod na rga bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu gang zag rga ba'i chos ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /shi ba la gnas pa'i mya ngan dang / smre
158b5(mdo sde): sngags 'don pa dang / yi mug pa dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na
158b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ma rig pa spang bar nan tan bya'o/ /ma rig pa gzhig pa dang / ma rig pa rtsa ba nas dbyung ba dang / ma rig pa dgag pa'i phyir nan tan bya'o/
158b7(mdo sde): ma rig pa 'gags pas ma rig pa'i rkyen las skyes pa/ ma rig pa las byung ba dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba/ ma rig pa la brten pa'i chos 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur
159a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ srog gi dbang po 'gags na/ dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa 'gags
159a2(mdo sde): na mi shes pa la brten pa'i chos 'di dag kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /mi shes pa spangs pas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo / /'gro ba rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo / /
159a3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i rgyu rnams kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'das pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu bo de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
159a4(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/
159a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar ci bdag bram ze'i rigs sam/ 'on te rgyal rigs sam/ 'on te khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ ci mtho
159a6(mdo sde): zhing phyug po'am/ 'on te dma' zhing dbul po'i rigs su skyes sam/ gang du skyes snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de gal te rigs mtho zhing phyug par skyes na yang de la
159a7(mdo sde): rigs kyis dregs par mi byed do/ /'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes par gyur na yang bdag 'di lta bu'i rigs su skyes pa las bdag gis sngon las 'dren
159b1(mdo sde): mar byas so/ /zhes de snyam du sems skyed cing / de de'i rgyus skyo ba mang ba yin te/ skyo ba mang bar gyur nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /rab tu byung nas kyang bdag ci'i phyir rab tu byung
159b2(mdo sde): zhes yongs su rtog ste/ bdag ni/ rang rgal nas gzhan dag kyang bsgral bar bya/ rang grol nas gzhan dag kyang dgrol bar bya'o/ /zhes rab tu byung ngo snyam nas de de'i phyir le
159b3(mdo sde): lo la mi rten cing snyom las mi byed de/ de bdag rab tu byung nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gang dang gang nub cing yongs su zad de kun byang bar gyur ces de snyam du yongs su
159b4(mdo sde): rtog ste| de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos shig spangs par gyur na/ de la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed do/ /gang ma spangs pa de dag ni/ spang ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad
159b5(mdo sde): do| |de bdag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos gang dang gang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyur ces de snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de'i dge ba'i chos gang dag 'phel ba
159b6(mdo sde): dang / rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyur pa de la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed do/ /gang de ltar ma gyur pa de dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rgya cher bya ba'i phyir rtsol
159b7(mdo sde): zhing 'bad do/ /de bla ma la brten na dge ba'i chos rnams ni/ 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa rnams ni/ 'grib par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i
160a1(mdo sde): gzhis mkhan po nyung du thos pa'am/ mang du thos pa'am/ shes pa'am/ mi shes pa'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa can yang rung ste/
160a2(mdo sde): de la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed do/ /de ji ltar ston pa la dga' zhing dang ba nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la'ang byed do/ /de slob dpon rnams la rim gro yod cing rjes
160a3(mdo sde): yod pa yin te/ de 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la brten na bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams ni/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa ma spangs
160a4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni/ spangs par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de de dag la mkhan por 'du shes skyed cing / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa 'thob pa dang / dge ba'i chos rnams
160a5(mdo sde): la de dag dang mthun par spyod pa yin / mi dge ba'i chos rnams la mi mthun par spyod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi ston pa gang zhes yongs su rtog cing / de 'di snyam du
160a6(mdo sde): sems te/ bdag gi ston pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas
160a7(mdo sde): chen po ste/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston pa'o snyam ste/ de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed de/ de 'di
160b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das yin pa ni/ bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa'i lam gang bcas pa de las kyang bdag
160b2(mdo sde): gis srog gi phyir yang 'da' bar mi bya ste/ de ltar na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim gro dang / rjes su 'brang par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de 'di snyam du bdag su'i bsod snyoms
160b3(mdo sde): la yongs su spyod ces sems shing de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod kyi/ bdag
160b4(mdo sde): gis ci nas kyang de dag gi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod pa dang / don che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / bdag gis kyang yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par yongs su spyod
160b5(mdo sde): pa de ltar bya'o snyam mo/ /de 'di snyam du bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag 'du shes ci dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms gtang snyam zhing /
160b6(mdo sde): de 'di ltar rjes su sems te/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag ni/ bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ dge slong gi 'du shes dang
160b7(mdo sde): ldan| sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyi/ ci nas kyang bdag gis dge sbyong gi yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par
161a1(mdo sde): bya ba dang / dge slong gi yon tan dang / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba de ltar spyod do snyam mo/ /de 'di snyam
161a2(mdo sde): du bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur tam zhes sems shing / de 'di snyam du bdag gis dge slong gi tshul thob pa 'di ni/ rgal ba dang
161a3(mdo sde): po'o| |bdag dge slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni/ rgal ba gnyis pa'o/ /bdag le lo med cing chos thob pa'i phyir ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i
161a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems
161a5(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ bdag shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang
161a6(mdo sde): ldan na| byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no/ |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khengs pa dag la dma' ba rnams yin/ nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal
161a7(mdo sde): med pa rnams yin/ gya gyu can dag la drang po rnams yin/ brdzun du smra ba dag la bden par smra ba rnams yin/ kha mi mkhas par smra ba dag la snyan par smra ba
161b1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ rtsub pa dag la 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ khro ba dag la bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ sdug bsngal
161b2(mdo sde): bdag la snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ ser sna can dag la bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/

161b4(mdo sde): skye'o| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / ma 'phags pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/
161b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pas sems snyoms pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi chung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gos pa med
161b6(mdo sde): bas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/ nem nur med pa'i sems dang ldan pas dad pa
161b7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ sems le lo med pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams
162a1(mdo sde): yin| shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/ shes rab rno bas dbang po mi rtul ba rnams yin/ gnod sems
162a2(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci
162a3(mdo sde): chos de dag tshogs pas skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te la la ma tshang yang skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang la chos tshogs pa de
162a4(mdo sde): dag las chos gcig kyang skyon med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ ma 'bags pa/ yongs su dag pa/ byang ba/ yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de la rigs kyi bu/ chos de dag thams cad
162a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir chos de dag tshogs pas skye'i/ ma tshogs pas ni/ ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
162a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o/ /
162a7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa 'chos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug
162b1(mdo sde): pa 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos chu 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang / skyang nul bya ba 'bul
162b2(mdo sde): ba dang / pha ma dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed
162b3(mdo sde): cing / de'ang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te/ zang zing dang bcas pa ma yin la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas
162b4(mdo sde): ma gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo zhing / de'ang bsam pa thag pa nas sems pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
162b5(mdo sde): mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
162b6(mdo sde): lta ste| nye bar len pa med pa rnams yin/ 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul la sred pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yul
162b7(mdo sde): gyi nyes pas mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims bcas pa la rim gro byed cing brtson pa dang / shin tu bslab pa rnams yin/ gos dang / bsod
163a1(mdo sde): snyoms dang / mal cha ngan ngon dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad ngan don dag gis chog shes pa rnams yin/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / yo byad gsog
163a2(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnams las skye ba rnams yin/ dben pa la dga' zhing rtag tu sgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin no/ /
163a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
163a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ brda'i rnyed pa dang
163a5(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/ gzhogs slong gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ thob kyis 'jal pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral
163a6(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa rnams yin/ rnyed pa
163a7(mdo sde): la chags pa med pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi chad pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas cho ga shes pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang
163b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir lus kyis tshul 'chos
163b2(mdo sde): par mi byed/ ngag gis tshul 'chos par mi byed/ sems kyis tshul 'chos par mi byed do/ /ji ltar na/ lus kyis tshul 'chos par mi byed pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
163b3(mdo sde): ni| sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po mthong na/ spyod lam mi 'chos so/ /ji ltar na/ spyod lam mi 'chos she na/ gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / skyo bar lta ba dang /
163b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa med par lta bas gom pa bags kyis dal dal nas 'dor zhing 'degs pa ma yin/ de ltar na lus kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/ /ji ltar na/ ngag gis tshul 'chos pa
163b5(mdo sde): mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir bcom bskyungs shing smra ba ma yin/ 'jam por smra ba ma yin/ dga' bar smra ba ma yin/ rjes su 'bras ba'i
163b6(mdo sde): tshig brjod pa ma yin te/ de ltar na/ ngag gis tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/ /ji ltar na/ sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sbyin pa byed pa'am/
163b7(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pa bstabs na/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar ston cing sems kyis 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung la/
164a1(mdo sde): sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod pa 'di ni/ nang gi gdung ba yin te/ de ltar na/ sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul
164a2(mdo sde): 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sbyin pa byed pa'am/ sbyin bdag mthong
164a3(mdo sde): na| bdag gos kyis phongs so/ /bdag lhung bzed kyis phongs so/ /bdag nad kyi rkyen rtsis phongs so/ /zhes brda mi byed cing / sbyin pa byed pa'am/ sbyin bdag la mi slong
164a4(mdo sde): zhing tshig tu mi brjod de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brda'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ gzhogs slong gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems
164a5(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag la sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/ de la bdag gis kyang phan pa che ge mo
164a6(mdo sde): zhig byas so/ /des kyang bdag la 'di ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan par rig ste/ mang du thos pa'o/ /'dod pa chung ba'o/ /zhes 'di dang 'di byin no/ /bdag gis kyang de la
164a7(mdo sde): snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste blangs so/ /zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhogs slong gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar
164b1(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par bcal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ lus la rma byung ba dang / sems la rma byung bar rnyed pa tshol
164b2(mdo sde): ba ma yin te/ de la lus kyi rma ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir rgyu ga pa dang / kun tu rgyug pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal bar spyod pa'o/ /sems kyi rma ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa
164b3(mdo sde): la smon pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la gnod sems mang ba ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs pa btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba
164b4(mdo sde): yin no| |ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sreng la sgyu med pa dang / gzhal ba la sgyu
164b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang / g.yos rnyed pa mi sgrub pa ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ /
164b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa'am/ chos kyi dang
164b7(mdo sde): 'dres pa'am/ dge 'dun gyi dang 'dres pa'am/ ma byin pa'am/ ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed/ /chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na/ byang
165a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
165a2(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang dag gir mi byed/ nor du mi rtsi/ tshogs su mi byed cing / dus dus su dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / pha ma dang / mdza'
165a3(mdo sde): ba dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la gtong zhing / dus dus su bdag kyang yongs su spyod la/ yongs su spyod pa'i tshe chags pa med
165a4(mdo sde): pa dang / zhen pa med par yongs su spyod do/ /rnyed pa ma rnyed na'ang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed cing yongs su yi mi chad de/ sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdag rnams la ma dad
165a5(mdo sde): par mi 'dzin pa yin pa ste/ de chos dang mthun par rnyed pa/ dge 'dun gyir gtogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpas ma smad pa/ lhas
165a6(mdo sde): bstod pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dpya bas chog shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su
165a7(mdo sde): dag pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
165b1(mdo sde): gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor pa na gnas pas yongs su mi skyo'o/ /sems can gyi rgyu sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mi skyo'o/ /sems can gyi don
165b2(mdo sde): rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o/ /sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o/ /sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o/ /gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams
165b3(mdo sde): la lam stong pas yongs su mi skyo'o/ /de dag la ma dad par yang mi byed do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su bsdu bas kyang yongs su mi skyo'o/ /byang chub kyi tshogs
165b4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang yongs su mi skyo'o/ /bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi lta'i/ byang chub la gzhol/ byang chub
165b5(mdo sde): la 'bab/ byang chub la bab pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
165b6(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral
165b7(mdo sde): zhing bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin/ lus kyis shin tu bsdams shing lus kyi ngan du spyod pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ ngag gis shin tu bsdams shing ngag gi ngan du spyod
166a1(mdo sde): pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ yid kyis shin tu bsdams shing yid kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs shing mi dge
166a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin/ rigs par smra zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos smra zhing chos ma yin pa la smod pa rnams yin/
166a3(mdo sde): smad pa'i las rnam par spangs shing dge ba'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sun 'byin cing nyon mongs pa'i dring ba'i yul
166a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su skyong zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la srung ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
166a5(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
166a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po shin tu dang ba rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su dag pa rnams yin/
166a7(mdo sde): dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/ dbang po dri ma med pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su byang ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/ bag la nyal ba dang /
166b1(mdo sde): bral ba rnams yin/ kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ tha ba dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu
166b2(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba/ bcom
166b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar bu lags pa bdag gis 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa lags/ nyon mongs pa
166b4(mdo sde): rnams dang bral bas na/ khro gnyer ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
166b5(mdo sde): dbang po yongs su dag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na/ khro gnyer med pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
166b6(mdo sde): mang du thos pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba ni/ 'dod chags kyi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang
166b7(mdo sde): gi / mes rab tu 'bar ba'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug gi mes rab tu dkrugs pa'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
167a1(mdo sde): so| |'du byas ni/ mi rtag pa'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'du byad rnams ni/ sdug bsngal ba'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
167a2(mdo sde): bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten ni/ stong pa'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta
167a3(mdo sde): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten ni/ spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad ni/ rkyen las byung
167a4(mdo sde): ba'o| |zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ zhi ba'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de yang thos pa dang /
167a5(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / sgom pas shes kyi sgrar brjod pa tsam gyis ma yin te/ de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje'i sems brtan pa nye bar bzhag ste sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol
167a6(mdo sde): zhing 'dab la brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang
167a7(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam
167b1(mdo sde): par 'jig cing bstan pa 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang / ye shes kyi sgron ma mya ngan las 'das te ston pa med pa'i tshe mdo sde rgya
167b2(mdo sde): chen po don che zhing mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing klog la kha ton byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la brjod cing ston la ya
167b3(mdo sde): dag par ston cing gsal bar byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs par byed cing de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing med
167b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes skyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang / bcud kyis
167b5(mdo sde): len du 'du shes skyed pa dang / rtsi'i 'du shes skyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / btsal nas kyang nan gyis sgrub pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/
167b6(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal
167b7(mdo sde): po'i sras rnams yin no/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnam yin/ lus dang byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rnams yin/ dbang po rnam pa
168a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su sten pa rnams yin/
168a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i gnas khong du chud par byed pa rnams yin/
168a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su skyob pa rnams yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas rnams pa shin tu mthar phyin pa rnams
168a4(mdo sde): yin| de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
168a5(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams
168a6(mdo sde): yin no| |bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis mi sgul ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mi g.yo
168a7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring mi
168b1(mdo sde): 'jog pa rnams yin/ shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad
168b2(mdo sde): las mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang / tshangs
168b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / bag la nyal shes pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
168b4(mdo sde): lta ste| sems can 'dod chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang / gti mug gi bsam pa can dang / dma' ba'i bsam pa
168b5(mdo sde): can dang / bar ma'i bsam pa can dang / zhen pa'i bsam pa can dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang / brtan pa'i bsam pa can dang / yun ring po'i bsam pa can dang / sems can
168b6(mdo sde): gtum pa'i bsam pa can dag kyang yang dag pa ji bzhin du rab tu shes shing / de'ang sems can gcig la ji ltar shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la'ang yang dag pa
168b7(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang / bag la nyal shes pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
169a1(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
169a2(mdo sde): gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang
169a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs/ nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems
169a4(mdo sde): can rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs/ brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi gzugs/ bdud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
169a5(mdo sde): la bdud kyi gzugs/ tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la tshangs pa'i gzugs/ bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bram ze'i
169a6(mdo sde): gzugs/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khyim
169a7(mdo sde): bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa'
169b1(mdo sde): rnams nye bar stan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
169b2(mdo sde): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba rnams yin/ 'jam pa rnams yin/ gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa
169b3(mdo sde): rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ mi
169b4(mdo sde): brlang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ des pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu
169b5(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang
169b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ cho ga yongs su dag pa rnams yin/
169b7(mdo sde): tshul dang cha mthun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ khong yangs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod
170a1(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa rnams yin/ skal pa mnyam pa rnams yin/ lam gcig tu zhugs pa rnams yin/ ston pa gzhan med pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos
170a2(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu pa'i dngos po la mkhas
170a3(mdo sde): ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do/ /bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / mi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan pa smra ba dang / don du smra ba
170a4(mdo sde): dang / chos su smra ba dang / rigs par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / zang zing gis don mthun pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rigs kyi
170a5(mdo sde): bu| phan pa'i sbyin pa ni/ gang chos sbyin pa'o/ /bde ba'i sbyin pa ni/ gang zang zing sbyin pa'o/ /mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni/ gang lam gyi lung sbyin pa'o/ /phan par smra ba ni/ gang dge
170a6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa'o/ /don du smra ba ni/ gang yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o/ /chos su smra ba ni/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang mthun par chos bstan pa'o/ /rigs
170a7(mdo sde): par smra ba ni/ gang don yang dag par chud mi son pa'o/ /don bya ba ni/ gang mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslangs te dge ba'i gnas su gzhog pa'o/ /zang zing gis don mthun pa ni/
170b1(mdo sde): gang bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba dang / gzhib pa dang / gos la sogs pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun pa ni/
170b2(mdo sde): gang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa thun mong
170b3(mdo sde): du spyod pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
170b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/ spyod lam sgyu med pa rnams yin/ spyod lam yongs su dag pa
170b5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ blta na dga' ba rnams yin/ blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/ lta bas chog mi shes pa rnams yin/ blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams
170b6(mdo sde): cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba
170b7(mdo sde): rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
171a1(mdo sde): dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su srung ba rnams yin/
171a2(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'don pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba rnams yin/ mgon med pa rnams la gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nad
171a3(mdo sde): kyis nad par gyur pa rnams pa sman par gyur pa rnams yin/ rten med pa dag la rten pa rnams yin/ gnas med pa dag la gnas pa rnams yin/ skyabs med pa dag la
171a4(mdo sde): skyabs rnams yin/ gling med pa dag la gling rnams yin/ dpung gnyen med pa dag la dpung gnyen rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
171a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/
171a6(mdo sde): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po shing chen po blta na bzang ba zhes bya ba de ni/ rtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'o/ /sdong po dang /
171a7(mdo sde): yal ga rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / mthong ba dang / mnams pa dang / myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin
171b1(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang nye bar
171b2(mdo sde): 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas
171b3(mdo sde): pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang
171b4(mdo sde): ldan na| byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad
171b5(mdo sde): pa rnams la rtsi sbyin pa dang / sems can bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa rnams la zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa dang / rlung dang lhags pa dang nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la
171b6(mdo sde): dga' ba sbyin pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra/ phyag 'tshal/ ldang / thal mo sbyar zhing
171b7(mdo sde): 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / skyed mos tshal bya ba dang / dus dus su nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba gtong ba dang / bran pho dang / bran
172a1(mdo sde): mo dang / las mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo bshas yongs su skyong ba dang / dus dus su tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la bsnyen bkur
172a2(mdo sde): byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
172a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs
172a4(mdo sde): pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyan to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
172a5(mdo sde): gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi
172a6(mdo sde): tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
172a7(mdo sde): rgya ba rnams la rim gror byed/ bkur sti byed/ bsti stang byed/ mchod pa byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub
172b1(mdo sde): kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang snang ngo / /sangs
172b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi
172b3(mdo sde): zhing du mar yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang sems can 'dul ba ji snyed pa la de
172b4(mdo sde): snyed kyi sprul pa 'gyed cing de dag sprul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/
172b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gang lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i
172b6(mdo sde): phyir dpe nyon cig / rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltas te/ dper na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba ni/ gling bzhir snang bar byed cing sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang nyi ma dang / zla ba ni/
172b7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis snang bar bya'o/ /bdag cag ni/ sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /zhes mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par
173a1(mdo sde): 'du byed pas zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog/ rnam par mi
173a2(mdo sde): rtog ste| bsgrim pa'am/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ sngon gyi rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya ba rnams la mngon par grub pa'i phyir
173a3(mdo sde): t e| sngon gyi byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de
173a4(mdo sde): ltar smon lam btab/ de lta de ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la yang mkhas
173a5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
173a6(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu grub pas sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims shin tu grub cing tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon
173a7(mdo sde): med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / ma 'bags pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas tshul
173b1(mdo sde): khrims shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / brtson 'grus shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu
173b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / thabs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa
173b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / ye shes shin tu grub cing thun mong ma yin pa'i ye shes nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das
173b4(mdo sde): p as dang po la ngas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bar gyi ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas ye shes shin tu
173b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par dzogs
173b6(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul te/
173b7(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab ri'i rgyal po dag gam/ ri btang bzung nga / ri btang bzung chen po dag
174a1(mdo sde): gam| 'khor yug gi ri'am/ khor yug gi ra chen po dag gam/ de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / ri nag po de dag thams cad kyang yul ga ya gang na ba
174a2(mdo sde): dang / ga ya mgo'i ri gang na ba de logs su bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par gyur to/ /gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
174a3(mdo sde): khams 'di na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shin ngam/ spos kyi shing ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir ga ya
174a4(mdo sde): mgo'i ri gang na ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dga' pa 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas
174a5(mdo sde): kyang na bza' dang / rgyan gyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam byas par gyur to/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du ma'ang
174a6(mdo sde): mgo pos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba byas te 'dud cing bcom ldan 'das la me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu brgya
174a7(mdo sde): stong du ma'ang nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas te gos g.yob cing ca co dang / ga zha brgya stong du ma byed par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la
174b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'thor bar gyur cing / kye ma'o deng ni/ 'jig rten du sangs rgyas gnyis pa skyes par gyur te/ kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to/ /sems can gnag gi rna
174b2(mdo sde): lam du chos kyi rnam grang 'di grags par gyur pa de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu
174b3(mdo sde): bsags pa yin na/ gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes de skad ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma'ang chos kyi
174b4(mdo sde): rnam grang 'di nyid la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir 'brug ltar sgra 'ur ru ru 'byin/ sgrog par byed/ shin tu sgrog par byed cing / spos kyi spron sna tshogs mngon par
174b5(mdo sde): sprul te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / ga ya ma mgo'i ri la spos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi
174b6(mdo sde): snang ngo / /klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar klu'i nga ro'i sgra 'byin par gyur ro/ /dri zad dang mi'am ci brgya stong du ma'ang snyan cing zab pa'i
174b7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis glu len cing ga ya mgo'i ri dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la bskor ba byed par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin byed ba khrag khrig brgya
175a1(mdo sde): stong du ma'ang pad+ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to/ /bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdul gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi brgya stong du ma'ang
175a2(mdo sde): me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag gis bcom ldan
175a3(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir so so'i smon
175a4(mdo sde): mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mang po bkye bar gyur te/ 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs/ gzugs sna tshogs/ snang ba sna tshogs can sha stag ste/ 'di
175a5(mdo sde): lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog ste/ de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
175a6(mdo sde): khams 'di la bskor ba byed cing mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bar gyur te 'khor nas ga ya mgo'i ri la bskor ba byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bskor ba
175a7(mdo sde): byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / mchod pa mngon
175b1(mdo sde): par 'du bya ba 'di byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bcod pa thob bo/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
175b2(mdo sde): du ma'ang chos rnams las dru la med cing dri ma dang bral ba chos kyi mig rnams par dag go/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngon chad ma bskyed pa las byang
175b3(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du
175b4(mdo sde): ' dus shing 'dug 'dug pa las de stan las langs nas bdag gi gnas su song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin
175b5(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas/ btsun pa byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsti stang byas/ rim gror byas so/ /bkur sti dang / btsun pa dang / ri mo dang /
175b6(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / bsti stang dang / rim gro byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag la ga ya mgo'i
175b7(mdo sde): ri 'di nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis don 'di nyid dag dang / tshul 'di nyid dag dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid dag
176a1(mdo sde): gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba/ de ltar khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung ba de lta bu
176a2(mdo sde): thos par gyur pa ni/ khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ /de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang na lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /lha mo 'dis
176a3(mdo sde): ji srid cig nas chos kyis rnam grangs 'di thos nas de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang 'di bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/
176a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas bcom
176a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
176a6(mdo sde): de snyed du mang pa zhig bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la sems
176a7(mdo sde): can gyi don ni/ rgyu'o/ /sems can gyi don ni/ rkyen te/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ lha mi 'chi ba ni/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/ rdzu
176b1(mdo sde): 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ lha mo mi 'chi bas yang dag par len du btsud pa dang / gzengs bstod pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las yongs su mya ngan las
176b2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ brang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par shes te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ lha mo mi 'chi ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ lha mo mi
176b3(mdo sde): 'chi ba 'di ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par
176b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas kyang mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo mi
176b5(mdo sde): 'chi ba la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba/ khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston cig/ de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
176b6(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe stong gsum
176b7(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil lta bur mnyam zhing bai DUR+ya'i gzhir snang bar gyur te/ ri nag po med cing shing tha mal pa med la/ gnas gnas
177a1(mdo sde): dag na yang dpag bsam gyi shing sha stag snang bar gyur to/ /gnas gnas dag na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing yan lag brgyad dang
177a2(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba dag snang bar gyur to/ /mi phal pa med par snang bar gyur to/ /de na bud med kyi sgra'ang mi grag par gyur to/ /gnas dang gnas dag
177a3(mdo sde): na pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag snang bar gyur te/ pad+ma de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to/ /bcom
177a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang ste/ brgya
177a5(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mdun du

177a7(mdo sde): gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
177b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gnag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid
177b2(mdo sde): dam/ kha ton bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
177b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa lhug par byin te/ de ltar
177b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gnag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris/ legs par zhus te sems dad pas sems can
177b5(mdo sde): dad pa la byin na/ de bas kyang 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni/ phran tshegs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'o//
177b6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis zang zing ni/ rnam par du mar myong gi /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni/ nam yang ma myong ste/ 'jig
177b7(mdo sde): rten pa ni/ ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gnag la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod
178a1(mdo sde): pa bas| gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod
178a2(mdo sde): nams ches mang du skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams ni/ 'di las byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

178a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ched mang du skyed do/ /
178a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di nyid la brten na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ /chos 'di nyid la brten na byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang

178a7(mdo sde): dang / kha ton byas pas mdo sde thams cad bzung ba dang / bklag pa dang / spel ba dang / kha ton byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi ma mo

179a2(mdo sde): smra ba de la'ang bla mar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /lam ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /chos smra ba de mthong na

180a7(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang
180b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas brtan 'od srung chen

182b7(mdo sde): dang / li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen mgrin dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / li tsa bI gzhon nu rangs byed dpal zhes bya ba dang / li tsa bI gzhon nu klu dpal zhes bya ba dang / li tsa bI gzhon

183a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / li tsa bI gzhon nu dri med 'od grags zhes bya ba dang / li tsa bI gzhon nu gling bu can gyis byin zhes bya ba dang / li tsa bI gzhon nu sa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / li
183a7(mdo sde): tsa bI gzhon nu sa steng phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang / li tsa ba'i gzhon nu mtshungs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sprin zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa li tsa bI gzhon nu sa ya phrag lnga dang brgyad
183b1(mdo sde): 'bum ste/ li tsa bI gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po la sems rab tu dga' ba sha stag ste/ phye ma red
183b2(mdo sde): k yi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
183b3(mdo sde): ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mthong na dga' ba dri za'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu sa ya phrag bzhi
183b4(mdo sde): dang bzhi 'bum la 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu mthong na dga' ba'i dri za'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dga' zhing dad pa'i grags pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu zla ba'i gtsug phud can zhes bya ba
183b5(mdo sde): dang / lha'i bu nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu rna 'phyang rna cha gdub kor can zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu rangs byed kyi rol mo'i sa 'dzin ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu dpal chen zhes bya ba
183b6(mdo sde): dang / lha'i bu zab mo tshul chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nag po chen po zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dpa' ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nam mkha' ltar mig dri ma med
183b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dga' ba la rnam par mos pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dga' phreng rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dga' bar grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu
184a1(mdo sde): bzhin dga' zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu yid 'phrog ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu bai DUR+ya'i 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i bu bai DUR+ya ltar 'od snang ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i
184a2(mdo sde): bu skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu 'bral ba zla gam ltar 'dug pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nges par sgra sgrog zab mo zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnam par
184a3(mdo sde): 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu brgya byin dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu gzhon nu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu man+dA ra ba brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i
184a4(mdo sde): bu mgo la 'khri shing thogs pa zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu bur ma sel ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu dam pa'i chos 'dzin ces bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu
184a5(mdo sde): sa ya phrag bzhi dang bzhi 'bum ste/ lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la sems dad cing rab tu dga' ba/ dam pa'i chos srung bar dga' ba/ dam pa'i chos rgyas par
184a6(mdo sde): dga' ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzung bar dga' ba sha stag ste/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom

184b1(mdo sde): ba de logs su / la mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po sa ya phrag gnyis dang brgyad 'bum la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma zhes bya ba dang /

189b2(mdo sde): srong mis byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong te ma bu ka zhes bya ba dang / drang srong shing shun can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong dka' thub can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong yang dag sbyor zhes bya ba dang / drang srong

195b7(mdo sde): phog nas gnyid 'ong zhing mngon par rtse bar gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe las mi zad pa rnam pa bcu drug gis 'tsho ba'i sems can rnams kyi las mi zad pa'i rang bzhin btang nas de dag thams cad kyang zas
196a1(mdo sde): dang skom gyis tshim par gyur te/ bde ba dang bsil ba'i rlung gis phog nas gnyid 'ong zhing mngon par rtse bar gyur to/ /sha za zhing srin po'i rang bzhin lta bur gyur pa'i sems
196a2(mdo sde): can gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang sha za ba spangs te ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshul khrims blangs so/ /yang de'i tshe sems can gang dag byi bo byed pa dang / rku 'phrog la zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag thams
196a3(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang tshul khrims blangs te dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas las mi zad pa chen po bcu drug gis 'tsho ba dang / sha za dang / byi bo byed pa dang / ma byin par
196a4(mdo sde): len pa la zhugs pa'i sems can de dag gis rang rang gi sems rjes su dran nas gar byed cing glu len te sri zhu bya bar brtsams so/ /yang de'i tshe de dag dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod
196a5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / 'byung po dang / gcod byed kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten
196a6(mdo sde): skyong dang / tshangs pa dang / nags kyi lha dang / bya dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / 'dod rgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can gyi lha mo'i tshogs du ma dag kyang chos kyi 'du ston gyi mchog gi dkyil
196a7(mdo sde): 'khor chen po thos te rab tu dga' bar gyur nas tshul khrims yongs su dag cing theg pa chen po rgyas par bya bar 'dod pas/ mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo chen po'i sgrub pa gzung bar 'dod pa/ dam
196b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams yun ring du gnas par 'dod pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rgya chen po skyed pa dang /
196b2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos gnas par 'dod pa rnams phyem red kyi dus kyi tshe rang rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'du ston la mchod pa
196b3(mdo sde): byas te mtshan mtha' yas pas yang dag par brgyan pa/ ston zla tha chung gi zla ba nya ba lta bu'i rgyal ba'i zla ba zhabs la mgo bos yun ring du phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
196b4(mdo sde): ba byas te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po zhes bya ba stan
196b5(mdo sde): l as langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
196b6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
196b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sprin chen snying po/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de
197a1(mdo sde): dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rengs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying pos bcom ldan 'das la
197a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdo gang dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtshor yang 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag par gsog par yang 'gyur
197a3(mdo sde): ba dang / thos pa'i rgya mtshor yang 'gyur ba dang / thos pa yang dag par gsog par yang 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la som nyi mi 'tshal zhing yid gnyis ma mchis
197a4(mdo sde): la the tshom 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / mi khom pa rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i las kyi zhing gi rgya mtsho la sred par yang 'gyur ba dang / tshe
197a5(mdo sde): rabs thams cad du tha na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du bdud sdig can glags lta ba dang /
197a6(mdo sde): skabs tshol bas glags rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal chom bar yang 'gyur ba dang / gzungs thob par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag dpyod pa la mkhas par
197a7(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sgor 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter yang dag par ston par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul
197b1(mdo sde): la 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu srin du yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi nang du chud par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu

197b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mu stegs la nges pa'i pad+ma dkar por yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgyes pa la dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi dkor bar
197b6(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag pa nyid du mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang / ther zug pa nyid du shin tu gsal bar mthong nas bdag nyid
197b7(mdo sde): bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ther zug pa'i sku yin no/ /zhes ther zug tu smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi ba'i rang bzhin
198a1(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba'i lta ba phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag pa/ ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba'o/ /zhes
198a2(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad du lta ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ chos kyi su yin no/ /zhes de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
