301b5(mdo sde): rkang pa'i mthe bo'i ba spu gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dkris te/ 'jig rten gyi khams dkrigs phrag mtha' yas pa bzlas nas 'phen par byed de/
301b6(mdo sde): de lta bu'i bya ba kun tu ston kyang sems can su la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur la/ sems can de dag gis kyang mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sems can gzhan dag gis ni/ bya ba de lta bu
301b7(mdo sde): bstan par shes shing mthong ngo / /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
302a1(mdo sde): g i bye ma snyed dag khab kyi rtse mos rgya shug gi lo ma steng gi phyogs su 'dor ba bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dkris phrag mtha' yas
302a2(mdo sde): pa bzlas nas gyen du 'dor bar byed de/ 'on kyang sems can su la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis kyang bdag cag gar khyer ba dang / bdag cag gar
302a3(mdo sde): song ba'ang mi shes mi mthong ngo / /phyir yang khyer te 'ongs nas snga ma'i gnas su bzhag kyang 'gro ba dang 'ong bar yang mi mngon la/ sems can gzhan dag gis ni/ 'di ni/
302a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/ /zhes shes shing mthong ngo / /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
302a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ni/ khab kyi rtse mos rgya shug gi lo ma la bya ba bzhin du phyogs dgur 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar gyen du bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams lhag ma gcig gi nang du
302a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chud par byed kyang sems can su la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur la sems can de dag gis kyang bdag cag gar khyer ba dang / bdag cag gar
302a7(mdo sde): song ba'ang mi shes mi mthong ngo / /phyir yang khyer te 'ongs nas snga ma'i gnas su bzhag kyang 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar yang mi mngon la/ sems can gzhan dag gis ni/ bya ba de lta
302b1(mdo sde): bu bstan par shes shing mthong ngo / /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
302b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi nang du brtul nas sran chung gi 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par byed de/ 'on kyang sems can su la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur la/ sems can de dag gis kyang bdag
302b3(mdo sde): cag gang du khyer ba dang / gang du song ba dang / gang du bcug pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sems can gzhan dag gis ni/ shes shing mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub
302b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya ba de lta bu dag ston par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen snying pos gsol pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang
302b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bkod pa'i gtso bo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po'i che ba nyid kyi bsod nams kyi
302b6(mdo sde): phung po ji tsam mchi ba'ang sems can rnams la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ legs so legs so/ /sprin chen snying po/ khyod legs kyi/
302b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rgyu las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dpe tsam du bstan par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ chu klung chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho bran dang / chu bran
303a1(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i khongs su gtogs shing de'i nang du 'dus so/ /sprin chen snying po/ de bzhin du mdo 'di las gzhan pa'i mdo dag gi
303a2(mdo sde): bya ba gang ci'ang rung ba rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di'i khongs su gtogs shing 'di'i nang du 'dus par blta bar bya'o/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang mdo 'di la ma gtogs pa'i
303a3(mdo sde): mdo dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag thams cad gcig tu
303a4(mdo sde): bsdus pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di thang gcig tsam thos pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi khongs su gtogs shing de'i nang du 'dus par blta bar bya'o/ /
303a5(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po/ de bas na/ thams cad rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / zhi ba dang / brtan pa'i bsod nams 'dod pa'i sems gzung bar 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
303a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par gzung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos ni/ zab mo brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus tshod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul 'di la sems
303a7(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba'i yon tan yang dag par bshad pa thos na skrag par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
303b1(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / bsil ba'i yon tan yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par bstan par bya ste/ ci nas bstan pa nub par
303b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur bar brtson par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gro ba srog chags 'byung po gang ci'ang rung ba rnams kyi rjes su byung ba de dag thams cad ni/ glang po che'i rjes kyi nang du 'du
303b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mdo 'di las gzhan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur bar rig
303b4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lhun po la sogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po rnams dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman
303b5(mdo sde): dang / shing ji snyed yod pa dang / dzam+bu'i gling dang / gling bzhi dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang zla bar bcas pa de dag thams cad ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
303b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di'i nang du 'dus par blta bar bya'o/ /sprin chen snying po/ de bzhin du so so'i skye bo'i bsod nams kyi rgyun nam/ nyan thos kyi bsod nams kyi rgyun nam/ rang sangs
303b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi rgyun nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi rgyun nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyun nam/ mdo dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bsod
304a1(mdo sde): nams kyi rgyun ji snyed yod pa rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag pa yin no/ /zhes sems
304a2(mdo sde): gcig bskyed pa'i nang du chud cing 'dus so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ston gyi dus na sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las nyi ma shar na nam mkha' la dri mar gyur cing sgrib pa'i rang
304a3(mdo sde): bzhin ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go /sprin chen snying po/ de bzhin du zab mo brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus
304a4(mdo sde): tshod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / bstan pa nub par mi 'gyur ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang
304a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i nyi ma rtag pa shar ba na ldem po ngag gi nam mkha' la ji snyed yod pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /sprin
304a6(mdo sde): chen snying po/ gzhan yang 'di na mi la la zhig rlung gi rgyal po bzhi'i mthu can/ stobs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu lo brgya thub pa zhig byung la mi de'ang nyin par lam du zhugs te/
304a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams du mar song nas phyir rang gi gnas su ldog par byed cing nub mo'ang lam du zhugs nas 'jig rten gyi khams du ma bskor te phyir rang gi gnas su ldog
304b1(mdo sde): par byed pa de lta bur nyin mtshan du lam du zhugs pas ji tsam du phyin pa de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rang gi lus kyi 'phang tsam du gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin te/ thabs de dag lta
304b2(mdo sde): bur bar chad dang / skyon ma byung bar sbyin pa byin na/ sprin chen snying po/ ci de gzhi de las de bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshad ma mchis so/ /bcom
304b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ de lta bu'i sbyin pa de las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i
304b4(mdo sde): che ba nyid kyi yon tan nub par mi 'gyur ba'i bstan pa 'khor bzhi las gang yang rung ba'am/ spyod pa pa'am/ kun tu rgyu'am/ gcer bu pa la sogs pa la 'chad cing ston par byed
304b5(mdo sde): dam| yang na 'phya ba'am/ sting ba'am/ gzhan gyi g.yam la bya ba 'am/ 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur bya ba'i phyir ram/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa'i phyir de
304b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rtag go / zhes tshig tu brjod pa tsam gyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /
304b7(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman gyi rgyal po rtsi'i sdong bu de'i rtsa ba khyer ram/ shun phrags sam/ pri'am/ lo ma 'am/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu'am/ mgo thog gam/ sdong
305a1(mdo sde): bu'am| yal ga'am/ bur ma'am/ rtsa ba dag khyer yang rung ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi rtsa ba khyer ro/ /bdag gi shun phrags khyer ro/ /bdag gi pri khyer ro/ /
305a2(mdo sde): bdag gi lo ma khyer ro/ /bdag gi me tog khyer ro/ /bdag gi 'bras bu khyer ro/ /bdag gi mgo thog khyer ro/ /bdag gi sdong bu khyer ro/ /bdag gi yal ga khyer ro/ /bdag gi bur ma khyer
305a3(mdo sde): ro| |bdag gi rtsa ba dag khyer ro snyam du mi sems so/ /rtsi'i sdong bu la rnam par rtog pa yong med do/ /rnam par rtog pa med du zin kyang sems can rab 'bring tha ma thams cad la 'o ma'am/
305a4(mdo sde): zho'am/ mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ sman ci'ang rung bdag dang sbyar ba'am/ sman thams cad dang bsres pa'i lde gu'am/ btung ba'am/ lus bsku bas nad sel bar byed do/ /de bzhin
305a5(mdo sde): du ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan pa'ang rtsa ba'am/ rgyud dam/ tshigs su bcad pa'am/ tshig gam/ tshig gi phyed dam/ ming ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go /zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'bru
305a6(mdo sde): gnyis kyis nyan pa dang / de 'di snyam du bdag gis rtsa ba las ting nge 'dzin bzung ngo / /rgyu las bzung ngo / /tshigs su bcad pa las bzung ngo / /tshig las bzung ngo / /tshig phyed las
305a7(mdo sde): bzung ngo / /ming las bzung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go /zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'bru gnyis las bzung ngo snyam du sems te/ rnam par rtog pa de dag med do/ /rnam par rtog pa
305b1(mdo sde): med du zin kyang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma las gang yang rung ba'am/ spyod pa ba'am/ kun tu rgyu'am/ gcer bu pa la sogs pa'am/ lus yongs su ma
305b2(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'am/ shes rab yongs su ma sbyangs pa'am/ sems yongs su ma sbyangs pa'ang rung ste/ 'phya ba'am/ bsting ba'i phyir ram/ rang gi kha nas byung ngam/ gzhan gyi g.yam las
305b3(mdo sde): byung ba'am/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa'i phyir yang rung ste/ mnyan tam bzung na/ de dag gi sdig pa grangs med pa byas pa dang / las de dag lus 'di nyid kyi
305b4(mdo sde): tshe byang bar 'gyur la/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i nad 'byung ba'i phyir zhugs pa'ang ma yin no/ /sprin chen snying po/ dper na/ nyi ma sha
305b5(mdo sde): ma thag tu kha ba dang / mun pa'i tshogs chen po rmeg med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi nyi ma rtag pa 'di shar ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / las kyi tshogs kyi
305b6(mdo sde): kha ba dang / mun pa dang / sprin dang / sgrib pa rnams rmeg med par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa/ sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang dper na/ rlung ni/ nam mkha'
305b7(mdo sde): la langs nas sems can thams cad la rang dbang med par spu dang / lus kyi yan lag thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i nang du zhugs nas me'i phung po 'jil bar byed do/ /de bzhin du 'dir yang ting nge
306a1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rtag pa nyid kyi yon tan gyis bsgos pa'i rlung nyon mongs pa'i nam mkha' ldang bar byed cing / sems can thams
306a2(mdo sde): cad la rang dbang med par spu dang / yan lag thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i nang du zhugs nas sdig pa grangs med pa rnams dang / las kyi me'i phung po rnams sel bar byed do/ /sprin chen snying
306a3(mdo sde): po| gzhan yang 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir yang tshul
306a4(mdo sde): khrims mi srung ngo / /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan mtha'
306a5(mdo sde): yas pa'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
306a6(mdo sde): gnas kyi phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpag tu med pa nyid kyi phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshungs pa med pa nyid kyi phyir yang
306a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gyi phyir yang sems gnas par mi sgom mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po'i phyir yang sems gnas par mi sgom
306b1(mdo sde): mo| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas kyi phyir yang sems gnas par mi sgom mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpag tu med pa'i phyir yang sems gnas par mi sgom
306b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir yang sems gnas par mi sgom mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i grangs med pa'i phyir yang sems gnas par mi sgom mo/ /de bzhin gshegs
306b3(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yang sems gnas par mi sgom mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gyi phyir yang sems skyed par mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
306b4(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po'i phyir yang sems skyed par mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas kyi phyir yang sems skyed par mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin gshegs
306b5(mdo sde): pa'i dpag tu med pa'i phyir yang sems skyed par mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir yang sems skyed par mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i grangs med
306b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir yang sems skyed par mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yang sems skyed par mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
306b7(mdo sde): pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyir yang tshul
307a1(mdo sde): khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i gnas bla na med pa'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i
307a2(mdo sde): phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung gi / sems can thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde
307a3(mdo sde): ba dang / 'khrug pa las thar bar 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad kyis bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad
307a4(mdo sde): grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad byang chub kyi yon tan la dgod par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad
307a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gzhug par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can
307a6(mdo sde): thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun yongs su sdud du gzhug par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par bya bar 'dod pa'i
307a7(mdo sde): phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad la chos kyi rgyun mi gcad par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad la dge 'dun gyi rigs bsgrub
307b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba bsgrub pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims
307b2(mdo sde): ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / ma 'khrugs par 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen
307b3(mdo sde): snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gyi slad du tshul khrims mi srung ngo / /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
307b4(mdo sde): gshegs pas ci la dgongs te de skad gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sgrub
307b5(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sprin chen snying po/ dper na/ nor bu rin
307b6(mdo sde): po che bai DUR+ya du ma dang / nor thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa des bdag nyid la yod bzhin du bai DUR+ya'i phyir 'dod pa'i sems dang / the tshom skyed par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
307b7(mdo sde): de ni| ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid la yod bzhin du mtshan gyi phyir 'dod pa'i sems skyed pa de ni/ gnas
308a1(mdo sde): med do| |sprin chen snying po/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul dang / yon tan thams cad dang
308a2(mdo sde): ldan par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci bgyi ba mthar phyin pa dang ldan pa lags par rig par bgyi'am/ bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ de skad ma
308a3(mdo sde): zer cig / 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
308a4(mdo sde): par byas pa na bya ba mthar phyin par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
308a5(mdo sde): gang dag ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul bshad pa thos nas spong bar mi bgyid pa ni/ kye ma ngo mtshar te/ sems can de dag ni/ mya ngan du bgyi mi 'tshal ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
308a6(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po/ de de bzhin te/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di bshad pa na gang dag spong bar mi byed pa'i sems can da dag la ni/ mya ngan bya mi dgos so/ /
308a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po'i bu rigs che zhing stobs dang ldan la 'khor snying nye ba dang / tshul du bsrung bar bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan zhing rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba'i
308b1(mdo sde): dus la bab pa ni/ gnas dma' ba'i las la 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed de/ rgya chen po'i rgyal srid kyi gnas la sems so/ /de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di bshad pa thos na spong bar
308b2(mdo sde): mi byed cing kha ton du byed pa dag ni/ chos kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan zhing byang chub chen por dbang bskur ba'i 'os yin te/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog 'di las
308b3(mdo sde): gzhan pa gnas dma' ba la 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed de/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po'i gnas 'di'ang rkyen du bab pa yin no/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang dper na/
308b4(mdo sde): gdol ba zol ba ni/ mchod pa chen pos dbang bskur ba'i 'os ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gdol ba zol ba dang 'dra ba'i sems can dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di'i dbang bskur ba'i 'os su
308b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /sprin chen snying po/
308b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yul la ltos/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
308b7(mdo sde): tan rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di mi shes pa'i sems can rnams la khong du chud par bya'o snyam nas sems can gang dag gang la
309a1(mdo sde): ci dang cis don du 'gyur ba de dang de dag la de dang de sbyin par bya'o snyam du dam bcas nas smon lam gyi phyir tshul khrims srung ste/ lag pa 'dod pa rnams
309a2(mdo sde): la ni| lag pa sbyin no/ /rkang pa 'dod pa rnams la ni/ rkang pa la sbyin no/ /mig 'dod pa rnams la ni/ mig sbyin no/ /sha 'dod pa rnams la ni/ sha sbyin no/ /khrag 'dod pa rnams
309a3(mdo sde): la ni| khrag sbyin no/ /rkang 'dod pa rnams la ni/ rkang sbyin no/ /yan lag re re nas 'dod pa rnams la yan lag re re nas sbyin no/ /bran pho dang / bran mo 'dod pa rnams la'ang bran
309a4(mdo sde): du 'gro bar bya na/ nor ram 'bru rnams yongs su gtang ba lta ci smos te/ de ltar gyur cig ces de'i phyir tshul khrims srung ngo / /gzhan yang 'jig rten dang mthun pa'i bya ba du ma
309a5(mdo sde): dag gis sems can gang dang gang la ci ngang cis don du 'gyur ba de dang de la de dang de sbyin par bya'o/ /mi dga' ba med par yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /phyis 'gyod pa med par sbyin par
309a6(mdo sde): bya'o| / rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can la phan gdags pa dang / sems can la snying brtse ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir
309a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad de/ sems can thams cad la bsdus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa nyid khong du chud par bya'o snyam mo/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang ting nge
309b1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa nyid yang dag par khong du chud par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di
309b2(mdo sde): snyam du gzhan gyi don gyi phyir lag pa'am/ rkang pa'am/ bran pho dang / bran mo'ang rung ste/ sems can gang dang gang la ci dang cis don du 'gyur ba de dang de sbyin par bya ste/ bdag gi lus
309b3(mdo sde): don med par mi 'gyur bar sems can rnams kyi longs spyod kyi rgyur gyur cig ces sems skyed par byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo'i gzhung lugs gzhan dag
309b4(mdo sde): las dge slong dag / mi'i lus ni/ shag shig tu gyur pa lta bu rnag can gyi lus yin te/ rdza mkhan gyi phub ma mi gces pa bor bzhin du dgos pa'i don dag la don du 'gyur ba
309b5(mdo sde): med do| |zhes bka' stsal na/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas bdag gi lus don med par ma gyur cig ces lus yongs su gtong ngo / /zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das kyis ci
309b6(mdo sde): la dgongs te de skad gsungs/ bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ de ltar ma lta zhig/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni /chos kyi lus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
309b7(mdo sde): na/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni/ rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag 'dus pa ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings yin pas na/ chos kyi lus yin gyi/ sha'i lus ma yin
310a1(mdo sde): no| |zhes 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs te chos kyi lus yin gyi/ sha'i lus ma yin no//
310a2(mdo sde): zhes de skad bstan pa mdzad/ gal te chos kyi lus lags na ni/ sems can rnams la'ang dgos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzhung lugs gzhan dag las bcom ldan 'das
310a3(mdo sde): kyis nam mkha' bye rjes ni/ shin tu bsgrims te bcal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de lta lags pas gal ta 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus de 'dra
310a4(mdo sde): ba zhig tu gyur na/ de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi chos kyi lus la ni/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang nam mkha'i bya'i rjes bzhin du gzhom pa'am dbye bar mi nus so/ /bka' stsal pa/ sprin
310a5(mdo sde): chen snying po/ de skad ma zer cig/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus sems can rnams la dgos pa de ni/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par nges par rig par bya'o/ /
310a6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci las dgongs te byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin no/ /zhes gsungs/ gal te byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus lags na
310a7(mdo sde): ni| sems can rnams la stsal pa na yang 'di ltar chos kyi lus su bzhag pas der 'gal ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /kye ma 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sha'i lus sems
310b1(mdo sde): can rnams la stsol bar bgyid do/ /zhes gda' bas na/ sho be lags so/ /zhes mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ de skad ma zer cig/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub
310b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i lus bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs
310b3(mdo sde): te phyin ci log gi 'du shes dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i 'du shes dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi chos dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos zhes yang dang yang du de skad gsung / bka'
310b4(mdo sde): stsal pa| sprin chen snying po/ de ltar rnam pa gzhan du ma sems shig /'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rtsi'i sdong bu lta
310b5(mdo sde): bu'i lus yin no/ /'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / mig yor lta bur bsgoms te/ kye ma bdag gi lus ni/ spyod pa me
310b6(mdo sde): cing byed pa med pa ste/ sems med pa can/ snying po med pa'i lus/ khams su ma gtogs pa ste/ ci ste 'di la la zhig gcod par byad dam/ 'byed par byed dam/ 'phrog par byed
310b7(mdo sde): dam| rku bar byed kyang rung ste/ bdag gi lus rtsi'i sdong bu ltar don med par ma gyur cig ces sgom par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi lus su bzhag pa'i phyir ro/ /sprin chen snying po/
311a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang dper na/ rtsi'i sdong bu de'i rtsa ba khyer na yang 'di snyam du bdag gi rtsa ba khyer ro snyam du mi sems so/ /shun lpags sam/ bri'am/ lo ma'am/
311a2(mdo sde): me tog gam/ 'bras bu'am/ mgo thog gam/ sdong bu'am/ yal ga'am/ bur ma'am/ rtsa ba dag khyer yang rung ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi shun lpags khyer ro/ /bdag gi
311a3(mdo sde): bri khyer ro/ /bdag gi lo ma khyer ro snyam du sems so/ /de bzhin du 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus rtsi'i sdong bu las lag pa khyer ram/ rkang pa khyer ram/ mig
311a4(mdo sde): khyer ram/ sha khyer ram/ khrag khyer ram/ rkang khyer ram/ yan lag re re nas khyer ram/ bran pho dang / bran mo khyer ram/ nor ram/ 'bru khyer yang de 'di snyam
311a5(mdo sde): du bdag gi lag pa khyer ro/ /bdag gi rkang pa khyer ro/ /bdag gi mig khyer ro/ /bdag gi sha khyer ro/ /bdag gi khrag khyer ro/ /bdag gi rkang khyer ro/ /bdag gi yan lag re re
311a6(mdo sde): nas khyer ro/ /bdag gi bran pho dang / bran mo khyer ro/ /bdag gi nor dang 'bru khyer ro/ /snyam du mi sems te/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
311a7(mdo sde): gti mug gi nad bsal ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni phal pa tha ma'i lus ma yin gyi/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus
311b1(mdo sde): dang / bdud rtsi'i lus yin par rig par bya'o/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang gi tshe byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus zad par byed pa de'i
311b2(mdo sde): tshe bya rgod dang / chun lag la sogs pa srog chags rnams kyi de'i ro rtsi'i sdong bu bzhin du zas su za bar 'gyur la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de ni
311b3(mdo sde): gnas med de/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye zhing sangs rgyas mang po mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di myur du rtogs par 'dod pa'i dge slong ngam/
311b4(mdo sde): dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas ni 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang / ther zug dang / zhi ba dang / brtan pa dang / dam pa'i chos
311b5(mdo sde): kyi mdo nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems can gang dang gang la ci dang cis don du 'gyur ba de dang de la de dang de sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ lag pa 'dod pa rnams la ni lag pa sbyin no/ /
311b6(mdo sde): rkang pa 'dod pa rnams la ni rkang pa sbyin no/ /mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin no/ /sha 'dod pa rnams la ni sha sbyin no/ /khrag 'dod pa rnams la ni khrag sbyin no/ /rkang 'dod
311b7(mdo sde): pa rnams la ni rkang sbyin no/ /yan lag re re nas 'dod pa rnams la'ang yan lag re re sbyin no/ /bran 'dod pa rnams la'ang bran du 'gro bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang / bshad pa'i
312a1(mdo sde): phyir yang bdag gi lag pa khyer bar gyur cig / bdag gi rkang pa khyer bar gyur cig /de bzhin du sna dang / rna ba dang / yan lag so so rnams dang / de'i 'og tu bdag
312a2(mdo sde): gi srog kyang yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag nyid rtsi'i sdong bu bzhin du rtag tu sems bskyed par bya zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du'ang sems bskyed par byas na/
312a3(mdo sde): se go la gtogs pa tsam du sems bskyed par bya ba lta ci smos/ sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang dper na/ rta'i rgyal po rdog khyer dang ldan pa sprin gyi shugs can ni/ gru zhig pa'i mi
312a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi phyir brten pa'i sems kyis chas te ri ma la ya'i dbus su 'dug nas sgra chen po bsgrags te/ gang dag nga'i rgyab bam/ 'phongs sam/ bya la'am/ tha na spu'i nyag ma tsam
312a5(mdo sde): la 'ju ba'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/ /zhes zer ba de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
312a6(mdo sde): ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / sems can gzhan dag la 'phya ba'i phyir ram/ bsting ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di las de bzhin
312a7(mdo sde): gshags pa rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / zhi ba dang / brtan pa dang / zab pa'i tshig gi don nam/ tshigs su bcad pa'am/ tha na tshig gi phyed kyang rung ste/ rna lam du thos par
312b1(mdo sde): byed pa dag dang / gang dag 'chang ba'ang rung ba'i sems can gru zhig par gyur pa dang 'dra ba de dag ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i dra ba las grol bar byed do/ /sprin chen snying po/
312b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di rna lam du grags pa tsam gyis de dag mi'i dbang po'i phun sum tshogs pa las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po'i phun sum tshogs pa las nyams
312b3(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po'i phun sum tshogs pa las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phun sum tshogs pa las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo 'di'i
312b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi phun sum tshogs pa las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shin tu
312b5(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i lta ba can lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag de kho na dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dang /
312b6(mdo sde): sems can du 'du shes pa yang dag par mthong ba dag ni/ shin tu yang dag pa'i lta ba can yin zhes nga smra'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs
312b7(mdo sde): te 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes rdzun pa rnams rdzogs par bshad cing de skad bka' stsal/ bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ de kho na dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dang / sems can du 'du
313a1(mdo sde): shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ thar pa'i don gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / zhi ba dang / brtan pa
313a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te byis pa bzhin du de kho na dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dang
313a3(mdo sde): sems can du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes gsung / bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid ma dkri zhig /ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub
313a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin ni/ de yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de snyed cig mdzad de/ zlos bu dang 'dren mar de ltar bka' stsal te ci bgyi/ bdag
313a5(mdo sde): med pa'i chos nyid thugs su chud bzhin pa lam drang po dang mi mthun pa/ rtag pa dang / bdag dang / sems can du 'du shes ci'i slad du skyed du stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag /
313a6(mdo sde): thar pa ni/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ de'ang mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /gdags par bya ba'i thabs kyang med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
313a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba snyed kyang chu'i zla ba dang 'dra'o/ /sgyu ma dang 'dra'o/ /dngos po med pa'o/ /ya
313b1(mdo sde): ma brla'o/ /rmi lam lta bu'i rang bzhin can no/ /chu shing gi sdong po ltar snying po med pa'o/ /glog dang sprin ltar mi brtan pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'o/ /chos
313b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi bya ba du ma dag ni/ nam mkha'i rlung gi rjes kyi rang bzhin can no/ /zhes kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ yang 'jig rten na sems can thams cad ni/ bsam
313b3(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du'o/ /zhes kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin thugs su chud pa bzhin du rtag pa dang /
313b4(mdo sde): bdag dang / sems can du 'du shes ji ltar skyed du stsal/ rtag pa'i spyod pa'ang ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ spyod pa 'di'i rjes su'ang ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
313b5(mdo sde): stsal pa| dge slong dag / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu bsgrims te 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyi khong du gtogs pa'i nang du stsal kyang bdag tu 'du shes pa ma rnyed do/ /zhes
313b6(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med par bka' stsal te/ 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad stong par yang dag par gsungs na/ rtag pa dang / bdag dang / sems can du 'du shes
313b7(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal pa 'di la don ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ khyod gar 'bros/ khyod gang du 'phyan/ da phyin chad de skad ma zer cig /ting
314a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos thams cad mi mthun no/ /zhes skrag par mi byed la/ chos thams cad mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir
314a2(mdo sde): yang tshul khrims rgya cher mi srung zhing sems kyang sgom par mi byed de/ chos thams cad mi mthun pa med pas rab tu dga' nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rtsom pa las nub par mi byed
314a3(mdo sde): do| |chos thams cad chad do/ /zhes kyang skrag par mi byed la/ chos thams cad chad pa med pa'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung zhing sems kyang sgom par mi byed do/ /chos thams cad
314a4(mdo sde): chad pa med pas rab tu dga' nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rtsom pa las nur bar mi byed do/ /de bzhin du rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang gong ma bzhin sbyar bar bya'o/ /rlom sems dang /
314a5(mdo sde): rlom sems med pa dang / g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa dang / dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs
314a6(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / rig pa dang / ma rig pa dang / ming dang / ming med pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa dang /
314a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / 'chi ba dang / 'chi ba med pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub med pa'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /chos thams cad mya
314b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'das so/ /zhes skrag par mi byed/ dngang bar mi byed la/ chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pa'i phyir yang tshul khrims mi srung zhing sems kyang sgom par mi byed do/ /
314b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas rab tu dga' nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rtsom pa las nur bar mi byed de/ yang dang yang smos ci dgos/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la
314b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba'i chos
314b4(mdo sde): nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu gnas shing tshul khrims srung ste sems bsgom mo/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la bdag nyid myur du gnas par 'dod pas ni/ bdag
314b5(mdo sde): tu 'du shes pa sgom par bya'o/ /gang zag tu 'du shes pa bsgom par bya'o/ /srog tu 'du shes pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di myur ba nyid du thob
314b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs te mkhyen bzhin du de skad gsungs/ bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i
314b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'jig rten pa'i bdag tu 'du shes pa sgom par byed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la'ang bdag gi ming mchis sam/
315a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'du shes su bstan pa mi
315a2(mdo sde): 'dod pas rnam pa lngas yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'bru'i sa bon lta bu dang / shing gi sa bon lta bu dang / snum gyi khu ba lta bu dang / rin po che'i rnam pa lta bu dang / sbrul
315a3(mdo sde): gyi pags pa rnying pa lta bu'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bras sA lu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu nas 'bru nyid du ma gyur gyi bar du mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing bgrang ste/
315a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bya ba'i don yang mi byed la/ phub ma med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur nas ni/ sems can rnams kyi bya ba'i don yang byed cing sa bon brtan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
315a5(mdo sde): su'ang bgrang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad mi mthun par spyod cing nam ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob kyi bar du ni/ mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing bgrang ste/
315a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi skyabs byed par yang mi 'gyur la/ lta ba dang / the tshom dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa dang / mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyi
315a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i phub ma thams cad dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas de phyin chad ni/ sems can rnams kyi the tshom thams cad kyang gcod par byed cing skyabs su gyur pa'ang
315b1(mdo sde): yin la| rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon du'ang 'gyur zhing sems can du 'du shes pa la'ang 'god par 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ chos
315b2(mdo sde): thams cad 'bru'i sa bon dang 'dra ba yin no/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing ta la dang / a mra dang / spa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa ni/ dang po lcug gu skye ba nas
315b3(mdo sde): nam 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du ma gyur gyi bar du mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing bgrang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bya ba'i don yang byed la shun lpags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin
315b4(mdo sde): du gyur nas ni/ sems can rnams kyi bya ba'i don yang byed de/ sa bon brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing bgrang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad mi mthun par spyod
315b5(mdo sde): cing nam ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob kyi bar du mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing bgrang ste/ sems can rnams kyi skyabs byed par yang mi 'gyur la/ lta ba dang / the tshom dang / yongs
315b6(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa dang / mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyi nyon mongs pa'i shun lpags thams cad dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas de phyin chad ni/
315b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi the tshom thams cad kyang gcod par byed cing skyabs su gyur ba'ang yin la/ rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon
316a1(mdo sde): du'ang 'gyur zhing sems can du 'du shes pa la'ang 'god par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing dang / til dang /
316a2(mdo sde): khre dang / khre rgod dang / ba'i 'o ma la sogs pa'i snum gyi khu ba lta bu ni/ myu gu dang / 'o ma byung ba nas nam snum gyi khu ba nyid du ma gyur gyi bar du mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par
316a3(mdo sde): 'du zhing bgrang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bya ba'i don yang mi byed do/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad mi mthun par spyod cing / nam ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob kyi bar du ni/ mi brtan
316a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing bgrang ste/ sems can rnams kyi skyabs byed par yang mi 'gyur la/ lta ba dang / the tshom dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang /
316a5(mdo sde): mi rtag pa dang / mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyi nyon mongs pa'i shun lpags dang bral te bskus pa'i rang bzhin du gyur nas de phyin chad ni/ sems can rnams kyi the tshom thams cad kyang
316a6(mdo sde): gcod par byed cing skyabs su gyur pa'ang yin la/ rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon du'ang 'gyur zhing sems can du 'du shes pa
316a7(mdo sde): la'ang 'god par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ro nye'i mgar ba'am/ zangs mgar ram/ dbyig dang / gser gyi mgar ba'am/ rin po che byed pa
316b1(mdo sde): gzhan gang yang rung bas rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma la sogs pa legs par brdzis pas las shig byas te/ so gtong ba nas nam sna gcig gi rang bzhin nam/ rin po cher ma gyur
316b2(mdo sde): bar du mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du zhing bgrang ste/ sems can rnams kyi bya ba'i don yang mi byed la/ gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / so dog med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur nas ni
316b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bya ba'i don yang byed cing / rin po che'i rang bzhin ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / rtag pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad
316b4(mdo sde): mi mthun par spyod cing / nam ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob kyi bar du ni/ mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du ste/ sems can rnams kyi skyabs byed par yang mi 'gyur la/ lta ba dang /
316b5(mdo sde): the tshom dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa dang / mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyi nyon mongs pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas de phyin
316b6(mdo sde): chad ni/ sems can rnams kyi the tshom thams cad kyang gcod par byed cing skyabs su gyur pa'ang yin la/ rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyi
316b7(mdo sde): sa bon du'ang 'gyur zhing sems can du 'du shes pa la'ang 'god par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprul rgas pa'i pags pa rnying pa nam ma brjes
317a1(mdo sde): kyi bar du mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad mi mthun par spyod cing / nam ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob kyi bar du sprul
317a2(mdo sde): rgas pa'i pags pa rnying pa bzhin du mi brtan pa'i chos su yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur la/ sbrul rgas pa'i pags pa rnying pa dang 'dra ba'i lta ba dang / the tshom dang / yongs su mya
317a3(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa dang / mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyi nyon mongs pa'i shun lpags thams cad dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas de phyin chad ni/
317a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi the tshom thams cad kyang gcod par byed cing skyabs su gyur pa'ang yin la/ rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / bsil pa dang / bde ba
317a5(mdo sde): dang / 'jigs pa med par yang 'gyur zhing sems can rnams kyang bdag dang / sems can du 'du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa 'di la 'god par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen snying
317a6(mdo sde): po| de bas na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la rnam pa lnga po 'di dag gis bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu gyur pa nyid du yang dag
317a7(mdo sde): par mthong bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos ni/ don 'di lta bur blta bar bya'o/ /gang dag de ltar mi lta ba de dag ni/ yang dag pa mthong ba ma yin no/ /zhes nga smra'o//
317b1(mdo sde): sems can de dag ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos can dang / rmongs pa'i chos can yin par nga smra'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs te/ 'di skad
317b2(mdo sde): du dpe lnga po 'di dag ni/ de kho na yin zhes gsung / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de skad gsung na ni/ 'di'i gtan tshigs bka' stsal 'tshal lo/ /'di ni/ sems can rnams la'ang
317b3(mdo sde): 'gal ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa'i chos yin no/ /zhes kyang bka' stsal nas dpe lnga po 'bru dang /
317b4(mdo sde): shing la sogs pa 'bras bu nyid du gyur pa na de dag ji ltar slar 'jig par mi 'gyur/ gal te 'jig par 'gyur na ni/ sems can yang 'jig par 'gyur bas de dang 'dra bas chos thams
317b5(mdo sde): cad kyang mi rtag par yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bdag mchi ste/ zhig go 'tshal ni/ slar skye'o/ /zhes bdag mchi'o/ /bdag ni/ sems can rnams la rnam pa gnyis su mi
317b6(mdo sde): rtog ste| 'dir gum pa rnams gzhan du skye ba so sor len par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bdag mchi'o/ /de bas na/ chos thams cad ni/ mi rtag go /zhes bdag mchi ste/ 'jig rten 'di na rtag pa'i
317b7(mdo sde): chos ci'ang yang dag par ma mthong ngo / /gal te de ltar gyur na rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i don gnyis ka ma mchis so/ /zhes bdag mchi mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas sho be byung ngo / /
318a1(mdo sde): zhes kyang ji skad bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ ci dar gyi srin bu ltar bdag nyid dkri bar sems sam/ 'di na mi la la
318a2(mdo sde): de 'dra ba'i phyir kye ma khyod kyi bzhin zla ba 'dra'o/ /zhes zla ba las dpe len par byed la/ mi gzhan zhig gis ni/ kye ma glang po che'i dbang po ri dang 'dra'o/ /zhes ri las dpe len par
318a3(mdo sde): byed na/ ci zla ba bzhin dang 'dra bar 'gyur ram/ ri'ang glang po che dang 'dra bar 'gyur ram zhes brjod dgos so/ /gsol pa/ 'di ni/ dper bgyi ba lags zhes bdag mchi'o/ /
318a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ bstan pa'i dpe ni/ 'jig rten thams cad na med de/ de dang 'dra ba tsam gyi phyir dpe rnam pa lnga po 'di dag ngas dper byas mod kyi/ 'di la
318a5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni/ dpe med par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci las dgongs te thar pa la lcags kyi mar
318a6(mdo sde): me gum pa'i tshul dang 'dra zhes gsung / bka' stsal pa/ da ni/ thar pa la lcags kyi mar me shi ba'i tshul dang 'dra zhes mi zher gyi/ nyon mongs pa zad pa la zer ro/ /gsol
318a7(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci mkhyen bzhin du thar pa la mi gsung gi/ nyon mongs pa zad pa la gsung ngo / /zhes sho be gsung ngam/ da ltar ni/ 'di skad gsung la chos thams
318b1(mdo sde): cad chu zla dang 'dra ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /zhes kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chu zla dang 'dra ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa zad pa la
318b2(mdo sde): gsungs kyi/ chos thams cad la ma gsungs te/ chos la la ni/ rtag /chos la la ni/ mi rtag ces nga smra'o/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ ji lta zhe na/ sems can gang dag thar pa'i phyogs
318b3(mdo sde): su gtogs pa de dag ni/ rtag pa'i chos can yin no/ /gang dag sems can med pa dang / srog med pa'i phyogs su gtogs pa de dag ni/ mi rtag pa'i chos can zhes nga smra'o/ /gsol
318b4(mdo sde): pa| dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul du bka' stsal lags na/ ci la dgongs te bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas lcags kyi mar me gum pa lta bu'i tshul du bstan pa mdzad/
318b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ de la dngos po ci zhig yod/ gsol pa/ 'bru mar gyi snod dang / lcags kyi rang bzhin mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /
318b6(mdo sde): de ltar lta bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po'i rang bzhin dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /gal te 'bru mar gyi snod
318b7(mdo sde): dang / lcags kyi rang bzhin dang lhan cig tu mar me gum pa lta bu de thar pa'i tshul yin no/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bshad par gyur na ni/ de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chad
319a1(mdo sde): par smra bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ sprin chen snying po/ ngas ni/ de skad ma bshad kyi/ dngos po med pa'i tshul du bshad de/ lcags kyi mar me shi ba'i tshul du
319a2(mdo sde): bshad pa gang yin pa de ni/ nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi ba'i tha tshig ste/ dngos po ni/ yod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu bsgrims te bskal pa bye
319a3(mdo sde): ba phrag mang por btsal kyang mi rnyed do/ /zhes gsungs pa'i don 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ de de bzhin
319a4(mdo sde): t e| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srid pa thams cad du bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa la sogs par rab tu bsgrims te btsal kyang sems can du 'du shes pa rnyed
319a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po zhig rang gi khang bzang gi btsun mo'i 'khor nas byung ste gnas gzhan zhig tu song bar mthong ba la rgyal po
319a6(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug go/ /zhes bya ba de ni/ gnas med do/ /de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa bdag dang / sems can dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad spangs
319a7(mdo sde): pa| kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi don la srid pa'i nyes pa dang rnam par 'dres shing 'dug go / zhes bya ba de ni/
319b1(mdo sde): gnas med do/ /de bas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa thams cad na'ang rtag par gnas pa'i chos yungs 'bru tsam yang med do/ /zhes bya ba de ni/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog
319b2(mdo sde): dang / gang zag med do/ /zhes bstan pa yin te/ shin tu yun ring du gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i
319b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chags pa'ang ma yin/ na chags pa'ang ma yin/ nye bar len pa'i chos la gnas pa'ang ma yin te/ rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / bde ba dang /
319b4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag nyid yin te/ sprin chen snying po/ de bas na/ rtag pa
319b5(mdo sde): dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa'o/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /sprin chen snying po/ ngas nyan thos kyi theg par dge slong dag /yongs su gzung bar bya ba gang yin pa de yongs su gzung bar gyis shig /
319b6(mdo sde): yongs su gzung bar bya ba rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / bdag blang bar bya ba blang bar gyis shig/ lta ba'i rten du gyur pa rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa de la rten
319b7(mdo sde): cig ces bstan te/ gsal ba'i don mi mngon par byas nas gsal bar ngas bstan pa de 'jig rten gyis khong du mi chud de/ sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag ni/ thar pa la zad par
320a1(mdo sde): sems shing de bzhin gshegs pa yod bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /zhes yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes la 'jug ste/ srog
320a2(mdo sde): chags phye ma leb mar me'i nang du ltung ba bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong pa'i bu thams cad dpyid kyi dus tshigs su ga zhig tu 'dus nas rdzing bu chu chen po'i nang du khrus byed la/ de'i
320a3(mdo sde): nang du gcig gis nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba bor nas nor bu rin po che de'i gzi brjid kyi mthus kyang rdzing bu'i chu'i phung po rus pa dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo
320a4(mdo sde): dang / rngo yod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rnam par mdzes par gyur te/ der zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyang lhan ne/ lhang nger mi 'dug go /de nas skye bo mang pos nor bu de btsal ba'i
320a5(mdo sde): phyir rko ba dag gis rko bar byed de/ de'i nang nas ci'ang rung ba zhig blangs nas nor bu rnyed do snyam du sems te/ yid rab tu dga' bar byed do/ /de nas sems can de dag rdzing bu'i 'gram
320a6(mdo sde): du 'khod nas so sor rlom sems su gyur na/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ bdag cag gis ma rnyed do snyam du sems par 'gyur ram/ de nas sems can da dag thams cad kyis nor bu
320a7(mdo sde): rin po che ma rnyed kyang kye ma nor bu rin po che ma rnyed do/ /zhes nor bu med pa'i 'du shes 'jug cing rtog par byed dam/ de'i nang na thabs la mkhas shing yid gzhungs pa gcig gis ni/
320b1(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che de btsal te rnyed do/ /de bzhin du mdo dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ldem po ngag gi tshig mi shes pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni/ thams cad mi
320b2(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / stong pa'i 'du shes dang / sems can med pa sgom par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa nyid ma thob pas sems can thams cad 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor gyi/ ting nge
320b3(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag nor bu bzhin du rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /sprin chen snying po/ de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs
320b4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi shin tu lhag pa yang dag par mthong bar 'dod pas ni/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la rtag pa dang / bdag dang / sems can du 'du shes bskyed par
320b5(mdo sde): bya zhing thar pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/ rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
320b6(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ shing gi grib ma dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shing yod na grib ma 'byung la/ grib ma yod na lam du zhugs par 'gyur te/ ngal bar gyur pa'i sems can der
320b7(mdo sde): 'dug pa rnams dbugs phyin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag de bzhin
321a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba'i sems can de dag la ni/ skyabs su 'gro ba tsam yang med do/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /gang dag da ltar yang
321a2(mdo sde): dag par mthong ba de dag ni/ bstan pa 'di la 'phro bar mi byed do/ /gang dag yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes su lta ba'i sems can de dag ni/ mya ngan du bya ba yin no/ /zhes yang dang
321a3(mdo sde): yang du nga smra'o/ /de nas de'i tshe nub phyogs nas gser gyi 'do chen po zhig snang bar gyur te/ gser gyi 'od chen po des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nor
321a4(mdo sde): bu rin po che'i me'i 'od snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ de'i skabs su stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od gcig pu ma gtogs par de
321a5(mdo sde): las gzhan pa zla ba dang / nyi ma rnams kyi 'od dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding rnams kyi 'od
321a6(mdo sde): thams cad mog mog por gyur te rtsig pa dang / shing dang / tshal gyi nang dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi bar mtshams de dag thams cad 'od des snang
321a7(mdo sde): bar byas so/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog pa de dag thams cad kyang sdug bsngal rtse gzhil bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor gyi dkyil
321b1(mdo sde): 'khor chen po'i nang du'ang pad+ma bkra zhing ba lta na sdug la kha dog bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba 'dab ma bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa/ steng rin po che'i dra ba dri bsung dang ldan zhing 'jam la
321b2(mdo sde): ka tsa lin+di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag gis kun tu khebs pa bye ba phrag drug cu sa gzhi brtol te mngon par thon par gyur to/ /pad+ma de dag re re las dri ngad byung
321b3(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dris khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod
321b4(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi rnams kyi spos gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i dri des khyab par gyur to/ /lha dang / mi rnam dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu dang / gnod
321b5(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za rnams dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag gi snar pad+ma'i dri de song ba de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i rgyu dang ldan par gyur te bdag
321b6(mdo sde): nyid nyon mongs pa dang bral ba snyam du shes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying pos chos kyi 'od kyi bkod pa de mthong nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la
321b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar phyogs bcur 'od gda' ba 'di dang / pad+ma'i bkod pa byung ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ de nas lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sprin chen snying po la
322a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa sprin chen snying po ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags zhes smra/ mtshan ma med pa'i chos rmi
322a2(mdo sde): lam lta bu yin yang 'dri bar byed dam/ khyod la ni/ da dung yang phyin ci log yod pa 'dra'o/ /smras pa/ lha mo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de de bzhin te/ lha mo/ khyod legs so/ /
322a3(mdo sde): kho bo ni/ rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la mtshan mar lta ba 'dzin pa'i du shes bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar byed do/ /smras pa/ 'phags pa sprin chen snying po/ su'i don gyi phyir
322a4(mdo sde): mtshan mar lta ba 'dzin pa'i 'du shes smra par byed/ smras pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ gang bdag gi lta ba bsal bar mi nus pa des
322a5(mdo sde): gzhan gyi lta bsel bar 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ lha mos ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas
322a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes yang dag par mthong ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
322a7(mdo sde): dpa' rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i 'du shes yang dag par lta bar 'tshal bas ji ltar yang dag par blta bar bgyi /bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/
322b1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag nyid rnam pa du mar ston par byed do/ /gsol
322b2(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag nyid rnam pa du mar ji ltar ston par bgyid/
322b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sprin chen snying po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma nan tan du sbyangs pa mkhas pas rol mo'i nang du bdag nyid
322b4(mdo sde): ror gyur par ston par byed/ bud med kyi lus rnam pa sna tshogs su'ang ston par byed/ gcan gzhan gyis zin pa dang / lus zhu ba dang / lus mi snang ba dang / tshig pa dang / bcad pa dang /
322b5(mdo sde): gtub pa'i rnam pas pha rol 'drid pa lta bur gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul du bdag nyid ston pa dag kyang mthong na/ der rgyud shes pa'i mis 'jigs par mi bya/ mya ngan du mi bya bar de la
322b6(mdo sde): rig sngags kyi rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa nyid kyi lam la nan tan du sbyangs pas sems can rnams nges par bsgral
322b7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul ngu ston par byed de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rnam pa
323a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi tshul du ston pa mthong na/ bstan pa'i rgyus shes shing mkhas pas skrag par mi bya/ kun tu skrag par mi bya/ dngang bar mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya/ mya
323a2(mdo sde): ngan du mi bya bar de la sems can rtag pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /sprin chen snying po/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
323a3(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa'i bya ba rnam pa grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ bgrang ba las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bdag nyid ston to/ /dzam+bu'i
323a4(mdo sde): gling bye ba phrag sum khri dag tu'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /da lta bu'i tshul du bye ba phrag brgyar bsgre bar bya ste/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ting nge 'dzin
323a5(mdo sde): ' di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug par bya ba'i rnam pa'i grangs ma
323a6(mdo sde): mchis| dpag tu ma mchis pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bdag nyid ji ltar ston par bgyid/ bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dzam+bu'i gling la lar
323a7(mdo sde): bdag nyid mngal nas skye ba lta bu ston to/ /sems can rnams kyis bu btsas par shes kyang 'khrig pa la brtan nas byung ba'ang ma yin zhing bu'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no/ /dzam+bu'i
323b1(mdo sde): gling la lar mngon par 'byung ba'ang ston te/ sems can rnams kyis mngon par 'byung bar shes kyang de la mngon par 'byung ba'i 'du shes 'jug pa'ang med do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/
323b2(mdo sde): gtsug phud 'breg pa'i las lta bur ston te/ sems can rnams kyis gtsug phud 'breg pa'i las byed par shes kyang de la de'i 'du shes 'jug pa'ang med do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/
323b3(mdo sde): mkhan po'i khyim du 'gro ba lta bur ston te/ bslab par bya ba'i yi ge slob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa du mar bslab pa'i bya ba shin tu tshar phyin par byas shing /
323b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma nas bzo'i bya ba thams cad kyang mthar phyin to/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ mi'i seng+ge dang / ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro ba lta bur ston to/ /sems can
323b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi'i seng+ge dang / ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro bar shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas ngang pa'i stabs kyis 'du shes de'ang spangs so/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/
323b6(mdo sde): bu dang chung ma'ang ston par byed de/ sems can rnams kyis 'dod pa la yongs su spyod pa shes kyang de'ang rtag tu chos 'dod pa la yongs su spyod kyi/ nyon mongs pa dang 'dod pa la gnas
323b7(mdo sde): pa ma yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ bshang ba dang / gci ba lta bur ston par byed de/ sems can rnams kyis bshang ba dang / gci ba byed par shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs
324a1(mdo sde): med pa nas bshang ba dang / gci ba'i 'du shes kyang rnam par spangs te 'du shes de'ang 'jug pa med do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ so shing spyod pa lta bur ston
324a2(mdo sde): te| so shing 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas nyon mongs pa'i so shing rnam par spangs te kha'ang ut+pa la'i dri dang ldan no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la
324a3(mdo sde): lar ni| gdugs dang / lham 'chang ba lta bur ston te/ gdugs dang / lham 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba du ma nas nyon mongs pa'i gdugs dang /
324a4(mdo sde): lham gyi 'du shes de'ang rnam par spangs te/ lus dag cing rtag tu chos kyi bde ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi gdugs 'chang zhing rin po che'i gdugs du ma dang / pad+ma'i lham thams cad ston
324a5(mdo sde): par byed do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ khrus byed pa lta bur ston te/ khrus byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas khrus kyi 'du shes de'ang rnam par
324a6(mdo sde): spangs te/ mdo du ma nas byung ba'i chus rtag tu khrus byed cing sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs su gyur pa yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ nad kyi rang bzhin lta bur ston te/ sman la
324a7(mdo sde): sten par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral zhing nad rnams bsal ba ste/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang /
324b1(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin dag las kyang gso bar byed do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ grang ba dang tsha ba la sten pa lta bur ston ste/ grang ba dang tsha ba la sten par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang
324b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas grang ba dang tsha ba'i 'jigs pa'ang rnam par spangs so/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ bkres pa dang skom pas sred cing zhen pa dang ldan par ston te/ bkres
324b3(mdo sde): s hing skom pas gdungs par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bkras pa dang skom pa'i 'du shes kyi 'jigs pa'i klung gi rgyun las kyang rgal nas rtag tu bkres
324b4(mdo sde): pa dang skom pas sred par gyur pa'i 'byung po thams cad kyi kha zas su gyur cig / ces zer ro/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la brtson pa lta bur ston te/ kye
324b5(mdo sde): m a sbyin pa la brtson pa'i sems can yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa du ma rtag tu spyad pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams
324b6(mdo sde): la sems can rnams sdud pa'i rgyur gyur to/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi chul ston te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por sems can rnams kyis shes kyang
324b7(mdo sde): de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po phal gyi spyad pa'ang mi spyod de/ rtag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byed cing sems can thams cad kyang byed du 'jug go /
325a1(mdo sde): dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ de lta bu'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rtsA bzhin du bor nas rab tu byung ba'i gzugs dang mtshan ma
325a2(mdo sde): ston par byed de/ la lar ni/ rab tu byung ba lta bu/ la lar ni/ rab tu ma byung ba lta bur sems can rnams kyis shes so/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ ya mtshan can thams cad kyi rab
325a3(mdo sde): tu byung ba lta bur lta ba ngan pa rab tu 'byung ba la rab tu byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang ya mtshan can thams cad dang mthun par rab tu byung ba'ang ma yin te/ de dag
325a4(mdo sde): nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung ngo / /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'byung bar rtsom pa lta bur ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'byung bas rab
325a5(mdo sde): tu 'byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i bya ba'ang mthar phyin par byas so/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar
325a6(mdo sde): ni| sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis yang dag par 'dzin pa lta bur ston te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan can yo byad bsnyungs pa yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal
325a7(mdo sde): pa bye ba phrag du ma nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs shing rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'ang yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ byang chub kyi snying por rtswa bting ba la 'dug pa lta bur ston
325b1(mdo sde): te| byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu byang chub kyi bya ba mthar phyin par byas pa'ang yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ bsam gtan dang / ting
325b2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bur ston te/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs par sems can
325b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod pa du ma la spyod pa'ang yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ yan lag dgu ba'i mdo 'chad pa lta bur ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
325b4(mdo sde): kyis yan lag dgu pa'i mdo gsungs pa 'chad par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu mdo du ma la sogs pa'ang 'chad do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi'i tshad nges
325b5(mdo sde): par byed pa lta bur ston te/ bslab pa'i gzhi'i tshad nges par 'cha' bar byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdo dag kyang rtag tu byed cing /
325b6(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi du ma dag kyang rtag tu 'cha' bar byed do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'dul ba lta bur ston te/ bdud kyi sde pham par byas par sems can rnams kyis
325b7(mdo sde): shes kyang bdud kyi 'du shes gcig kyang mi 'byung ste/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / phung po'i bdud la sogs pa bdud bye ba phrag du ma dag kyang rtag tu zad par byed do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/
326a1(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi thob pa lta bur ston te/ 'bras bu bzhi thob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang 'bras bu bzhi'i 'du shes
326a2(mdo sde): kyang mi 'byung ste/ 'bras bu'i bya ba du ma dag la'ang spyod cing phyir mi 'ong pa'ang ma yin la/ sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rtag tu srid pa'i yan lag rnams su'ang 'ong ngo / /dzam+bu'i
326a3(mdo sde): gling la lar ni/ yon gnas lta bur ston te/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang yon gnas kyi nga rgyal la'ang mi spyod de/ nam sems can thams cad bla na
326a4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yon gnas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag yon gnas kyi 'du shes la 'jug go snyam nas ma gos pa'i spyad pa la spyod do/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ dge
326a5(mdo sde): 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa lta bur ston te/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa nas dge 'dun gyi dbyen sngon chad kyang
326a6(mdo sde): ma byas te/ dge 'dun la phan par sgrub pa spyod pa yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis reg pa'i rdul gud du 'dor bar byed pa lta bur ston te/ kye ma
326a7(mdo sde): ngur smrig tsam 'chang zhing mi zad pa'i las byed pa zhig yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang ngur smrig tsam 'chang ba'ang ma yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
326b1(mdo sde): bde ba ston pa'ang yin no/ /de la sogs pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chos mnyan pa thos na/ kye ma dge sbyong gau ta ma ni/ brda phrad dka' ba sha stag zer ro/ /zhes 'phya
326b2(mdo sde): ba lta bur ston te/ kye ma g.yeng pa shes rab rtul ba'i dge slong zhig yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phan pa dang / bde
326b3(mdo sde): ba byed pa'ang yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zad dug can 'bul zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dang / pham pa'i 'gal ba byed pa lta bur ston te/ pham pa can du sems can
326b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa skyed par byed pa'ang yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mdzad pa mang po ston pa lta bur ston
326b5(mdo sde): te| yang dag par ston pa po yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang yang dag par ston pa po'ang ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan byed pa yin no/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ nyan thos dang
326b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta bur bdag nyid ston te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad yin par sems can rnams kyis shes so/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
326b7(mdo sde): ba lta bur bdag nyid ston te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang sngon chad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas ni/ nam yang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das so
327a1(mdo sde): lan gcig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin te/ lan mang du'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan
327a2(mdo sde): las 'da'o/ /lan grangs bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed de/ lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du 'dod chags las
327a3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/ 'dod chags la brten te yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin no/ /lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong
327a4(mdo sde): du zhe sdang las yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /lan bye ba phrag nyi khri chig stong du gti mug las yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /lan bye ba khrag nyi khri chig stong du cha mnyam pa las yongs su
327a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do/ /rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta bus yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/ 'dod
327a6(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / cha mnyam pa la'ang mi rten to/ /de ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bzhi po dag gis bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bya ba mthar phyin te
327a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur ston te/ mi dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed yod par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang de snyed de/ rtag tu skad cig dang / thang gcig
327b1(mdo sde): dang / yul tsam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /de bas na/ rnam pa mang po dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed la gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ming yang med pa'i
327b2(mdo sde): phyir yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /dzam+bu'i gling la lar ni/ bdud kyi las byed par bdag nyid ston te/ bdud sdig can yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bdud kyi las kyang mi byed
327b3(mdo sde): do| |'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi 'jigs pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i phyogs ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bdud kyi las rtag tu byed la/ shin tu gcod par byed pa'i bdud kyi las la
327b4(mdo sde): rten pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar bdag nyid mngal nas skyes pa lta bur ston te/ sems can rnams kyis bu btsas par shes kyang 'khrig pa la brten nas byung ba'ang ma yin zhing
327b5(mdo sde): bu'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar mngon par 'byung ba'ang ston te/ sems can rnams kyis mngon par 'byung bar shes kyang de la mngon par 'byung ba'i 'du shes 'jug
327b6(mdo sde): pa'ang med do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ gtsug phud 'breg pa'i las lta bur ston te/ sems can rnams kyis gtsug phud 'breg pa'i las byed par shes kyang de la de'i 'du shes 'jug
327b7(mdo sde): pa'ang med do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ mkhan po'i khyim du 'gro ba lta bur ston te/ bslab par bya ba'i yi ge slob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa du mar bslab pa'i bya ba
328a1(mdo sde): shin tu tshar phyin par byas shing bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma nas bzo'i bya ba thams cad kyang mthar phyin te/ byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ mi'i seng+ge dang /
328a2(mdo sde): ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro ba lta bur ston te/ sems can rnams kyis mi'i seng+ge dang / ngang pa'i stabs su 'gro bar shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas dang pa'i stabs kyi 'du
328a3(mdo sde): shes de'ang spangs so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ bu dang chung ma la'ang ston par byed de/ sems can rnams kyis 'dod pa la yongs su spyod par shes kyang de'ang rtag tu chos 'dod pa la
328a4(mdo sde): yongs su spyod kyi/ nyon mongs pa dang / 'dod pa la gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ bshang ba dang / gci ba lta bur ston par byed de/ sems can rnams kyis bshad ba
328a5(mdo sde): dang / gci ba byed par shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa nas bshad ba dang gci ba'i 'du shes kyang rnam par spangs te/ 'du shes de'ang 'jug pa med do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/
328a6(mdo sde): so shing spyod pa lta bur ston te/ so shing 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas nyon mongs pa'i so shing rnam par spangs te/ kha'ang ut+pa la'i dri dang
328a7(mdo sde): ldan no| |byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ gdugs dang / lham 'chang ba lta bur ston te/ gdugs dang / lham 'chang bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas nyon mongs
328b1(mdo sde): pa'i gdugs dang / lham gyi 'du shes kyang rnam par spangs te lus dag cing rtag tu chos kyi bde ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gdugs 'chang zhing rin po che'i gdugs dang / pad+ma'i lham thams cad sten
328b2(mdo sde): par byed do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ khrus byed pa lta bur ston te/ khrus byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas khrus kyi 'du shes de rnam par spangs te/ mdo du
328b3(mdo sde): ma nas byung ba'i chus rtag tu khrus byed cing sems can thams cad kyi mu stegs su gyur pa'ang yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ nad kyi rang bzhin lta bur ston te/ sman la sten par sems can rnams
328b4(mdo sde): kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral zhing nad rnams bsal ba ste/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang / 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin dag las kyang gso
328b5(mdo sde): bar byed do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ grang ba dang / tsha ba la sten pa lta bur ston te/ grang ba dang / tsha ba la sten par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma la sogs pa nas grang
328b6(mdo sde): ba dang / tsha ba'i 'jigs pa'ang rnam par spangs so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ bkres pa dang / skom pas sred cing zhen pa dang ldan par ston te/ bkres shing skom pa la skom pas gdungs bar sems can
328b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas bkres pa dang / skom pa'i 'du shes kyi 'jigs pa'i klung gi rgyun las kyang rgal nas rtag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas sred par gyur pa'i 'byung po thams
329a1(mdo sde): cad kyi kha zas su gyur cig / ces zer ro/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la brtson pa lta bur ston te/ kye ma sbyin pa la brtson pa'i sems can
329a2(mdo sde): yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa du ma rtag tu spyad pas pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po rnams la sems can rnams sdud pa'i rgyur gyur to/ byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/
329a3(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi tshul ston te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por sems can rnams kyis shes kyang de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po pal gyi spyad
329a4(mdo sde): pa'ang mi spyod de/ rtag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po byed cing sems can thams cad kyang byed du 'jug go /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ de lta bu'i rgyal srid phun sum
329a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rtsa bzhin du bor nas rab tu byung ba'i gzugs dang / mtshan ma ston par byed de/ la lar ni/ rab tu byung ba lta bu/ la lar ni/ rab tu ma byung ba lta bur sems can
329a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis shes so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ ya mtshan can thams cad kyi rab tu byung ba lta bur lta ba ngan pa rab tu 'byung ba la rab tu byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang ya
329a7(mdo sde): mtshan can thams cad dang mthun par rab tu byung ba'ang ma yin te/ de dag nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung ngo / /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung bar rtsom
329b1(mdo sde): pa lta bur ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'byung bar rab tu 'byung bar sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i bya
329b2(mdo sde): ba'ang mthar phyin par byas so/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gsum yang dag par 'dzin pa lta bur ston te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan can yo byad bsnyungs pa yin par
329b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis shes kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag du ma nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs shing rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'ang yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ byang chub kyi snying por
329b4(mdo sde): rtswa bting ba lta bur ston te/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu byang chub kyi bya ba mthar phyin par byas pa'ang yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ bsam
329b5(mdo sde): gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bur ston te/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs par sems
329b6(mdo sde): can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par spyod pa du ma spyod pa'ang yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ yan lag dgu'i mdo 'chad pa lta bur ston te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
329b7(mdo sde): yan lag dgu'i mdo gsungs pa 'chad par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang rtag tu mdo du ma la sogs pa'ang 'chad do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi tshad nges par byed pa lta
330a1(mdo sde): bur ston te/ bslab pa'i gzhi tshad nges par 'cha' bar byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdo dag kyang rtag tu byed cing
330a2(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi du ma dag kyang rtag tu 'cha' bar byed do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'dul ba lta bur ston te/ bdud kyi sde pham par byas par sems can
330a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis shes kyang bdud kyi 'du shes gcig kyang mi 'byung ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dud dang / phung po'i bdud la sogs pa bdud bye ba du ma dag kyang rtag tu zad par byed do/ /byang gi sgra mi
330a4(mdo sde): snyan la lar ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi thob pa lta bur ston te/ 'bras bu bzhi thob par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang 'bras bu bzhi'i 'du shes kyang mi
330a5(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ 'bras bu'i bya ba du ma dag la'ang spyod cing phyir mi 'ong ba'ang ma yin la sems can rnams nges par bsgral ba'i phyir rtag tu srid pa'i yan lag rnams su'ang 'ong ngo / /byang gi sgra mi
330a6(mdo sde): snyan la lar ni/ yon gnas lta bur ston te/ 'jig rten na yon gnas yin par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang yon gnas kyi nga rgyal la'ang mi spyod de/ nam sems can thams cad bla na
330a7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yon gnas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag yon gnas kyi 'du shes la 'jug go snyam nas ma gos pa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/
330b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa lta bur ston te/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed par sems can rnams kyis shes kyang sngon gyi bskal pa grangs med pa nas dge 'dun gyi dbyen sngon chad kyang ma byas te/
330b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun la phan par sgrub pa spyod pa yin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan la lar ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis reg pa'i rdul gud du 'dor bar byed pa lta bur ston te/ kye ma dur smrig tsam
